I knew that our local cable provider (WOW! in Columbus) allows some channels to be seen in HD without a converter box (for TVs with a QAM tuner).  I've had limited success on an older Samsung, so I was curious to see how the Vizio would would handle QAM tuning.Perfect.  The Vizio gives me all the local channels in HD, neatly lined up at in the channel 201+ range  They are: CBS, NBC, The CW, PBS, ABC, and FOX.  In contrast, the Samsung displays them intermixed with the SD channels, and does so erratically to the point I put a Mohu Leaf antenna on it to achieve the same effect.Picture/sound, no complaints.  The stand everyone complains about did look pretty cheesy, I'm glad that went into the trash as I was wall-mounting it with a VideoSecu mount.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: K  Mackay
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with little TV. It was very easy to set up and the picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Sarah Kramer "skramer879"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy set up, closed captioning in different sized print and choice of locations on screen.  TV as advertised, was out of stock originally but constantly kept informed as to status.  Great value.

Reviews.Title: No EPG. Tiny text. Otherwise great. Narrow bezel looks nice.
Reviews.Author: Lake Waters "L. Waters"
Reviews.Content: First the (possibly) bad news:If you're used to viewing upcoming programming using the over the air EPG guide, you might want to reconsider buying this model. All it shows info for is just the current show you're watching...and the info it does show is so tiny it's pretty much unreadable from beyond 3 feet away.If you're using cable or satellite it may not matter to you. I've no idea why they left this feature off. People may or may not continue to have cable or sat service and rely on over the air channels. It would be a drag to not easily see what's coming up in the near future.There are often times when OTA offers better programming than cable, especially overnight. I don't think many cable or satellite on-screen guides show the info for (or even receive) the local sub channels (such as say 8.2, 8.3. 8.4, they would only show info for 8.1)There is no headphone jack but that is easily and cheaply fixed by using an rca adapter from it's 2 rca audio outlets. The optical-out audio is switchable between: off, dolby, or PCM. The abilty to switch to PCM is apparently a plus when running the audio through older amplifiers which only have rca inputs. (see the other reviews).Also, it lacks a vga input which might be a problem with connections to older computers.Otherwise, very pleased with the TV. It has an insane number of video adjustments so you can tweak it however you want it. The narrow bezel around the screen provides a very sharp looking appearance.ps You might want to download the manual from the Vizio website because the box only contains a quick start guide which only shows you how to set it up and the basic connections.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Jonathan McPhee
Reviews.Content: The price was great and even better when it arrived and I saw how easy it was to set up. The picture is clear and viewable from a wide variety of angles in the room. Sound ( which is usually terrible on small sets) is quite good. Would definitely recommend this to anyone.Jon in Boston

Reviews.Title: Needs some tweaking in the settings out of the box, but worth the cash
Reviews.Author: E. Burke
Reviews.Content: Only had this a few days, just wanted to note the changes to the default settings that were needed to make it better.Note that the settings need to be changed for each source and each mode.For the audio, the background music on my Netflix videos was very tinny and distorted, I think I finally got it about right.In Audio, I set SRS Surround Studio to Standard, SRS TruVolume to Off, then in the Equalizer I edited the Flat settings to 8,8,8,3,-3and now the audio sounds great.One other annoyance out of the box is the Ambient Light Sensor. I was tweaking the picture settings and it would look great for a few seconds, then go to an overcast grey look. To disable you need to go to Picture, More, Advanced Picture, then turn it off. You will need to do this for each Input, and each setting and each Picture Mode (Movie, Football, etc) as each one remembers it's own settings.Now that I've got this unit dialed in I'm loving it. This is my first HD TV, I finally upgraded from my 11 year old 28inch CRT, so I'm probably easily impressed.I'll update this review if I find any other useful tweaks, or if anything blows up.

Reviews.Title: The tv is good :)
Reviews.Author: Dana Helton
Reviews.Content: I had to edit my review. I wrote earlier that the picture quality is fuzzy and there is no sound. all i get when i turn it on is click,click,click out of the speakers. i am very upset about this. Now what do I do? Guess I'm glad I paid extra money for a warranty!!!! I Never thought I would have a problem so fast with a Vizio TV.? I'm highly disappointed and I still Don't Have a TV.!!!!!I have to take back what I wrote about the tv. because after help from tech support and a wonderful lady named Jessica, we found out that my HDMi cord was the problem for everything. There is nothing wrong with this tv so far. I have only had it a few hours but I had to edit this review because I was wrong. I am very grateful for Jessica and all her help, and hopefully the new HDMi cord she is sending me tomorrow will actually work :)

Reviews.Title: Vizio LED TV
Reviews.Author: James H Hoffman
Reviews.Content: I bought it as it was highly recommended in Consumer Reports. Great quality, value, sound & sharp picture. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Lobo
Reviews.Content: Quite pleased with picture and size. I would buy it again. I hope this helps.It fits our bedroom very well.

Reviews.Title: amazing tv!
Reviews.Author: danwolf21
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to upgrade from an vizio 26' razor LED that i bought 2 years ago for 300. after seeing the great review from CNET about the smart version and deciding it wasnt worth the extra 50 bucks for the smart stuff seeing as i have an xbox for that, i bought this one expecting it to be on par with the 26 inch due to the fact that its the same company and same refresh rate (60 hertz), both were 720p screens and both are LED lit (the 26' is side lit, this is back lit). I was blown away by the quality of the screen over the 26 inch. the 26 inch tv was almost too bright, making blacks almost a grey color. this new tv (the 32 inch) is much better about this, most likely because it is backlit and not side lit. another great thing about this tv is how big it looks. the slim bezel on this thing really does wonders for making this thing look great. overall, i cant recommend this TV enough. it easily deserves % stars.

Reviews.Title: new tv
Reviews.Author: A.R
Reviews.Content: This TV is great! Just seems small even tho its really not all that small. I should have paid more attention to what I was  getting, needed more hdmi outputs.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Stephen B.
Reviews.Content: This Product is a very beautiful and wonderful product. I play my Ps3 on this tv and it is perfect i love it the color is amazing the sound is great. I have this LED Tv mount to the wall which beautifies my room. The shipping was on time and i must say thank you to vizio for such an exceptional television

Reviews.Title: Good Tv
Reviews.Author: Rando
Reviews.Content: I was having trouble with this TV then I found the problem.It was'nt bright enough.If you're having this problemgo to...menu...Picture....more...Advanced Picture....Ambient Light Sensor.Turn off the Ambient Light Sensor. It worked for me.I was about to return the TV.It's all good now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: skw
Reviews.Content: This is our third VIZIO!!  They are perfect for kitchen and bedroom TVs.  We've been happy with all of them!!!  This is also a great deal.

Reviews.Title: How I would rate this product
Reviews.Author: Alice
Reviews.Content: I rated this product 5 stars due to the fact that it has great picture quality as well as sound. I really enjoyed this product and looking forward to seeing something else that may satisfying my future needs.

Reviews.Title: still finding the sweet spot.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I received this yesterday, It seems like it is hard to find the right brightness and contrast for playing on my PS3 but movies and TV look great regardless, The stand puts this VIZIO 24-inch TV a good 3-4 inches away if you are not mounting it to your wall. But that's still a small footprint on a desk or dresser.This is my first TV in 5 years so all I have to relate it to is my 24-inch IPS display for computer use, both that monitor and this TV are gorgeous.

Reviews.Title: Love this Product
Reviews.Author: PHILLUUPPP
Reviews.Content: I can't imagine how someone could give this TV a bad rating. My Wife and I bought this TV and have been nothing but pleased with it. the only negative is that we didn't buy a larger tv Vizio is a great brand.

Reviews.Title: perfect to use as monitor
Reviews.Author: jake
Reviews.Content: so I bought this TV as a second monitor for my laptop. I just use the HDMI connection and it works GREAT. I love how crisp the picture is, the full HD is awesome for gaming. It's the perfect size, and it has a stand that is perfect for a desk area.

Reviews.Title: Terrific TV for the price and size
Reviews.Author: Miriam L. Emerson
Reviews.Content: Have spent hours and hours comparing HD LED TVs on internet and in retail stores.  Received yesterday (01/03/13) and am very pleased.  Set up is "EZ" and with a wee bit of help from my cablevision provider, can now use "ONE" remote.  VIZIO is tops in my opinion for size, price and operational ease.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E24-A1 24 inch Razor LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: ross hettenbach
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this TV. the picture quality is great, and its slim design makes it excellent for a bedroom TV. I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing for Vizio
Reviews.Author: kensystem
Reviews.Content: I own two previous Vizio TVs and am VERY happy with them. I used to recommend this brand but after seeing this TV I can no longer endorse Vizio.1) For Over the Air HD channels, the guide button does exactly the same thing as the info button -- it does not show the program lineup like my other TVs do.2) Most importantly to me, the color saturation is just dull and off-tint. Even turning the color saturation up to max (100), it is closer but still does not approach the amazing richness of my vf552xvt. In fact setting the E390-A1's saturation to 100%, I could only make them *almost* match -- by turning the 552's color saturation down to 40. And the skin color just was not true. I tried for 3 weeks to tell myself I could live with this, but decided to return to store.COMPARE this TV's richness of red and blue side by side to other BEFORE you buy it.I can only believe this reversal in quality was the result of management. It's an AMAZING accomplishment for a company to produce products with such high quality they earn the loyalty of customers... It's a tragedy when bean counters come in and reverse that loyalty by sacrificing quality.BTW I wrote this same review on costco.com, and they censored it.

Reviews.Title: Did not work!
Reviews.Author: Betty L. Modra "racer63"
Reviews.Content: The TV was received and had a purple tint to the picture that could not be adjusted.  I had a TV technician look at the set and he determined that it should be sent back.

Reviews.Title: Be sure to read the Quick Start Guide
Reviews.Author: rare bird
Reviews.Content: We received this in great condition even though it was not double-boxed. Setting it up was a breeze.  So far the sound and picture are excellent for a bedroom TV. Since some people have had issues develop within a short period of time we are hanging onto the packaging for a while. In our experience Amazon is terrific about replacing defective products.For those who have not had success attaching the stand, we recommend reading the Quick Start Guide, where it is explained that two small screws are included to anchor the stand to the TV. (Look for a tiny plastic bag in the box).  Just below the slots where the stand/bar fits in place on the back of the TV there are tiny flexible rubber "doors" that pop open so that you can put the screws in to hold the stand to the TV. The doors have an imprint that looks like the head of a screw.This TV does tilt a bit to the back, which makes viewing from bed sort of awkward, but a 1/2 inch book placed under the stand straightens it up nicely.The picture quality is so good that I'm thinking about ordering the 22" version to use as a TV and second monitor for my sewing room.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 24 inch TV
Reviews.Author: steveinthesprings
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for one that the sound did not work on that was ordered last week. This one is working great and the HD is great. Amazon's service was really great.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Has Done It Again.
Reviews.Author: Lee Daly
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th Vizio TV and once again, I am not disappointed!  I have a 55" in my living room, a 42" in my bedroom and two smaller models in my RV.  I purchased this one for my outdoor patio.  Being outdoors, I needed a clear picture free of reflections and bright enough to see at a distance.  This one fits the bill on all counts.  In addition, the price was right, shipping was free and I did not have to pay tax.  It arrived within the time advertised and in excellent condition.  This was an 'overall' excellent transaction.

Reviews.Title: Love my Vizio!
Reviews.Author: Beth Johns
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Vizio television purchase. I have a 42", and now 2, 22" inch televisions. All three of them have extreme clarity and brilliant color. I purchased my first Vizio four years ago and will not buy another brand. Never had a problem with any of them. Extremely pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: KevShallPerish
Reviews.Content: My brother bought this TV so we could use it with the Xbox One and it works perfectly. No complaints about anything yet.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: priscilla fladger
Reviews.Content: This was easy to set up and easy to operate.  Picture is great; but the sound is not as good as hoped for.

Reviews.Title: A great investment
Reviews.Author: Jeff Felker
Reviews.Content: This TV has been a great investment, I have had absolutely no problems with it whatsoever and I've used it a lot to play video games and watch movies. I think the picture quality is amazing, the built in speakers sound great, and the TV is very easy to navigate and setup. I have had several other Vizio TVs in the past and have never once had a problem with any of them, the TV is great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Just Bob
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for the kitchen.  We are running it off of an antenna that is sitting behind it and we receive a beautiful picture.  the picture is beautiful, the sound is sufficient and I think all in all it was money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Lasted 2 months past warranty
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Unrepairable backlight out and cannot be fixed.  First TV I ever had that died so quickly.  Will try another brand to replace.

Reviews.Title: Super picture!  Just the right size.
Reviews.Author: Mark Rogers
Reviews.Content: I needed a good TV that would fit in my wall unit and this TV maximized the space with the best picture.  And coupled with a Sony Blu-Ray Smart DVD it is now a SMART TV!  ....for a really great price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV great deal
Reviews.Author: Bradley
Reviews.Content: Excellent tv! Large screen, clear picture, beautiful colors. Was worried that at 60hz 1080p motion would seem choppy but I didn't want to spend 120 or 240Hz money. Glad I didn't waste my money, the picture is fine, no complaints. Fresh out of the box the picture was rather bland, but the tv's picture settings are more than enough to make the picture brighter and the colors pop... makes you wonder why they don't just ship from the factory with ideal picture settings! But that counts for nothing, because once they're set right it's a beautiful display. Would buy 100 more times, great product.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Stern
Reviews.Content: I selected this TV because Vizio is highly rated and the price was very goodIt was easy for me to install and the picture is wonderful

Reviews.Title: If I could give no stars, I would
Reviews.Author: HRFool
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV on April 23, 2013. I read the reviews and knew that there might be some difficulties with getting the picture "just right". I'm not a very picky person about HD quality, so I got the TV and messed around with the settings for about a day until I got it to a place where it was a reasonably good picture and all was fine until about a week ago.Now, the TV won't turn on. It looks like it should be...the power light comes on...but then nothing happens. For the last week, I'd unplug it and re-plug it over and over again until it would finally come on again, but today, I've done it countless times and still...nothing.Of course, it's been almost a year and I don't have the box anymore or even the documentation (my bad, I guess) I've never had an issue with a TV...most of mine have lasted at least 10 years, if not more, so I haven't worried about keeping all of that stuff.Bottom line...this is awful...move on!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV.
Reviews.Author: Paul C Schmidt
Reviews.Content: The E420-A0 is an excellent unit.Outstanding picture and perfect size for small living room.Very satisfied.And to the gentleman who wrote the review about the difficulty in finding the PMC setting.It's not PMC - It's PCM.  Try that and you'll find it under Advanced Audio.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Vallerand
Reviews.Content: The first one Amazon sent me was dead. Amazon took it back and sent me another one next day. This one works. The picture quality is good and sound is good. My only complaint is the glossy screen produces a lot of glare and reflection if you have lights on in the room.

Reviews.Title: Vizio/24 inch.
Reviews.Author: JKV
Reviews.Content: This is my first Vizio. I resisted the brand for a long time because I can be a price-point snob sometimes, subscribing to the adage of "you get what you pay for," and I still do. But basing it on it's Amazon track record, I gave in. I even bought it refurbished. And I'm, so far, very happy. Solid size for a tiny little apartment, a bedroom, a garage, or a fancy ass bathroom. If you're a soundphile, or whatever, you might want to consider getting speakers. Only thing... not a fan of the brace/stand. The TV is locked at a certain angle, which sometimes strain visibility. Unless you plan on mounting your TV, then it doesn't matter.

Reviews.Title: Good for a computer monitor
Reviews.Author: Gareth Davis
Reviews.Content: Good for a computer monitor. Adjustable brightness is delightful.One thing to keep note of is it comes with one of the most terrible stands I have ever seen. I'm afraid to have a fan near the thing, for fear of a brisk wind knocking it (and the television) over. It's a mess. If you buy this t.v, buy a wall mount or something.

Reviews.Title: It broke within the first week.
Reviews.Author: FaFaFoHi
Reviews.Content: I ordered this television as a gift for my son for Christmas. His mom informed me that the television broke down within the first week. At first it would randomely turn on and after that it just flat out broke. Very disapointed. Fortunately, she is in the process of getting a new one from Vizio. I would advise anyone to stay clear from Vizio. You will never have these problems with Sony and Samsung.

Reviews.Title: My first vizio
Reviews.Author: Kemar Roberts
Reviews.Content: This TV is an incredible value for money. You're really getting the picture quality of a $1000 TV at a very affordable price. The refresh rate is a non issue compared to a TV with a 120hz refresh rate because you can't even notice any blur. This is not a smart TV though and that's why I bought it because I hook it up to an Xbox one. The graphics look amazing on this set up. The only thing lacking really is the sound is shallow on the TV. If give it a pass barely but everything else is superb. To get the best picture use these settings you won't regret itBacklight: 75Contrast: 69 Brightness: 49 Sharpness: 8 Color: 55Tint: -2 Color Temperature – NormalAdvanced SettingsNoise Reduction – LowMPEG NR – LowColor Enhancement – OffAdaptive Luma – OffFilm Mode – OffSmart Dimming – OffAmbient Light Sensor – Off

Reviews.Title: Stopped working right after the warranty expired - 2 issues really
Reviews.Author: Anthony D.
Reviews.Content: The TV stopped working right after the warranty expired.  The TV would not come on, though the white LED in the corner would come on indicating that it was getting power.  Went to the Visio website, tried all the troubleshooting suggestions there.  I then called Visio and spoke to a representative who had an attitude.  I explained what I had tried.  She asked me if I had called before, I had because of another issue where I couldn't use the HDMI cable with the TV, I would lose sound.  Their fix for that was to use component cables instead.  When she looked up my account information she couldn't find it.  Made me reregister again.  She had me go through all of the things that were listed in the troubleshooting guide again, so that she could document it.  Finally, she put me on hold.  When she came back she said that there was a problem with the back light, but since they can't find me in the system they can't prove when I bought it.  I informed her that I don't where the sale receipt would be.  The representative told me to go back to the store and ask them for a new receipt.  I asked her did she really think the store would give me a new receipt after a couple of months?  I was told that wasn't her problem.  Shoddy workmanship (made in China) and terrible customer service.  Two calls to customer service and twice unsatisfactory results.  Stay away.

Reviews.Title: TV died - Vizio didn't back their product
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: Started having an issue with the TV not turning on after only 6 months.  The troubleshooting videos on the website gave instructions on how to deal with the issue (as if it was normal).  I followed the steps they suggested, which prolonged the life of the TV just long enough not to be covered under warranty anymore.  Had several long conversations with customer service which resulted in a "sorry, bad luck" response.  No more Vizio's in my house.  It's one thing to have a lemon somewhere in the batch, but that response from a Company claiming to have award winning customer service is a joke.  Buy an LG or Samsung - they won't break.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E-390-A1 39 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Keddie Walker
Reviews.Content: I am VERY happy with this purchase. I bought an Emerson 32 inch LED first and was shocked with the poor picture quality. I then researched HDTVs and found that everyone agreed Emerson was not good, but that Vizio was super. Some people thought lack of brightness was a problem with the Vizio E 390, but another person explained that was only a matter of adjustment in the setup. Since I knew how to do that after adjusting the Emerson, I thought the Vizio E-390 was what I wanted. The picture was perfect from the minute I plugged it in. I love it.

Reviews.Title: TV was DOA
Reviews.Author: Ben Shanahan
Reviews.Content: I've owned a Vizio TV before and was very happy with the picture. When I saw this product for a reasonable price, I figured it was a great deal. The TV was broken when I got it--no picture, no sound. The manual provided no troubleshooting help for this issue, and the customer service agent I spoke to spoke with an attitude as if I was just an interruption to her day. Now, Vizio is telling me that to replace my faulty product, will take 5-7 business days. This is unacceptable customer service. It's a good TV, but in the event that anything goes wrong, these people don't seem to care at all.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy for the Money
Reviews.Author: Anthony D. Cooper
Reviews.Content: After a little snafu with a 3rd party seller on Amazon, I finally received a new and factory sealed product, but now to the product itself.  As the subject states, this is a great TV for the money, can't believe flat panels are getting so inexpensive.  I use this primarily as a monitor when I don't want to turn on my projector in the theater room.  I merely use this to listen to music so I can see what the streaming player is displaying.  It works great for that application, didn't need to pay for the Wifi or the other features of the more expensive model.  For my application it's perfect.  I wish it had more than one HDMI input, but that's an easy fix with other devices on the market.

Reviews.Title: Sharp picture
Reviews.Author: Rebecca L Clemens
Reviews.Content: Great little tv. Beautiful, sharp picture. This tv is perfect for the kids' rooms. I like the kickstand in back too!

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: Steve DellaVecchia
Reviews.Content: Vizio techs could not get the settings for 03, which is needed for Dish Network…  Had to use RCA cables to get it to work…

Reviews.Title: Good TV, remote needs a little work
Reviews.Author: 3duckdave
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about this television, it does everything that is advertised.  I have noticed when I turn it on I will get a picture for several seconds, and then the screen goes black for about 2 seconds and then the picture comes back.  Picture is clear and crisp.  I spent considerably time read online reviews of numerous TV's in this size range and this one seemed to get good reviews.  The volume on this unit seems to be pretty loud compared to other tv's I own.  This could just be because it is mounted in a corner close to the ceiling of the room.  My biggest complaint about this unit is about the remote and not the tv itself.  The remote has not distinguishing features from front to back, so as fumble with the remote in the dark I find I'm pointing the wrong end at the unit.  There is no backlight on the buttons.  My biggest complaint about the remote is that there isn't a sleep button on the remote.  You have to go into the menu to access the sleep timer feature.  The unit is great for a small tv, the remote needs some upgrades

Reviews.Title: Great price and great value
Reviews.Author: Danny Acuna "The one and only"
Reviews.Content: Got this TV after getting rid of our old CRT type 32 inch one so this was a big upgrade.  I love the image quality, simplicity to setup and overall the price.  I was going to get the Smart TV version but since I connect it to my entertainment PC to play media via Windows Media Center, having all the apps like Facebook and YouTube didn't make sense.  I was surprised at the sound too.  I ended up getting a sound bar (VIZIO S3821w-C0 38-inch 2.1 Home Theater Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer) for a better sound experience (mostly for movies and music.  But the sound quality of the little speakers were very good too.  I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture, but lousy mount
Reviews.Author: Nelson Johnsrud "Nels"
Reviews.Content: I bought the E291-A1 for our bedroom.  I am very happy with the picture quality, and the size is just right for the bedroom.  However, the easel-style lean-back stand is very flimsy, and mounting it on the wall opens up another can of worms.  All the connectors in the rear point straight out the back and are nearly flush with the rear surface of the case.  I bought a simple non-swivel mount, as I have no need to move it.  But the tv cannot be mounted close to the wall with the plugs sticking out the back.  I will have to add two inches or more of space between the wall and tv in order to be able to hang it with the cables attached.  Either that, or buy another more expensive swivel arm mount (which I don't need or want) in order to get enough room for the cables. And then the set will not fit close to the wall as desired.  If the rear jacks were angled down as on other flat screen sets this problem would be alleviated.  This is a good looking set for the money, but be aware of these issues if you plan to mount it anywhere other than on it's (also inadequate) tabletop stand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV with USB Port!!
Reviews.Author: Paul "wds"
Reviews.Content: I bought a NIX digital photo frame of 18.5" before.  It was working very well.  It was not only very expensive but also smaller screen.  Therefore, I sold that NIX and  purchased this TV because it has USB port and plays the media from the memory drive. This TV can also be used as a digital photo player.  High Resolution display with less power consumption is highly appreciated.  If you are going to use this as a photo frame, make sure you format the USB device in FAT32 and copy the pictures in 'jpg' file format.  No other file formats are recognized.  I have not tested avi kind of stuff.  I am very happy with this item. I will definitely recommend this product and brand. A thumps-up and 5-star!!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier!
Reviews.Author: Amazon User "amazon lover"
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv 1 year now. A lot of tv for the price. Great looking, slim, sleek, modern. Couldn't be happier. Many people I know are skeptical of Vizio but there is no reason to be. Our 4th Vizio (none have broken we just keep upgrading over the years) and Vizio has never disappointed us. No complaints whatsoever. I highly recommend this tv, or the same tv with internet capability. $20 price difference seems worth it

Reviews.Title: A steal for the price, and a solid TV to boot!
Reviews.Author: lindserina
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as an update to an aging 42" Hitachi plasma from 2008.  I am pleased to say that after a brief calibration, the color accuracy and shadow detail is just as good as the Hitachi was, only with far better resolution and clarity.  Motion blur is minimal, and I primarily use the TV for playing videogames so take it from me, it can definitely handle quick transition.  Whatever you do, don't leave the manufacturer's settings in place... ESPECIALLY that goofy "local dimming" function.  (Good grief, it prevents you from discerning any shapes or detail in a dark scene.  Just turn it off.)I opted for this model rather than the "Smart" model, since I already have a couple of streaming content compatible devices and didn't feel like wasting money.Basically what I'm saying is that this TV offers a "good picture" as your grandpa would say, for what I would consider a small entry fee.  I highly recommend this TV to anyone looking for an above average level of performance for the price range.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, OK sound
Reviews.Author: L. Mahoney
Reviews.Content: This TV is great quality picture with a nice large size. However after having the tv for a couple months I've noticed the sound isn't the best, and when the sound is up higher than normal you can hear some crackling. I've heard better quality coming from other vizio TV's. Not the biggest deal to me but a little disappointing.This TV is pretty light weight and was easy to mount. Overall I'm happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Everyone says Vizio Sucks but .....
Reviews.Author: Scott Ferrell
Reviews.Content: ...I like their products and I'm totally satisfied with this television. In fact, I now use it as my Computer monitor and felt inclined to buy my 84 year old father one too.  He loves his new T.V. / monitor as well and uses all the features. Easy setup decent price. I could have gotten it $75  cheaper at Ebay but I don't trust those fools. Thanks Amazon !!

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive tv for spare room
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "dcypherz"
Reviews.Content: I needed this in our exercise room.  It is basic, works well, great picture. Fits the bill. We love having it.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Tamaracboy
Reviews.Content: My main TV is a top of the line 3D/240Hz/1080P Sony, so i was not expecting this one to be so nice. For bedroom use this is excellent. It is bright and clear and no disappointment with being only 60Hz. I watch mainly Movies and Network TV shows, no sports, so have not noticed any problems; no hot or cold corners. From other reviews I had thought I might have to add a sound bar for acceptable sound quality, but waited to actually hear it. Turns out that the sound is fine without adding the bar. Mind you this is for bedroom use and am not expecting home theater special effects. For my use the dialogue is clear and there is enough range to not sound "tinny".There are only 2 HDMI inputs (one back, one side) as advertised, but one is enough for me in this set up.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Bill "Bill"
Reviews.Content: My very expensive 5 year old t v broke...and I bought this downsized tv because I did not want to spend the type of $$$ I previously spent.  Technology is changing so rapidly, that this is a better picture than I was on my much more expensive tv...I highly recommend this tv...

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Jeremy G.
Reviews.Content: Purchased this television for our living room and it is the prefect size.  The thin edge profile looks great and it is super light weight.  My only complaint is it has some back lighting inconsistency.  While displaying a black screen there are some noticeable lighter bands - again only apparent on really dark scenes or black menu screens.  After some research, I found that this seems to be a common problem for edge lit LED - something to consider.

Reviews.Title: Just Right!
Reviews.Author: bgbevan
Reviews.Content: This is my feedback on the Vizio E241i-A1. The "i" in the model means it is Internet capable and can be used for streaming.  Either wireless, or wired.  The E2410-A1(no "i") is the same TV but is not Internet capable.  You may as well spend the extra $10 and get the Internet version.  I needed a smaller TV for the Granddaughters bedroom but couldn't find the combination of features.  Had to have wireless Internet so they could stream Netflix from their bedroom.  Vizio seemed to be the only brand that offered this combination of features in a 24" format.  Out of the box time to get it going was about 5 mins, mostly spent on getting the wireless connected.  Crisp HD picture using just an antenna, very lightweight, and an attractive package.....I got the white so it's a little more "femmy" than black.  It even has a "Netflix" button on the remote so you can start streaming with a minimum of navigation.  Would definitely recommend for a 2nd room TV where you have limited room.  It accommodates the VESA standard if you want to mount it on a wall or some other stationary surface.  I have 3 Vizio TVs and have been very satisfied with the value and feature combinations.

Reviews.Title: Very thin.
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Callahan
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace another tv we were using as an outside viewing tv.  We have it mounted inside and view it through our window so we can sit on the deck and watch when the weather is nice..  Very thin and lightweight.  Works great for what we wanted.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: WC
Reviews.Content: This set has a very clear, colorful picture when connected to a PS3 or blu-ray player, (Comcast sux). It has a very useful, extensive, menu for picture, audio, and lots of other adjustments, which is nice for me as I like to tune things exactly to my preference. I wish it could have had at least 2 HDMI in ports, but I have solved this annoyance by getting a 3 in 1 out HDMI splitter. You can find them here on Amazon for between $5 and $15.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Jaxter333"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this Vision.  Great big picture for the price. Video and sound quality are better than I expected for $178!!

Reviews.Title: Newest TV for me
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: It seems to be fine, but will say although I printed the full instructions - they were not as simple as I hoped they would be.  But, now have figured everything out.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture. Great Size. Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Scriabinite
Reviews.Content: Fantastic looking television. Picture was beautiful upon arrival without any adjustments. I chose to turn off the automatic and ambient light dimming features, but other than that I have left the picture settings as is. On numerous other LED backlit televisions I have read reviews about how the colors were actually less saturated and the picture was generally less dim. Those fears were immediately put to rest when I turned this television on. Beautiful picture. Beautiful color. Fast reacting tuner. Above average built-in speakers.If you don't need 3D or Smart Features in a television, this is a fantastic purchase.

Reviews.Title: TV from vizio
Reviews.Author: robert m bielby
Reviews.Content: it works well and the picture is very clear.  opened right out of the box.  I have had other Vizio products before

Reviews.Title: Kids Love It
Reviews.Author: Belle
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and son-in-law and they are very happy with the television.  It was a good price and I bought it with 6 months no interest.  My son-in-law says it is not easy to hook the television up, but is pleased with the picture.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Debby
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my elderly Dad. Set up was easy and pairing it with his cable remote was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: This TV is perfect for my needs.
Reviews.Author: BobbyB
Reviews.Content: I was replacing an old 25" CRT TV; and I tried initially with a 32" Vizio model that I liked well enough in terms of it's function.  But after a couple of months, it was clear I hadn't gone large enough.  So I looked at all the 37" models around, but this 39" (actually 38.5") model met my needs better than any 37" models I could find, especially in terms of weight.The old 25" CRT sat in a furniture stand, with many shelves, over 7' tall; and I had already devised a means of mounting the 32" Vizio to that stand as if it were wall mounted.  This 39" uses the same mounting and finally gives me a picture usually at least as tall if not a little taller and that is often much taller than the old CRT used to give--this matters tremendously when you're trying to read something on screen.  It doesn't matter how wide the letters can be if they are not tall enough.Like all newer 16:9 aspect ratio TVs that have small, down-facing speakers, what it gains in sleekness and lightness it gives up in sound; but I knew that going in and got a 32" sound bar and subwoofer to use with it.  So, all-in-all, except for the predictable lightness in the sound characteristic of this genre of TV, this thing is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Spare bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Larry Arnold "LSU Tiger fan"
Reviews.Content: A recent free upgrade by Directv left us with a DVR in the spare bedroom, which is used a lot by our grankids.  Previously had a old 29 inch CRT set, so they had to plug in the DVD player, Directv receiver, or Roku to pick the one they wanted.  Bought this Vizio because of some good reviews and reasonable price.  The only problem I had was figuring out how to hook up the DVD player with 5 cable input.  Has two HDMI hookups for DVR and Roku but had to try several different ways to hook up the five-cable for the DVD.  This doesn't account for the missing star, I just figure there is room for a fifth star if you pay a lot more.  Some reviews said the sound wasn't too hot, but it's a lot better than the old 29 incher.  Anyway, the facory settings for the color weren't great, but there are several ways to get it better if you go to menu and work on it some.  Serves my purpose very well and the grandkids are delighted  with th upgrade. Also 1080 isn't necessary for this size set so don't figure it would be worth the increase in price.

Reviews.Title: Sharp picture with wide viewing angles. Ideal for kitchen viewing
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: Sharp picture with wide viewing angles. Ideal for kitchen viewing. I used VideoSecu Swing Arm TV Wall Mount for an in cabinet mount.

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV
Reviews.Author: Jen "Jen"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband's exercise room so we did not want too large of a TV due to space limitations. We have several other VIZIO TVs and like the brand. This TV was easy to mount to the wall and fit the space. Just as important, the picture is very nice. It is perfect for what we needed.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: nforce4max
Reviews.Content: Good image and plenty of features except for s-video for older devices. Anyone who is looking to get this needs to keep this in mind that these Vizio TVs are very fragile. In my class we just got these for our HTI course and one was already cracked while setting it up for the wall mount. Another started showing dead pixels when putting it up on the wall that would come and go when setting it into place.Overall it is built worse than the box that it comes in, oh not to forget there is some very light coil squeal coming from the back so the insides are not made very well. Expect to be replacing capacitors in a few years...

Reviews.Title: VIZIO Rocks!
Reviews.Author: Stephen K. Arnaud
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best TVs I've ever purchased. Perfect for the guest room. Great picture. Great value. Delivered in 36 hours!

Reviews.Title: Decent TV
Reviews.Author: A. Hastings
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for our bedroom, mainly because of good luck I have had with Vizio TV's in the past and because of the price, which can not be beat.  I like the slim profile and the ease of mounting.  I also like the fact that all the inputs are in a position so you see no wires when hung on the wall.  At times though, the picture seems kind of dim and when I brighten it, it tends to get grainy.  If this were my primary TV I would be more concerned, but for the price and the fact that it is on only about 20 minutes before going to sleep at night I think it is a decent set.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: naikai
Reviews.Content: After searching through varies TVs around the size of 50 inches, I ended up with this amazing TV. The picture is super clear and the sound system works much better than I expected. Our friends were all very surprised about the quality of this TV and I would highly recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Great sound and picture
Reviews.Author: Susan E. Tisinger "SuzyQ"
Reviews.Content: Crisp clear picture, awesome colors, especially the blues! We love it so far! Stereo sound is pretty good, too. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV.
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: The color is beautiful. The sound is better than I expected. This is my first Vizio TV and I would buy another.

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous TV
Reviews.Author: Coco Tipico
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly. Definitely worth the price. Its sleek, lightweight, and matches my apartment perfectly. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great image for an inexpensive television
Reviews.Author: Randy E. Blue
Reviews.Content: This is not an appropriate choice as a main television for a hardcore videophile with tons of "boxes" to attach. There are only two HDMI ports. It is however an excellent choice for a bedroom or den television. The picture is amazing when connected to an HD source. Be warned that you should only use the latest HDMI cables. I had problems hooking the television to my Directv receiver using cables that had previously worked just fine with another HD television. After much frustration, I purchased new HDMI cables and all problems solved. The other cables still work fine with the other HDMI television. While I am not a technical viewer of the image, I do recognize true colors and a proper balance between shadow and highlight detail, and this television offers both. You will need to tweak it to meet your particular preferences and viewing conditions, but the setup menu is extensive enough to satisfy most any user's preferences. This thin bezel also adds to the impressive appearance of the television when it is off, and makes the image seem even larger when viewing the television.There is one small negative, and that is the fact that the television has a lag time when you first turn it on. There are a few seconds of viewing the Vizio logo, while the television recognizes the source it is connected to and displays it in the upper right edge. The delay is very annoying if you're used to the typical instant-on of other brands, especially if you're trying to catch that breaking story on the news. I hesitated on whether to ding the television a star for that feature, but finally decided to be charitable and not do so. Trust me though, it can be annoying.

Reviews.Title: Visio 29"
Reviews.Author: gto
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tv for the price. It performs as expected and is (I believe) one of few tv's with speakers facing the front of the set, like they should! It has very good sound and is capable of very loud volume. I am very pleased with this product and would purchase another one in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Janet M. Brown
Reviews.Content: Picture is great and perfect size for the room we have it in. This makes three Vizio televisions we have purchased.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Cammie L. Laird
Reviews.Content: This LED HDTV was reasonably priced and works perfectly in my granddaughter's bedroom.  The picture is sharp and clear and we have had no problems with it in the month or so that we have had it.  I also purchased an extended warranty with it, which I usually do for most electronics and appliances.

Reviews.Title: Broke in Less Than One Year
Reviews.Author: Bruce S.
Reviews.Content: This TV stopped working and Vizio customer support was no help, whatsoever.  In fact, they told me I should have bought it at Walmart instead of Amazon because I would have had better options to get it repaired under warranty if I had bought it from Walmart.  Vizio wanted me to pay for UPS shipping to them in California so they could fix it -- that would have been about $60.00.  Instead of paying that much to get a $200 TV fixed, I tossed it in the trash.  They have no authorized service people other than in California, so if you have a problem with your Vizio, be prepared to pay for it while it is under warranty.  No more Vizio for me.

Reviews.Title: Unreliable TV and terrible warranty service
Reviews.Author: R. Gould
Reviews.Content: This product stopped working after 6 months and it was a nightmare to get VIZIO to honor its 1-year warranty. The worst customer service experience I ever had. I would never buy a VIZIO product again.

Reviews.Title: E390i-A1 39" has audio issues, great screen
Reviews.Author: John Alderson "icemoose"
Reviews.Content: This review is specifically for the Vizio model E390i-A1 39" widescreen 1080p LCD television. I used the 1080i, 720p, and 480i/p modes W/HDMI & Component inputs. The screen render is spectacular. However, we don't have a particularly bright living room when the sun is shining in, if you do this unit may not be bright enough for you - such as many large windows facing south in your viewing room. We found it just bright enough to be totally pleased with the display.The sound was lacking, did not have much low-end frequency, and not very loud either - I'm not usually satisfied with most stock TV speakers anyway. Mounting it against a solid wall might improve it, IDK. When we had loud fan(s) running (in the summer) we had to turn it up nearly all the way to hear the words. It also has a distortion (resonance) at a particular frequency when turned up >60%, and it only affects a few actor's voices, but they are noticeably distorted at that point - I didn't try filtering out the frequency with the included 5-band graphic equalizer that only works when you turn OFF "SRS studioSound HD." Now if you live in a quiet environment, or if you watch the TV at low volumes that other people can't hear, that wouldn't be a problem to you. And my hearing is excellent - all frequencies - as my hearing test results prove.But if you need to overcome city noises, child noises, fan noises, air conditioning noise, etc. you will be disappointed with the sound as I was. I bought an auto-shutoff amplifier and hooked it up to our excellent home stereo speakers and now the sound is excellent, shakes the house. If you are using a home theater surround sound system, and if you are not using this unit just as a monitor (in which case sound doesn't matter) you are probably not considering this unit anyway. It is worth noting that the RCA stereo outputs go dead when you turn the E390i-A1 off, so an auto-shutoff amplifier works great with that - but the E390i-A1 volume control only affects the RCA stereo output levels when you have all the sound menu settings set just right, and some other settings make it too quiet to use in less than quiet rooms.It's too bad that the sound is lacking, because this has an excellent display. I have been watching NFL football on it and the clarity of detail on the field is phenomenal, and beautiful colors that seem to be right on target with the hue. Also the viewing angles are great, the colors don't wash out much until you reach a very tight angle (like approx. 30-40* from parallel to surface). The stand tilted the screen upward just slightly, like only about 1 degrees, there is no adjustment.One (other) caveat: I did have trouble at first with the display brightness dimming and brightening noticeably with no apparent reason, until I turned off "smart dimming" in the options. At first I thought my model did not have that option in the menu, until I noticed the "more" option in the onscreen menu under "picture" (it's in the manual too). As others have said on the reviews I had to turn this off, as the picture brightness was changing regardless of the steady room lighting state. This is also the only way to achieve the maximum LED backlight brightness, which I set to 100%, seemed just a tiny bit dark before at the default 95%.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic LED TV
Reviews.Author: Topher
Reviews.Content: I've never had an LED TV till now. I've only bought plasma. Plasma is STILL superior to LCD/LED when it comes to sports and dark shading. However, I was looking for a TV for the bedroom and couldn't find the size of TV I wanted in a plasma. This Vizio has worked well. The picture is great, the sound is so-so. I added a subwoofer, so it didn't matter. The only thing i found that didn't work well was the auto dimming feature for the brightness. I turned it off, so no big deal.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wanted a TV for our bedroom that didn't cost a ton of money. We watch TV when we go to bed at night and this sits securely atop our dresser. It is lightweight and easy to clean under and around it. Colors and HD channels look great. It was so easy to program that I didn't even need to read the manual that came with it. It took all of ten minutes to physically set it up on the stand and begin watching our cable channels. Don't have a single negative thing to say about it, although I am not that persnickety about the technicalities of TV. I just want easy on, easy channel selection along with a great picture and easy off -- and that's exactly what I got.

Reviews.Title: Not great but for what I paid for it, not bad.
Reviews.Author: Ken Neuhoff
Reviews.Content: I was hoping for a little better picture quality but I guess for $379 you get what you pay for.  I read a lot of reviews that gave this TV high marks but you have to keep the ratings in perspective of the level of expectation when you are buying a low cost TV.  My main complaint is the color and black level of the picture.  The blacks are poorly defined and difficult to see contrast between different black levels.  Color is bland and even after trying to manually adjust them I was not that pleased.  Keep in mind that I am used to the picture quality of a $1,200 Samsung TV so it really isn't a fair comparison.  Overall not a bad TV for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: Bill Horne
Reviews.Content: I had a 17 year old TV 27 inch CRT TV in a very tight space. I thought I would have to settle on a 26 inch wide set which would be real short top to bottom.  Then I ran across this 29 inch HDTV VIZIO which does a great job and nicely fills the space. It has a nice picture and I've added a couple of unused computer speakers to help the sound. Works just great for me.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: T. M. Styer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this set by mistake. I thought I was getting the model with internet connection to watch netflix, amazon etc. However I kept this set and am very pleased with the quality. The picture is excellent and has many choices for settings. I like how the pictures adjusts for room lighting. One issue I have is that I wish the speakers could be somewhere on the front of the set. They are on the back considering there is hardly any border on the front. The picture literally takes up the whole front of the set save about 1/2 inch border. I would buy another one of this set for another room.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Cindy Mizelle
Reviews.Content: Great picture easy setup works well with multiple devices.  Have it connected to yamaha receiver with DVD,  VCR , cable and xbox.  Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Dr. Jeffrey Moskovic, JD "denlawfire"
Reviews.Content: I have it hooked up to outdoor antenna, so I don't have a lot of channel choices (unless I learn Korean). The picture is fine, but I found out that it can be used as a computer monitor which is an interesting idea...

Reviews.Title: Vizio 29" TV
Reviews.Author: Deanna E. French
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV because it was the right size to fit the space I needed it for.  I love the picture quality but there are some things I would change about it.  For example, I had difficulty fitting the stand to the back of the TV and even had to call the VIZIO tech people for help with this.  It seems you have to really get rough with it to get it into place.  I was afraid of breaking the plastic to do this.  I also don't like the way the stand makes the TV slant backwards.  I think it needs some sort of adjusting capability.  Then, there is the issue of only being able to use a little more than half the screen if you are trying to watch a show that is not HD.  In other words, my 29" TV is about a 20" TV most of the time.  Hope this helps someone in deciding whether of not to purchase this product.

Reviews.Title: Stand tilts the tv
Reviews.Author: HillbillyGirl
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this TV, with the exception of the design of the stand. When I was setting up the TV, the unusual stand appeared to be a great idea. However, when I turned the television on, there was a glare on the screen from the overhead lighting in the room. The only way to avoid that glare is to set the TV upright in the usual 90 degree position, or turn off the lights. But with the stand, it is impossible to safely set the TV upright.Great television-- but the stand is poorly designed.

Reviews.Title: This brand has something others do not
Reviews.Author: Pat H.
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to someone with just a very old tv and they love love love it. I chose it because most other TVs have the sound coming out the back...... Like all mine and require a sound bar or a sound system... and this brand has the sound coming out the front..... Good for older people and where space and simplicity is an issue

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value For Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: John Powers "John in BA"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of comparing on the $250, 32 inch LED TVs and decided this was the best value for me.  Like any $250 TV, it is the mid/low end of product line, but Vizio seems to have a good reputation on this market.  Before I purchased, I called technical support to see how the response time was and was speaking to a person in about 2 minutes. (I always do that to make sure the support is there if I have a problem)  Also visited some stores that carry Vizio and talked with Returns people to get an idea of how many Vizio returns they have.  In both stores I visited returns were very low.I replaced an older, smaller Samsung 720p with the 320-A1 and have been very happy so far.  The small footprint fit nicely in my armoire.  Took about 5 minutes put on the stand, plug in the cable coax, and get it turned on.  I have Cox cable and put this in the bedroom without a cable box.  After the channel scan, I got the lower basic cable channels as well as the HD locals.  There were several local channels I didn't want so I set them up to skip those channels in the Tuner setup.  Like any HDTV, the picture in standard broadcast is okay but the picture is 4:3 so it is smaller unless you select wide or panorama mode which will distort the picture some.  Select the HD channels and you will find the picture quality was very good.  I have a DVD player (not Blueray) and Roku connected to the two HDMI ports the picture quality was again very good.  The sound quality is okay. I use the Logitech Harmony 650 Remote which works great with a little programming.

Reviews.Title: Not the best of quality
Reviews.Author: suanne delia
Reviews.Content: Picture is very good, however the sound isn't the best quality and the tv sound keeps muting off. The only way to restore the sound is to turn the tv off then back on again. I have contacted Vizio directly to try to solve the issue, but they said they really can't fix it. My opinion stay away from this model and try something else.

Reviews.Title: Worst Customer Service Ever
Reviews.Author: silver
Reviews.Content: VIZIO E320-A1 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTVI purchased this TV in December.The TV lost color and is now black and white.I wasn't too happy about it but it is on warranty so I figured I could ship it to VIZIO and they would repair or replace it ,WRONG. I have sent them pictures, spent almost an hour on the phone "trouble shooting" have sent numerious emails,phone calls etc. and now they are sending a service person to my home to repair it. They were supposed to be in contact with me within 3 to 5 days and they haven't.I'm not too happy about having someone I don't know in my house and VIZIO could not tell be if I would have to take time off from work to fit into thier schedule.I honestly believe they make this process so difficult you will give up. Bottom line VIZIO has the worst customer service of any company I have ever delt with. I would't buy another product from this company at half price.

Reviews.Title: RUN...Love VIZIO but this has production flaw...read reviews
Reviews.Author: Kaitlyn "Futureparadox"
Reviews.Content: Loved the TV.  The picture was great and the menus and adjustability worked well.  However, the sound kept cutting out or rising and lowering unexpectedly.  It took 2 weeks to pin down that it was actually the TV, not the new cable box, the new HDMI cables or the new computer.  Amazon.com and VIZIO stood behind it 100% and the replacement came overnight.  Unfortunately it doesn't work either!  Same sound issues as the first one, only worse.  I went back and read newer reviews posted after I bought mine and lots of folks had to return them for the exact same problem.  Yikes.  I have chosen not to get a 3rd replacement.  Post office here I come:>)

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture quality, even lighting.
Reviews.Author: LaVidaNass
Reviews.Content: The picture is as good as it can be for 1080. The LED provides very balanced lighting, good color and contrast. Much better than florescent lit TV's, lighter in weight and cooler in heat, unlike my last Vizio. 2 hdmi, D-audio, usb (for jpegs) and component are more than adequate connectivity, and the two 10w speakers seem to produce a very decent sound. Given this is not a smart tv, my primary concern was the the picture quality, but I did hold back a star for the limited menu functions and cheap remote. At the very least, it could have had picture freeze and an LED back light :) Overall, this is currently the best 42" picture choice for under $500. (Paid $448. on Amazon).

Reviews.Title: 14 Months and Broken
Reviews.Author: Falcon One
Reviews.Content: This TV is 14 months old and out of 12 month warranty.  Will not power on even after trying Vizio's reboot suggestion.  They say I can call a repair company, butI can probably get a new TV for another hundred.  I didn't buy the extended waranty bc I figured a $448 TV would last more than a year.  What a joke!

Reviews.Title: Huge improvement over what I had
Reviews.Author: videobruce
Reviews.Content: Replacing a 2008 Samsung 32" LCD display, this literally blows that set away. It exceeded my expectations.(Note; this is the non "i" version w/o the third HDMI input, Internet access & the mostly useless 120Hz processing for around $100 more)Pros,1. Very good video quality, decent blacks (direct viewing),2. Analog audio out for small amps to power external speakers,3. Optical out,3. Thin bezel,4. No unneeded bells & whistles (so called Internet applications),4. Decent menu layout, easy to access without jumping through hoops,5. Direct backlighting, no flashlighting,6. Separate video settings for each input,7. Low power consumption and little heat generation,8. Sturdy stand,9. Lightweight,10. Lastly; US support in English!Cons,1. Only two HDMI inputs and one combined composite/component input (this is a huge problem with just about all TV's now due to cost cutting),2. Contrast drop off and black level increases when viewing off axis, but no different than most other LCD displays except IPS panels,3. Side mounted controls on set hard to see and/or feel (yes I do actually walk up to something to turn it on or off without using the remote),4. Some dirty screen (clouding) effect. On white scenes (snow, hockey etc) there are some slightly darker 'patches' due to mild uneven backlighting though you have to look for it.Contrast ratio on all LCD's falls off from center. I've seen worse, but improvements over the past 5 years make it more livable. The 'pop' goes away off axis due to the black level increasing, washing out the video (depending on how far one goes off axis). Many times you don't notice it, it depends on the program material and room lighting.Would I buy this again and recommend it to others, Surely. Vizio has come a long way.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Debbie Hill
Reviews.Content: We have owned several Vizio tv's and are always pleased with the clarity of the picture and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: 24 " tv vizio tv. love it
Reviews.Author: Susan Kiefer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv to replace an older tv .  When I found it was made in usa I knew it was the one.  At first the color picture seemed to green.  I only used for 10 days I was ready to send it back.  On of my very favorite channels didnt have any sound.  I was getting frustrated, I only had had for a few days a few days to decide if I was going to keep it or send it back.  My son said the problem was the cable box.  I didnt  think that  could cause one station to not work.  But Iwent to the cable comcast and signed up for hd and high speed intern  The tv is now preforming wonderfully  I am so happy I purchased it.  I love all the smart features for my  tv. I would recommend This tv to my friends

Reviews.Title: Great addition to my patio!
Reviews.Author: M. Moore
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small TV to put outside that was inexpensive (so that if weather damages it the replacement cost would not be a concern).  This Vizio (my third) has fairly decent loudness and clarity of sound, a bright enough picture to be easily visible outside, and surprisingly it has a great assortment of adjustments for customization.  All in all, a good solution for me and the price was right!

Reviews.Title: Good picture, Not so good sound.
Reviews.Author: Walter Seely
Reviews.Content: Picture and ease of operation was good. The sound quality and volume not so good. Sounds kinda tin can like. I purchased this for our camper for use on those rainy days. So it will due.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Ronald E. Gamble
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality and very easy to set up. Sound could be a little better though. Over all pleased with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with the TV
Reviews.Author: Anita
Reviews.Content: This is the second time we have purchased this TV.  We purchased it again because our home was hit by lightning and destroyed the first TV.  Very pleased with the TV and would recommend it if a person is looking for this size TV.  Price was good and Amazon always delivers as promised.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the exercise room
Reviews.Author: Patricia F.
Reviews.Content: Small but powerful.  Easy to use, despite being full featured.  Crisp picture.  Set up was no problem and the packaging was appropriate, sufficient for the task but not over the top!

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: James E Farrell
Reviews.Content: Great TV, only one problem I had was the HDMI ports are in tough spots put into TV. Other then that Everything was fine!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great little tv.
Reviews.Author: Marigould
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for our bedroom and so far have no complaints.  It is exactly what I wanted in a smaller tv!

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: BooBrown
Reviews.Content: I got this TV to replace a tube TV my kids were using. This TV has a better picture than the TV in our living room, albeit smaller. The controls are easy to use, and the kids enjoy watching their shows on it.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This TV is well worth the price. Great resolution, picture. Easy to use menu. Quick shipping. Overall it is just a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E241
Reviews.Author: PUM "SD"
Reviews.Content: The color and clarity is extremely good. The only thing I think they could make better is the "stand". I'm using this as a second PC monitor (via HDMI input), the "stand" is a joke, it doesn't stay in the grooves and has the set sitting on the desk (it isn't raised at all). When in front of the keyboard, it appears very low compared to most that are raised a couple of inches.

Reviews.Title: Worked Great for 14 months and Died
Reviews.Author: Craig L.
Reviews.Content: Spectacular picture (after much adjusting).  TV ran great for 14 months and then just died (2 months after warranty expired).  Very disappointed.  Would buy this TV again if I knew it would last, but will probably switch to another brand.

Reviews.Title: Great for Price
Reviews.Author: Crystal Hayes
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV almost a year and it is still going strong.  This is in a small bedroom so sound and picture quality are great.

Reviews.Title: Issue with component and av connection
Reviews.Author: Orlando J. Alaniz
Reviews.Content: When I connected my dvd player using the cables, it worked fine the first time. The next time I used my dvd player, I only got a black and white picture. This was resolved by using an HDMI cable connection instead. When I attempted to use an AV cable to connect my laptop to the TV, the connection didn't work, although it does work with an HDMI cable. There are only two HDMI ports and so I now only connect my Roku and dvd player to the TV. Otherwise, the sound and picture quality are awesome.

Reviews.Title: My vizio
Reviews.Author: sally friedlander
Reviews.Content: It was delivered on time, the set up was easy and I love the picture and size .It works great for the bedroom, which is where I wanted to place it. Thank you: Sally

Reviews.Title: Beyond my expectations
Reviews.Author: dbeshplace "hdaddikt"
Reviews.Content: This set with taxes, and a 3 year add on warranty was still well under $300. Almost half what we paid for our 5 year old 32" Samsung.And this has even a better picture. I used a calibration disk to set it up. The menu gives you the option of setting it for Store mode, or Home mode. I set for Home mode, turned OFF any enhancements.. well, made sure they are OFF, as that is how it came.After the calibration the changes I made were not far off from how it was set at the factory.This is our bedroom TV, so I was not too fussy about the set's performance, but let me say it performs very well indeed. For the price I really can't find anything wrong with it. I noticed the caption option appeared grayed out on the menu. I don't need them, but I thought that was unusual.Delivery was timely, and it was freshly packaged from the factory. I also noticed no matter what signal I put in it say '1080' and it show in the description it is 720p. Maybe when they recondition these they put in 1080p panels and circuitry, then may not make any more 720 panels. And in any case, it is highly recommended. Look at my other reviews, I don't give out 5 stars very often.

Reviews.Title: Plastic Stick or TV Stand
Reviews.Author: Bruce Whitehead
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for the money. Very light weight. Easy seup. Good Picture.My only objection is the stand. It is an afterthought... " oh gee guys we forgot the stand... get a plastic stick and attached to the back... done and done.". Flemsy, cheap, and the screws keep falling out. Personally, I would prefer the plastic stick.Other than that its a good value.

Reviews.Title: Speakers could be better
Reviews.Author: Nicole Meadows
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for a couple months now in my bedroom.  The problem is, I can't seem to hear it!  If I turn the volume up to a level where I can hear the conversation on screen the background noise is too loud.  I have no idea how to fix that issue or if it is something that can be fixed.

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: EBERHARD HABEL
Reviews.Content: The control is too touchy.  Ether it adds a number that I did not put in, or it leaves one out.  Sometimes the channel that comes up in nowhere near what I put in.

Reviews.Title: T.V.
Reviews.Author: robyn dortch
Reviews.Content: IT'S A GOOD T.V., BUT I FOUND IT CHEAPER AT OTHER STORES . SHOP AROUND BEFORE YOU BUY IT. IF YOU ARE UNABLE TO SHOP AROUND, , FIND A FRIEND TO DO SO FOR YOU.

Reviews.Title: check your shipment
Reviews.Author: gesiel
Reviews.Content: The vizio was a nice buy unfortunate for me after it was delivered i had set up everything to find out the company pinnacle didnt send me the batteries that was suppose to come with the tv. So i went out to buy the triple A batteries other than that its worth the buy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: My only real complaint about the TV would be the color settings take a long time to get right.  I must have tried to fiddle with the settings everytime I turned it on for a few days after opening it up.  Black doesn't look the best, and has a lot of artifacting.  The sound is pretty poor but it's not too quiet thankfully.  Other than those mild complaints I am enjoying this Vizio and would recommend it for a bedroom tv.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Robert John Boyle
Reviews.Content: This is a fine TV. A good clear picture right out of the box. The delivery was as advertised; I placed the order at around 10pm and two days later at 2pm it was in use in our living room. That's Great service...

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money, but...
Reviews.Author: Evan Samaritano "Zayphar"
Reviews.Content: This is an inexpensive TV that has a great picture and excellent features. A great value.Unfortunately, it came missing three vital screws needed to affix it to the base stand. Had to go to the hardware store and 3 sets of screws, washers and lock-nuts to replace them. Total cost about $3 and 45 min of my valuable time.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working at 4 months of use..
Reviews.Author: Ruben
Reviews.Content: this item was very good for the price.. so i got to say i was very happy when i bought it.. but its been 4 months and the tv just stopped working.. it doesn't turn on.. i tried to send it to a place to repair it they said  its something inside the electric system i have no idea.. anyways... it was just a waste of money...

Reviews.Title: Great TV. Bright and Clear
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: First of all I am not some TV guru who is constantly looking for milliseconds and Hz, and rates and stuff. I know these affect the performance with high speed images/scenes on screen, but in regards to this product it works great and the picture is always clear and bright. I'm 26 with 20/20 vision and not some old geezer with bifocals coming from a projection tv with rabbit ears to this and being blown away by its clarity. Whites are very white, and blacks are dark and deep. No distortion in any type of scenario as of now. This is what I look for when buying a TV. So if this TV is in your budget, I would highly consider it. The size is also great, thin and lightweight. So far I have not experienced any issues, but if I do, I will update this review.

Reviews.Title: A DUD!
Reviews.Author: belal ayoubi
Reviews.Content: I bought this flat screen TV more than a year ago and it started to not turn on sometimes and I would have to completely unplug it so that it could reset and then it would turn on.  Now it completely died.  Does not turn on at all and all I get is a LED light that goes on at the front and that's it......Will never buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: merle asido
Reviews.Content: It was cheaper compared to other brands like LG or Samsung. Have had it for a month works great. Good deal over all

Reviews.Title: very sharp picture.
Reviews.Author: Russell B.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 24" Vizio because I have a larger one in the living room and have been very happy with it. Both are 1080p. The slim design and light weight are perfect for the bedroom. The only thing I added was a an articulated wall mount, as the stand provided by Vizio tips the TV back a few degrees, which I didn't care for (wrong viewing angle from the bed). I would have preferred a higher contrast ratio ( I believe this is 10,000:1) but the picture is so good, this is really picking nits. While I'm being nit picky, I'll mention one other thing:  I find the sound a little bit on the "boxy" side. Its OK, but not great. With that said, I'm a bit of a sound snob, so others may find the sound perfectly OK.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: lily
Reviews.Content: We love the Vizio 32" tv.  We put it in our bedroom.  The picture is beautiful and the sound is very good. It was a breeze to set up.  We researched tv's for a couple of months before deciding on this Vizio and we made the right choice.  The price was terrific with Prime....we saved even more.  Amazon delivery was very fast, we received it within the 2 days promised.  Absolutely no complaints, would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: thanks amazon best seller and fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Joseph Feliciano
Reviews.Content: Really Good product, great image, great sound and the best is the price... recommend it at any time. would buy another

Reviews.Title: Order turned out okay second time around!
Reviews.Author: william j. parris
Reviews.Content: I chose this television because it got good reviews for the money. However, when received I should have been suspicious, as it was obvious it had been repackaged. When installed and connected to my satelite feed, the top two thirds of the screen were scrambled (bottom third was fine!). After consultation with VIZIO I decided to return the set and request a replacement. The replacement connected with no trouble and has worked fine. This is the first time I have ordered major electronics via AMAZON. Think in future I may prefer to purchase at a store, where I can inspect packaging before receipt.

Reviews.Title: favorite
Reviews.Author: Reese
Reviews.Content: Vizio has always been a favorite tv - I have ordered two of them.  They ship in perfect condition and have beautiful color.

Reviews.Title: As a monitor, Yes, as a TV, no.
Reviews.Author: Donna Crow
Reviews.Content: If you are close up to this and right in the center, it is great, which makes it a good candidate for a monitor.If you are back a bit, or off to one side or the other, as you might be when watching TV, then this is terrible.You lose clarity rather fast. The picture begins too look like you are looking through a cloud. I sent it back.If I needed a great monitor, I would have kept it, but I was looking for a TV, and so it didn't work for me.

Reviews.Title: Pretty amazing TV
Reviews.Author: DarianC
Reviews.Content: This Tv is pretty awesome. I have had several brands of TV's, but Vizio is by far my favorite brand of TV. The picture quality is great and the blacks are pretty sharp. I like the fact that it is full HD. I've had great experiences with it and the others that have.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Theatre Chick
Reviews.Content: This is a decent TV at a good price.  It was easy to set-up, and it is perfectly serviceable for our work-out room.  That said, it is nothing fancy, and I am not crazy about the tilted stand.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price.
Reviews.Author: Ashley M Heaton
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my office and it's perfect. It's the perfect size and the volume is perfect for a small room.I would think this would be a great small bedroom TV or even kitchen TV if you have the room.I have had no issues with it after a few months and would definitely buy it again.The picture isn't as good as my 55 inch TV in our living room, but it is better than what I need for my office.

Reviews.Title: Great BUDGET TV, but not really "smart".
Reviews.Author: Kelsey
Reviews.Content: Pretty pleased with this TV - the only thing is it's not much of a smart TV.  I think the only thing that classifies it as a "smart TV" is that it has a USB port...but the USB port only shows pictures - not videos which is kinda bummer.  There are no apps on the TV (which i kinda bought it for that reason, but that's my fault for not reading the description) - but I bought a Wireless Blu Ray player to compensate for that.  So if you want a beautiful budget tv and wants apps and don't mind getting a wireless Blu Ray player, Roku, etc., (you might even be spending less than getting a legit Smart Tv), this tv is for you.  The picture is beautiful and the TV is sleek... so i'm pretty pleased.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Ronald G. Wilson
Reviews.Content: This TV has far exceeded my expectations/ The picture and sound are great. I was easy to setup and lightweightenough to handle easily. I'm a 77 y/o that doesn't understand a lot of the modern electronics but this TV was no challenge evenfor me. I would buy another one in a heartbeae!

Reviews.Title: tv for grandaughter
Reviews.Author: Sheryl R Fillmon
