Reviews.Content: Bought for my granddaughter. It is stationed on her bedroom wall. It is small, but she has a small room and shes only 5 yrs old. She loves it! got it for her Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a awesome price
Reviews.Author: Laura88
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv with a swiveling wall mount for our bar. I works great and after putting the cable in and letting it do it's scan thing, we were watching tv in less than 5 minutes. Very easy to mount to a wall if you choose.

Reviews.Title: I like this TV
Reviews.Author: John Boy
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV about 1 1/2 months ago. Another good experience buying from Amazon. Good price, super delivery.The TV was packaged well and the base assembled easily.I changed the display settings a number of times before I got the picture to look the way I wanted.It has a very nice picture with the settings I selected.I am happy with it so far.

Reviews.Title: Ehhh... ok 2nd/3rd TV
Reviews.Author: Evan Deerfield
Reviews.Content: (I did not buy this from Amazon, but do own it)It isn't bad as a kitchen/guestroom/kids TV, the colors are bright but the panel isn't anything special - narrow viewing angle, weak tinny speakers, some motion smear. Very mediocre performance with a Chromecast dongle (initial screen redraw crawls, displays "apps" ok). Only 1 digital input (HDMI) but supports the ANCIENT VGA standard for an even blurrier analog connection than you can imagine - my Windows7 box will not recognize it as 1080p will only connect at 1050 everything is very soft and geometry is slightly off, have not tried an HDMI connection since that's not how I want to use it. The mediocre panel and 60hz refresh render this unusable as a day to day computer monitor (when sitting up close the color changes based on the part of the screen you're looking at, though it would be ok for very casual use maybe as a short use kiosk display. PS: DO NOT LOSE THE REMOTE! There's just one button on the TV: power on/off (long press to change input) Can't use it at all without the remote.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Much Agape
Reviews.Content: I had this TV for some time now . The picture quality is wonderful. The sound quality is awesome. The only thing that could be imroved is the size of the remote. Its to small.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Quackers "Quackers"
Reviews.Content: The sound gets out of synch with the video after many hours, but it can be remedied by turning off and then back on.  The price is worth the slight inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: Screen goes dim, remote doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Nonanon
Reviews.Content: Very disappointing purchase, which will go back.  The first remote didn't work, I went through all the machinations with the customer service person to try to make it work, nothing.  They sent a new one which arrived in a few days but it only worked partly - volume wouldn't go up or down but stayed stuck at 16, wouldn't change channels.  Tried it on another Vizio TV I have and it worked halfway - changed channels most of the time but the volume works only occasionally.  Worst of all, the screen dims during a DVD or Roku screening, lightens, dims and drives people crazy.  My other Vizio TV works well with everything, has a great picture and has been reliable for two years.  This model, however, doesn't compare well.

Reviews.Title: Too Good To Be True!
Reviews.Author: Lester
Reviews.Content: First- Listed as new, didn't come in product box, was repacked in plain brown box. Had a white scuff mark on front of speaker grill. Tried 3 different HDMI cables and still displayed "No Signal". Switched to component cables, color was half way between black & white and color, last of all, no audio. Maybe it didn't like my LG blue ray player. Will be returning for refund.

Reviews.Title: great picture weak audio
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is amazing! Would recommend for two price. The audio is on the weak side but with a surround sound you don't need it.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Nancy Corbin
Reviews.Content: I've only had this TV since 17 Jan.  Only thing I've noticed that concerns me is that the sound is not very stable.  It fluctuates up and down.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase at this price point
Reviews.Author: S. Justice
Reviews.Content: Lightning killed 2 of my HD TV's in one night, on storm, and we were quite upset about it.  Didn't have the same amount of money to spend on replacing them so we had to move down from the 55 inch range to the 32 inch range.You can't really tell the difference in 720p versus 1080p unless you have two TV's sitting right beside each other.  You really only need 1080p if you DO use a bluray player to watch movies.  Most programs on tv, Netflix, and other streaming services are 720p resolution.If you haven't heard, do NOT buy a tv with Netflix/roku/whatever streaming built into the tv.  You will be sorry.  NO, THIS TV DOES NOT HAVE THAT FEATURE, I just wanted to warn people...  Buy this tv at this inexpensive price range and you'll love it.The speakers are pretty good in the tv, sometimes you get a nice looking tv cheap but it has terrible sound, this one sounds pretty good without a stereo attached to it.For the money, the quality picture, and decent sound from built in speakers, this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Five star TV, great value
Reviews.Author: Paul Harris
Reviews.Content: Great TV, great value. I read reviews saying it has crappy sound, but get real, it has an audio out port that i plug into my speakers, so its great!  I emailed the manufacturer before i bought it to confirm its operating temperature limits and was proudly told the unit could withstand temps of -5 to 120 degrees farenheit (with recommended 30 to 95) so I just dialed down the temp in my infrared sauna (NO humidity!!!) to 115 degrees to be sure I am within limits. This sweet little TV is hooked up to an Xbox 360(outside the sauna!) with an hdmi cable, and i live in virtual reality while sweating off the pounds.  Absolutely perfect set up and the TV is perfect.

Reviews.Title: This TV is worth its bucks.
Reviews.Author: Hai-tsang Huang
Reviews.Content: I wasn't really looking for a big-screen TV because I don't want to spend too much money on it. I just want a monitor so I can hook my PS3 onto for gaming and video streaming. The TV works fine, the visual quality is good, and I think it's worth its bucks.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after 5 weeks.
Reviews.Author: Holly Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I received this TV on Dec. 18, 2013, and it stopped working on Jan.25, 2014.  It worked fine through Jan. 24.Since it has no manual controls, I have no way of figuring out what the problem is.  Have replaced the batteries in the remote, which has had no effect on the problem.  Have changed the outlet it was plugged into, with no effect.  It just stopped working.How can I get a replacement, or my money back?  Please advise.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for second HDTV in bedroom
Reviews.Author: taverentech
Reviews.Content: The value of 39" versus the 42" made this size the right choice for me for my bedroom.  I had a 2007 37" Phillips that died (stupid TCOM board) and I needed a replacement HDTV.  Like any HDTV, you need to adjust the colors to get the best picture.  I'm not expecting perfect colors at this price.  I also needed a component input (so I could feed my cable box to this TV while using HDMI To my living room TV).  This had the digital fiber audio out for my receiver.  It had couple HDMI inputs.  It has an auto shutoff (very important in bedroom IMO).  I use this to watch netflix and amazon prime shows (I use a playstation3 so I didn't want to pay extra for those to be built into TV, prefer).So, for me, this was the perfect choice, the prime shipping, the $30 sale price, the specs, helped make the decision.  The only thing I miss was having a swivel base, but other than that, I really like this HDTV a lot.As fast as technology is changing, and with Ultra High Def coming, I didn't want to spend $600-$800 for high end HDTV.

Reviews.Title: 4 years and still great!!
Reviews.Author: Jesusislovejohn3:16
Reviews.Content: Had it about 4 years and it still is working great no problems! good picture and sound easy to move around I use it for my bedroom and tailgating

Reviews.Title: reviews for 24" vizio hd television
Reviews.Author: John L Goodwin
Reviews.Content: I cannot program At&t; remote, tried manuel and automatic vizio does not have a listing for at&t; ,have to use both remotes.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Barry R. Thornton
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Vizio flat screen, the quality and reliability are excellent.  I'm not completely happy with the sound quality on this particular model but, all else is very good.

Reviews.Title: Lots of TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Tech Guru "Josh Mon"
Reviews.Content: A lot of bang for your buck. Picture adjustments galore. The remote is the only disappointment. It's a bedroom tv and I use a Logitech harmony one so it's not a big issue.  The ATSC tuner pulls many channels from basic cable and channel changing is quick.  I recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Holly Bayendor
Reviews.Content: I had a slight issue setting up, and the Vizio help line was very prompt and very helpful.We light the tv very much.

Reviews.Title: Very good value
Reviews.Author: Gerad W. Arcuri "Press on Regardless"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents as their first HDTV. I own several HDTVs of competitive brands. Based on the excellent picture resolution and decent sound on this VIZIO, I would say that it is a good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommend
Reviews.Author: Steve Saulis
Reviews.Content: Price and quality are a winning pair. Everything and more than expected. Would put this unit on top of the list for both price and quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Patrick Garman
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace the 26" TV I've had since college.  The picture is great, though I agree with other reviews that you should turn off the light sensor for best picture.The setup was very easy, though it does require a screw driver to put together the base.  The base does tilt the screen backwards just a few degrees, though it is not really noticeable from a viewing standpoint.  I am not sure, but this might actually help with glare or reflections.When you turn on the TV for the first time, there is a very easy initial setup - choose your language, input source (cable vs. antenna).  We do not have cable, but this TV has a built in digital tuner that has worked very well so far.  It automatically scans for stations, which is convenient, but I have not found a way to manually add stations.  The automatic scan does not pick up the local PBS broadcast, and I have not been able to add it.We have a PS3 that connected easily and works great.  I planned to use the second HDMI port to connect my laptop computer to watch movies or HBO Go (which does not have an app for the PS3... get on that Sony!), but for some reason my laptop does not recognize this TV when connected via HDMI.  From what I can tell, this is not an issue with Vizio, but rather with the Intel HD Graphics 3000 driver for Windows 8.1.  Apparently the driver will recognize some HDTVs, but not others.  Intel is aware of the problem but tells me they have no plans to fix it.  Go customer service!On that note - We received 30 days free tech support from Amazon.  I called that number and the tech was very polite but was unable to correct the issue.  I have a second laptop made by Dell with a HDMI port which connects without an issue, so I will use that computer to watch online videos.This TV does not have the built in wifi capabilities and apps, but since we have the PS3, that is not an issue for us.So far we are very happy with the purchase.  If we have any issues in the future I will update this review.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv at a cheap price
Reviews.Author: Richard Pallmann
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv to replace a sony 20 inch tube tv, I find the picture outstanding and the sound more than acceptable.

Reviews.Title: 60 hz concern?
Reviews.Author: Palm
Reviews.Content: Hi all-I purchased this TV about 2 weeks ago now, so i can't really speak to the longevity of anything yet, but here are my initial comments.-Overall, I'm very impressed.  Set up was quick and easy, it was packaged well in the box and I didn't have any issues getting it going.-The picture quality is incredible.  I had my concerns when I was looking in stores at this model versus other brands.  Now that it's in my home, there isn't a chance I would take it back and pay even $100 more for a bigger brand name TV.-I watch a LOT of sports.  Everything I read online tells me to buy a 120 hz TV if I was going to be watching NFL and other high movement programs, but I decided to take a risk with this 60hz TV.  Love it.  I don't notice any blurriness and can't find any issues with the lower refresh rate.  If you have the same concern now, I encourage you to put it aside and just go with this TV.  I'm very particular with things, spent over 6 months shopping off and on for a TV.  Completely satisfied with this Vizio.-Sound quality?  Pretty standard for a TV.  I don't think it's anything special, but it's not terrible.It has a clean look as far as the design goes, the slimmer frame is quite nice.  Stand is a nice size.

Reviews.Title: Didn't even last 6 months
Reviews.Author: marshmallow
Reviews.Content: This was the 2nd Vizio we have bought, the first one, even though it is now over 3 years old, is still going strong. This one on the other hand, starting going out after just a couple months. It started with just a blue line at the edge of the screen, then turned to the screen turning half black whenever it felt like it, now the whole screen is a wonky mess half the time. IF we whack the crap out of it, it will usually come back on, but I'm pretty sure the end is near. When I contacted Amazon, they offered me half credit and I had to pay the shipping. Total ripoff, don't get this piece of poop

Reviews.Title: Great VIZIO TV.
Reviews.Author: David McCoy
Reviews.Content: This TV is just what I thought it would be and I am very happy with it. The picture is great and works good in my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Very good value
Reviews.Author: Engineer_JohnK
Reviews.Content: This is my second VIZIO TV,  as my kids were very happy with the picture quality of the first one I got them a year or so ago.  Overall, the video quality from DVD source through HDMI is very good.  The TV tuner was a lot more capable than I expected - I was pleasantly surprised it picked up all the nearby DVT stations (all major networks plus those pesky shopping channels), even though my place is in a deep valley and I was just using rabbit ears antenna!  Thus I give the tuner 5 big stars. The picture color is great; also in the 5 star category.  The sound is OK (3+ stars).  The only thing I did not really care for was the mount which is not adjustable and put the screen at a bit of an upward angle (3 stars).  Thus my overall rating is 4 stars, which is my book, is better than most when all things are considered.

Reviews.Title: Nice Solid Little TV
Reviews.Author: WL
Reviews.Content: Nice color and picture for a LED.  I prefer plasmas but they don't make any this size.  Remote and TV itself are very responsive.  Speakers in front and although it's not hifi sound, it's very clear.  This is my second Vizio.  My first one is still going strong after 4 years.  In summary, if you have to get a small TV the Vizio 24" is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Love this tv!!!
Reviews.Author: Jacob Nouel
Reviews.Content: Great tv, crisp and bright colors. The picture is cristal clear and the speakers are not that bad. Worth your money!!

Reviews.Title: Love my new Vizio tv!
Reviews.Author: Amy Ayers
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv with a beautiful picture. Very prompt service and at an excellent, very affordable price. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Bought for Mom to add to bedroom
Reviews.Author: buyers2
Reviews.Content: Super sharp and just right for placing at end of bed. She loves it and was able to set the scan and start using it that day.Great product.

Reviews.Title: Good bang for the bucks.
Reviews.Author: Ricky Nopants "Forest Ump"
Reviews.Content: The TV works perfect in our small room, but on some shows the people look "plasticized", unlike most programs.  I don't know why it only happens to some programs and not all, but our plasma screen doesn't have the same problem.  Not having an owners manual (it's online if you want to download it) made it somewhat problematic to set up and adjust, but I managed to sort out the problems and now our picture is near perfect....except on those "plasticized" occasions.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality For The Price
Reviews.Author: Kimberley C.
Reviews.Content: I bought this when I had a much smaller room and the size was fine. Fortunately, I moved into a bigger place, but now this TV looks super small and it's hard to read all the small text for video games. Of course, this is not the product's fault! The quality is great, the sound is decent for a TV, and the price was good (I bought this for the same price as my crappy netbook that barely even works).

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Diana Heredia
Reviews.Content: I received this tv a few days ago and so far I love it, great picture quality and the sound is good...some reviews mentioned that the sound wasn't so good but actually in my opinion it has a great sound. I have the tv in my room which is pretty small and I have the volume playing at 20 (which is loud enough at this level)and it goes up to 100! I think it's a great price for the tv you get, I will be keeping my vizio 29" tv...

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: D. Bell
Reviews.Content: gorgeous picture! I am very pleased with sound and pic on this tv. The stand is a little weird, makes it lean slightly back, but not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: Another Vizio Winner
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Easy set up, great picture. a little light so would not be good in an area that is exposed to little children or pets.  A good value! Also bought a 'Smart' white one for our kitchen.

Reviews.Title: fits our purposes
Reviews.Author: HERITAGE S.
Reviews.Content: no issues screen is clear sound is excellent. good for the money. we're using for our waiting room in the dealership

Reviews.Title: REVIEW OF VIZIO TV
Reviews.Author: pw
Reviews.Content: REVIEW OF vizio eCOLORSeries 47inch TVHAS MORE THAN LIVED UP TO OUR EXPECTATIONS.  WONDERFUL PICTURE BEAUTIFUL colors, great sound quality.Would highly recommend to any one looking for a quality reasonably priced product!

Reviews.Title: Extremely happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Helen M. Houghton
Reviews.Content: Love the unusual stand so that I could fit a larger TV in a small space, having not had to use a stand that adds another 3 or 4 inches vertically.  Good picture and quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great picture.
Reviews.Author: TMF
Reviews.Content: I would rate this as a 5 but, the first tv I received started turning off on its own. They quickly replaced it and the new one works perfectly. It is used allot as it is in the kitchen and on most of the time.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Eileen
Reviews.Content: zero clearence is rite. this fits perfecly were only a 32 would normally fit. Sound is great. picture is wonderful

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my bedroom, and it does the job. has an awesome picture with clear graphics. can't wait to mount it on my wall!

Reviews.Title: GREAT for the price.
Reviews.Author: Dani
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping, This TV can be viewed from angles without losing the picture or getting weird glare. I wish it had a swivel base (didn't notice when I ordered that it did not) but worth the price of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great set for a very reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: William C. Gill Jr.
Reviews.Content: This set has a very nice picture, very good sound for a smaller set size, and two HDMI inputs instead of the one that shows in the manual and in most online descriptons.  I am very pleased with the entire package.  In our very-bright kitchen, by the way, the 'vivid' picture mode is perfect.  If you need a mid-size set, you can count on this one.

Reviews.Title: Pretty solid piece.
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I just gave this to myself for my girlfriends birthday.  Its well worth the price if your looking to fix the TV situation at your significant others home.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality! 3 Months old and already broke.
Reviews.Author: RoyMan "rb"
Reviews.Content: Only 3 months old and part of the screen will no longer show black?  This product is a piece of junk!!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO TV works well
Reviews.Author: V. Wright "buzz buzz"
Reviews.Content: This TV has a nice crisply clear picture.  Set up for this set was easy and intuitive, hardly needed the directions.

Reviews.Title: Best for the money
Reviews.Author: terence
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. My girlfriend's Samsung blows it out of the water but it's also double the price. 4 stars for product, not Amazon; there was something rattling inside when I received it but it works perfectly fine.

Reviews.Title: Our Newest Vizio led
Reviews.Author: Genelle McDaniel
Reviews.Content: Have purchased the same tv for our home, so when we bought a camper we knew we wanted another one just in a smaller size.

Reviews.Title: hdtv
Reviews.Author: KRISTI MILLER
Reviews.Content: I love it!!! The stand it came with popped off once, but that may of been my fault when I put it on.

Reviews.Title: Good TV...mediocre packaging
Reviews.Author: Buzz
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for the price.  Good picture and good sound.  The only complaint was that the TV came in the TV packaging and the box had a puncture right in the middle which narrowly missed the screen.  Had it been any deeper, the screen would have been damaged.  It would be good if the box was put in a shipping box for extra protection.

Reviews.Title: Excellent size for convenient kitchen use.
Reviews.Author: Wayne J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Very good picture. The TV is easy to adjust. I found it to be competitively priced. I was in grade school the last time a minimum number of words were required of me!

Reviews.Title: Vizion 39" tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My cable provider worked for an hour to try to get a picture.  He finally got a picture on the top part of the screen but the bottom was nothing but lines, therefore I  had to return the tv.Ann

Reviews.Title: Exactly as advertised
Reviews.Author: Billy E. Maughan
Reviews.Content: Came in a perfectly packaged box with the tv in its own box.  Cannot say how great it was to see this much care taken to prevent damage to the television.  Hooked the tv up and it has a great picture.  Just received it so not much else to say right now.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Robinson
Reviews.Content: Well worth it! Vizio, ?????, who are they??? Now i know, their tv's are well made and produce an excellent picture.

Reviews.Title: poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Gerald R. Dever
Reviews.Content: i have had the tv a few months and i am very disappointed by the sound. it goes up and down on it's own.

Reviews.Title: Works well. Good quality no major problems
Reviews.Author: Ashish
Reviews.Content: Have been more than 3 months now.Got it to watch football and the quality is crisp. Games look good.Movie mode seems slightly dull, but mostly not noticeable, unless there is a very dark scene.For games slight corners get cut, on all modes. Not sure if its the TV or the set-top box.Anyways, worth the money

Reviews.Title: Big tv in small place
Reviews.Author: Call me KID
Reviews.Content: This tv was bought at Costco for 348.88 with free shipping and a two year Costco warrantly, shipped fedex.  It's big no it's not a 1,500.00 dollar 55 inch 3D but it is huge, the thing was set up easily and put together easily with just six screws and Costco's concierge hot line helped and has still been helping me to understand it.  Once I figured out to turn off ambient light control I adjusted one of the picture settings as my own custom one which was a bright pic with good pink faces as opposed to the more yellow it was, now I'm happy.  There's also, movie, game, sports modes, etc.  But movie and custom is where I stay it's the brightest.  Xbox 360 is amazing, fills the whole screen Batman is huge.  Movies are cool on it.  I have a streaming converter box and get sound feedback so I'm gonna try a new 3.5mm cord at some point but it works, has sound out so my comp goe's vga to converter to hdmi and then tv stereo out into my stereo (boom box), xbox is just video wire into tv right now waiting for my other hdmi cable to arrive.  Only has two hdmi inputs instead of three, no ethernet in, but without quibbling am very pleased and give it five stars for price, customer service and warranty.  Costco concierge will walk you through it all if your a member or I'm sure if recieved as a gift.  It's a big tv going from a 19inch and only weighs like 36 lbs.Update two weeks later:  the picture on faces is kind of yellow and no customer support can help me to change that, the color controls including picture color are useless, and if ambient light sensor is on all the picture is too dark to watch so that always needs to be turned off constantly.  Overall I like it, black people look fine, asians look ok, but white people look yellow or too red not tan like on my comp streaming.  So if you can deal with that as an issue the hd off an xbox movie is amazing and it's still a good price.  The only two Hdmi ports is causing a problem for me though I've got three hdmi items and had to hook one up as red white and yellow to make it all works and the first splitter I bought for hdmi is defective so it might end up causing me more money for another splitter then I bought a roku for netflix where maybe buying the fourty inch with wifi and I think three hdmi ports might have been the better choice, but as the present I got it for I still love my new tv from my old 19inch.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed.
Reviews.Author: CM
Reviews.Content: Delivered in a timely manor. I use it in my home office. Really nice TV. Good value. Good picture and sound. Easy set up. I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Debra Martz
Reviews.Content: This television was a great bargain and a terrific tv.  The picture quality and simplicity of set-up were wonderful.  I would recommend this tv to everyone!

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Skippy
Reviews.Content: It hasn't been a week yet; but, I am loving this tv so far.  Set up was easy -- attach the stand, plug in the electrical and hook up the cable.  That was it.  It arrived in it's own box, so luckily I was home and the delivery person didn't have to leave it outside my door to advertise to the neighborhood.  I am not up to speed on the  latest electronics; but, I have been told that the price is very good for this size tv.  I recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my intended use
Reviews.Author: steelyournaim
Reviews.Content: i was originally shopping around for a 29' tv b ut none of them came in 1080p like this one. i also wanted to get rid of my dual monitors and use this tv as my PCs monitor as well as a tv just for gaming, which is great cause unlike the other 29' tvs didnt have a VGA input. sound bar could be better, but for me all my sounds either come out of my computers stereo system or my gaming headset. all in all this is a great tv for the price and the picture is crisp even when not watching through HDMI.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: WTO
Reviews.Content: This TV price is inexpensive compared to other TVs with similar features.  I also like the image quality.  I recommend this for home or office use.

Reviews.Title: Great T-V E390-A1 39-inch
Reviews.Author: literati
Reviews.Content: Nice picture and sound and took no time to set it up,love Vizio products,they are always worth the price, and the price was good at 342.00.

Reviews.Title: Okay for the price.  ATSC receiver not that good.
Reviews.Author: The Q "Q"
Reviews.Content: I dropped cable a while back and connected a Mohu DTV antenna to my 2006 Samsung 42" plasma set.  I got about 24 channels (just what the Mohu site said I would) and a full guide of all stations.  The plasma eats electricity so I decided to replace it with the Vizio LED set.  I got the set, connected the Mohu antenna and did the channel scan.  On the Vizio I get less than 20 channels and the guide is one channel at a time.  I've tried multiple times and moved the antenna to alternate locations, but I never get more than 20 channels.  What a shame.  It's a nice set, good picture, reasonable price, but the sensitivity of the ATSC (DTV) receiver I would rate as poor.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Doreen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV strictly based on description and reviews online and price. The picture quality more than met my expectations. It almost looks like 3D. I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Greattttt
Reviews.Author: Bryan Lopez
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is superb and the sound is great, also, very energy efficient my bill didn't change at all

Reviews.Title: Excellent kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Richard LeBlanc
Reviews.Content: Fits nicely under the cabinets, is very slim and the picture is great. Set-up took about 30 seconds and it has worked flawlessly since.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Liz Harper
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture!  Great sound! Great value for the price. Light weight and mounts easily on the wall. Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Mounte For the Price
Reviews.Author: Elliot
Reviews.Content: Pretty thin and awesome picture. The volume is a bit distorted when turned up real loud. We use it in our bedroom and it's perfect. I would definitely recommend this TV. The mount was easily installed and seems very sturdy for this size TV.

Reviews.Title: Great tv Alright Monitor
Reviews.Author: marshall stuart
Reviews.Content: This tv performs great as a tv but as a computer monitor it is kinda blurry looking and gives me a headache (i use a HP S2031 and it is extremely clear an does not give me a headache) and no matter what settings i try i still cant get it to look good as a monitor. I dont know why but its an excellent tv for gaming and movies.

Reviews.Title: thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Kathleen DeRosa
Reviews.Content: Nice little tv for my spare room.  I have the same one, just a little bigger, in my bedroom.  Excellent buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: I am using it as a monitor for my desktop
Reviews.Author: Dollhunter "Diana"
Reviews.Content: My desk is up against the wall, so I chose not to put the back support on the tv, so it fits snugly against the wall.  The base is wide enough that it would stand on its own, but could be knocked over, but here, there are no children, and a wall to support it, so it frees about seven inches of my desktop.The color is brilliant, so I'm happy with that.  The one disappointment I had was that  I use an RF to transmit my tv signals from the box in another room, and there is no red, white and yellow connection.  There is an HDMI connection though, and I can connect my Roku, and I also have Prime, so will have enough tv options in case I want to watch tv instead.I have Vizio 42's, so know the quality is there, but the 1080 on this small screen is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: ...and here I was saying I would never be a fan of Vizio
Reviews.Author: Rabinzero
Reviews.Content: I was a stuck up Samsung ONLY guy and had nothing but Samsung TV's and monitors in my home at one point.  When Vizio first came, I admit, I couldn't believe how horrible the quality of the TV's were.  It looked like they didn't even try, then something got them noticed.  Their price...and then Vizio itself started to realize something, they could make quality TV's at a low price and that's exactly what they did.  Years later I have two Vizio TV's in my home.  While both are smaller for bedrooms, if they keep this up I will find myself replacing my 67" Samsung with one of theres...we'll see, but for now I recommend getting a Vizio for a nicely priced bedroom TV

Reviews.Title: So far great
Reviews.Author: pinkygal
Reviews.Content: It is always hard to know how long a TV will last but since we already have a VISIO, we felt this was the best choice for the price.  It was a gift to our college son and he said everything is perfect.I just love having things delivered to my door  and not having to lug something home in the car.  Amazon came through yet again!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Lucia Toporowski
Reviews.Content: happy with this purchase.I use it in a rental apartment and am pleased so far with picture and sound.I do recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: David M Shrader Jr
Reviews.Content: Great price, delivery was very fast. Very happy with our purchase. We use the TV 17 hours a day and the last one lasted for 5 years.

Reviews.Title: Excellent timely shipment and easy set up
Reviews.Author: Moocowlake "MooCow"
Reviews.Content: Very compact mounting system fits well as our second TV.  Am operating it w/antenna's so have input independent of possible satellite disruption.  But will have to return to Amazon and get whizzy new Winegard 5500A amplified antenna to do battle with Rochester Station 40 miles distant.  With this new TV, should be awesome!

Reviews.Title: blazing resolution
Reviews.Author: Rockett Man
Reviews.Content: This TV more than met my expectations for the price.  Think just the right size if you don't want to see lifesizepeople on TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase. SOund quality is great and the picture is perfect. Was surpised to see a headphone jack but it is working well with my needs.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: onthebay
Reviews.Content: I buy Vizio products because their products work seamlessly with older RCA products.I bought these for the master bedrooms in two seasonal condos I own in Rehoboth Beach, DE.  These are much better than the 32" Vizio's I bought two years ago.  The renters like them, so I like them.

Reviews.Title: profit tv
Reviews.Author: Katherinedwright
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy that I finally made this purchase, didn't know it was so light weight, so ladies have no fear if you don't have that man around to assist you with lifting and placing no worries it's not heavy at all.

Reviews.Title: Speakers Quality
Reviews.Author: hamilfour
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, light weight, easy menu to set up but the speaker quality is lacking.  but still go to go with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Now have three Visios
Reviews.Author: chuck bieker
Reviews.Content: Great TV's with good picture  and sound. We have a 22" and a 32" in our RV. Also a 42" in our home.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: O. Gauntlett
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV, especially for the price. This TV has a beautiful picture quality when hooked up to optimum cable TV. I was shocked at how well calibrated it was out of the box. The television literally required no settings change from me. It's a great buy. At 248, you really can't beat that unless you wait to see what deals they have for black Friday. Btw, there is no light bleed o. This led TV (at least not on my set)

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Michael Hayes
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Lightweight- Easy setupCons:- Stand makes it easy to knock over- Can't seem to make it support true 1080p

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: wander6
Reviews.Content: Especially new. No imperfection at all. Sharp picture and bright color presents only if not too near. I really enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Scott Ives
Reviews.Content: although the TV stand it shows is not the one it came with it still works good, i am deployed and needed something

Reviews.Title: good, not great
Reviews.Author: K. Blair
Reviews.Content: TV has good picture and sound.  Nothing fantastic but for a small TV in the kitchen it's certainly fine.  Easy to set up and arrived when stated.

Reviews.Title: Very good monitor for my gaming computers
Reviews.Author: Tony J Vece
Reviews.Content: I keep a few systems in my house to play MMOs with friends and I have a couple of these VIZIOs as monitors. Video is very clear and I don't need separate speakers. Very good price for the performance.

Reviews.Title: it is ok
Reviews.Author: alan bridges
Reviews.Content: Lots of preset video and audio adjustments. Clear picture, very light weight and slick look. One week new and so far so good. I am happy but not blown away.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E320-A1 32-inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mnmh
Reviews.Content: the seller is a delight to work with...had a few problems initially but were quickly resolved.  the seller offered (and did) send a replacement TV to  me and arranged delivery/return pick up for me because I suffered a broken leg.  I don't know too many dealers who offer such excellent consumer services but will not hesitate to buy from them in the future.  Yesterday I encountered an issue with green vertical lines showing up on the screen.  I am going to replace the HDMI cable to see if this corrects the issue and if not, the seller has offered to send a replacement TV to me.  This is my 1st flat screen and really so far couldn't be happier with the ease of set up.  One small complaint I would have would be the remote control....the buttons are too close together and I tend to accidentally turn off the TV instead of hitting the "menu" button.  I will keep you updated about the current issue with the green vertical lines on my screen....don't hesitate to buy this Vizio product, its definitely a good investment...and to be able to work with a reputable supplier is another PLUS!

Reviews.Title: Sound?
Reviews.Author: C. A. Heath "Just Me"
Reviews.Content: While a nice thin size, the only issue I have with it is the sound--speakers are along front bottom and it sounds muffled. Sound is worst of 3 tv's I own just because of speaker placement.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV SO FAR
Reviews.Author: Gwen Peters
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for a guest room that does not have cable.  I hooked the tv up to a DVD player, Apple TV and a pair of good computer speakers. The picture and sound rivals the 32" Samsung I have in my bedroom with surround sound.  The set up was extremely easy and I had all other items plugged in and ready to go in 15 minutes.  The picture is great and the 22" size is perfect for my location.  And, you can't beat the price!  I've only had this tv for a few hours, but so far so good.  Did I mention that Amazon delivered this tv to me in less than 48 hours with Prime shipping?  LOVE AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: Pretty incredible TV
Reviews.Author: Solera2000 "Solera2000"
Reviews.Content: I cannot believe how good the picture is on this TV. It is small and super lightweight. I bought it for my mom to replace a 17" CRT. I think I am going to be buying a couple for my kids' rooms. There is a newer version with Wi-Fi I think.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: dogoooder
Reviews.Content: Needed a TV for the office and since I own a 50" e-series, I gave this one a shot. Perfectly happy with the colors and the crispness of the picture. Can't beat it for $248.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a small space
Reviews.Author: Donielle Jordan
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at the slim profile and light weight of this TV. While the picture is not that of larger more expensive models, this fits perfectly in the space we needed it for and works well. I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Ryan M.
Reviews.Content: Picture: GoodSound: GoodNo issues with this TV. It doesn't take forever to turn on like some TVs of this type tend to do. It may not have a lot of features, but if you're looking for a basic LED HDTV I highly recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Kym Rouillard
Reviews.Content: I have a Prime membership and this was checked for Prime shipping (2 day delivery).  I got it the next day!  After a couple of days a dark cloudy line appeared across the middle of the screen  I sent an email to Amazon, they shipped another TV to me, which I got the next day again and they arranged to have the defective one picked up.  I've had it for nearly 3 months now and it is great!  Nice clear picture.  I don't have a huge living room, but it's big enough for this size TV.11/21/13--Still very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: John P. Sweeney
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery, easy installation, nice picture. Still working well after 3 weeks. My wife is delighted. Doesn't get better than that.

Reviews.Title: not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Precious Daniels
Reviews.Content: It's a good tv. Sound quality picture and awesome. Easy to install. And, a high score from Customer Reports. Would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Love This One!
Reviews.Author: Ellen
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about the Vizio brand after my 3 week fiasco with the Vizio Smart TV.  (Would stop downloading after 10 min so could not do anything internet related so took it back)  But love my "unsmart" Vizio and It's a great value.  Hooked up Roku and no problems.  Life is good again!!

Reviews.Title: Great Tv for price
Reviews.Author: Alobar52
Reviews.Content: I really like my new vizio 22 in hdtv,I use it as my computer monitor,perfect size for me,most features are controlled by remote, has only 1 input button in back. would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: JL
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect TV for kids room, kitchen, office, etc. It is Very nice picture. So easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV FOR 2ND OR 3RD TV
Reviews.Author: Caroline wong
Reviews.Content: WHEN I WORK ON MY COMPUTER, I LIKE TO WATCH SOME OF THE NIGHT TIME PROGRAMS SO THIS TV IS IN EYEVIEW OF MY COMPUTER DESK.  THE COLORS AND SHARPNESS ARE NOT VERY GOOD, BUT IT IS OK AS A 2ND OR 3RD TV.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Anna Webb
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tv. We think that the screen is a bit dark but the tv is easy to use and the picture is good.

Reviews.Title: the stand creates an upward slant
Reviews.Author: leon s.
Reviews.Content: meaning if you lay down in bed to play games like i do, you'll need to either prop something (game case) under the stand to make it face you head on, other wise your viewpoint must be elevated from the tv for the viewing angle to be proper and to see the full color spectrum.basically: the tv stand would ideally be adjustable, not creating an angular slant on the screen which limits the viewing angles

Reviews.Title: Vizio makes great HDTV's
Reviews.Author: Mary Donofrio
Reviews.Content: This is my second Vizio and my family loves it and we don't even have it hooked up to the HD box w/HBO yet.Can't wait for that and the football games this fall-Go Redskins! The picture is so clear and crisp even w/out HD-it's going to be amazing when I get our cable company to hook up HD and our movie channels.The look of the TV is so thin and elegant that I have it in my living room and it looks great.I highly reccommend Vizio,it's as good as more expensive brands.

Reviews.Title: nice bedroom tv  for my son..
Reviews.Author: James Rizzo
Reviews.Content: is a kool tv nice pic ... would recomend to a friend  NICE !!!  BUY THIS ONE you will like for the $

Reviews.Title: 24 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Guy
Reviews.Content: Very good price, nice and lightweight. Colour is a bit off out of the box but once adjusted it's reasonable. Using it in an outdoor location.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: The price is low, quality higher than anticipated.  I love the stand it looks great! Very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Size Matters
Reviews.Author: CaptMorgan "SkidRow"
Reviews.Content: Replacing older 15 inch under a kitchen cabinet with 14.5 inches clearance, wanted the biggest screen I could get that would fit. Saw Consumer Report ratings of Vizio, was surprised. Preferred Panasonic or Samsung, especially after reading Vizio reviews here. However the stand set-up is perfect. With straight coaxial cable, the HD channels (5) are great. The cropped down non HD channels aren't as good as the older TV. Big disappointment there. Sound is OK. Overall, it fired up, easy to program, and works. Then a newer white model came out two weeks later, that I would like to have consider. Other TV's are 55 inch Sharp and 26 inch Sharp (office), both excellent, but have boxes.

Reviews.Title: Good Value-Perfect Fit
Reviews.Author: Earl L. Doliber
Reviews.Content: I was limited to a 26.5" horizontal measurement and this set was 26.4. It fit and is a fine modern TV; but with "last generation" features.The set I received was likely a return. It had stripped screw holes in the stand and did not require the usual set-up hassles. I am negotiating with the seller to fix the problems. For the price, a good value all-in-all.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: old timer
Reviews.Content: Love the great picture when used as a HD TV and it works great as monitor!  I imagine this is what most buyers will be concerned with.  The initial back-light setting was high but I liked the picture just as they had it set without needing any adjustments.  The sound is better than other small TV's of this type, such as Samsung.As a Smart TV I was able to get it on the internet right away, but then I found the smart TV apps too bothersome for me. Using the remote to enter all that password information is for the youngsters that are used to the video game players, I already have the regular computer for the internet anyway.My VIZIO was apparently burning off something internally for a couple of days and the smell was quite strong...I was in a room where all I had to do was open the window and turn on the fan.  I don't know if anyone else has experienced this but all is normal now.So far I like the 2" by 6" remote.  It is easier to handle than a lot of other brands that have a remote up to 10 inches long, the remote has the soft buttons also. There are regular control buttons on the left side just around to the back as well.  It's made in China so I don't think you will ever be able to beat this price.I highly recommend this device as a TV and as a monitor.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Be Happier...
Reviews.Author: Lady Stormageddon "and the Tardis"
Reviews.Content: For the price and free shipping..I thought this tv was the perfect fit for me.  I love the size for my living room.  The picture clarity and color is great.  Im very happy.  Anyone looking to get a quality tv, I highly recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Great Price
Reviews.Author: sesquipedalian
Reviews.Content: Opted for a 720 because it saved me some money over the 1080's in the same size.  Easy to setup.  I have ours hooked up to an Apple TV and a Leaf HD antenna.  Perfect for our needs.Pictures great - sound is decent.. Overall - I'm very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E241-A1 24-inch 1080p 60Hz Razor LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: kimie zajac
Reviews.Content: Nice TV and monitor would highly recommend. Great price. Fantastic colors and speaker system is great for speakers so small. You won't go wrong, don't forget the hdmi cables it makes it so much better. Enjoy.  Again great price for a monitor which we use the most and you also have a great tv with remote

Reviews.Title: Great TV and computer monitor
Reviews.Author: A.C. "aravind"
Reviews.Content: The screen and display are brilliant - given they make up much of the cost of a TV these days, you get really good deal for the money you pay. I got this to use it for my Roku and use it as a second computer monitor.The sound is good. I wish they gave more pre-made settings on the equalizer.Gave 4 stars because I would have wished another HDMI port and in USB - playback support for videos and music. Now it is only images.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: Taz
Reviews.Content: Good value for the money, Looks great,It met my expectations. Decent sound and nice size for a small area, I like it.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with my new purchase of a TV
Reviews.Author: Cheryl A. Carnahan
Reviews.Content: Company rep was very helpful in helping me set up the TV.  Good purchase.  TV arrived as it was scheduled.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E241-A1 24-inch
Reviews.Author: Ben J. Lee "electronic enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up with an HDMI patch cable. Only, would have liked the screen size to be a bit larger & also for the stand/base  to raise the screen height a bit.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO TV
Reviews.Author: Dimple Dot
Reviews.Content: I was using a small (19") Vizio and finally decided it was purchase a larger screen.  This is used in the bedroom where is the perfect size and quality.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great price.
Reviews.Author: snorer's wife
Reviews.Content: We had been pricing TVs for months. This was the best deal we found.  When we got it hooked up to cable the picture was very clear. Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: KPsoundadvice "sound advice"
Reviews.Content: Our second vizio, this one for the kitchen.  Great image, connected it to a set of Creative computer speakers w/ sub-woofer, perfect for the space.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, good audio, easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: Great picture, good audio, easy to set up.  Many times, the smaller televisions have inferior audio.  I'd recommend the Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Excellent pictrue and sound for my home offiice
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: I have been researching a TV of this size for some time. I even purchased a Samsung model. This has a very unique design as it sits flat on the desk. I placed it on a blue ray player and it looks like one unite even the player is a Panasonic make. Am very happy with the sound which amazes me for the frequency range and surround effect. Pretty amazing for a TV purchased for $260.00! Would recommend to my best friend if he were looking for one of this size.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Linda Biggs
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great and the size was perfect for our guest bedroom.  We have another vizio tv and love them both.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 29 inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dale K Schreiber
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my new TV.I had to contact customer service at Vizio and got all the information necessary.It was a pleasant experience dealing with Vizio for the minor issues I had at the time of setup.The issues were the screws were missing for the stand and I needed to obtain the correct size of the screws.In addition, I had a problem getting a picture to show on the screen. It was an easy fix off the input menu.

Reviews.Title: The problem was mine
Reviews.Author: Walter G. Babcock
Reviews.Content: After setting up the TV, I connected it via a cheap HDMI cable I bought online. The picture quality was a nightmare. Green. Out of focus. Had 1080 then dropped to 720 then to 480 SD. Played with the settings with no improvement. Went to bed in a snit thinking I would have to send it back. The next morning it occurred to me that it might be the signal from the HD receiver to the set thru the HDMI cable. I had a more expensive cable handy and swapped it out. Instantly I had the most beautiful 1080 resolution AND brilliant color. I am new to flat screen TV's but discovered a $10 cable is better than one for $1.75. It really does make a difference. This is a "best buy."

Reviews.Title: TV for the road
Reviews.Author: JERRI M MECH
Reviews.Content: This set has a great picture and sound.  We really enjoy watching it either withDVD or over the air tv.  We plan on usig it in our camper this summer when travelingit will fit nicely in the tv compartment.

Reviews.Title: Stand needs redesigned
Reviews.Author: M. Phillips
Reviews.Content: have only had it for 1 day so rating may change, but major problem was with the stand,it kept wanting to pop loose and tv would start to fall....finally solved problem with a heavy Stephen King hard back to hold stand in proper place.

Reviews.Title: Excellant LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: j. wyne
Reviews.Content: This TV met all of my expectations.  The picture quality is excellant and the size (29") fit perfectly in my TV cabinet.  The price was better than other TVs that I looked at in the local electronics stores.

Reviews.Title: Husband really enjoys
Reviews.Author: Anne McNarney
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my husband and he is extremely pleased. Fit perfectly in the relatively small space available. Picture and sound quality is quite good.

Reviews.Title: Terrific deal
Reviews.Author: cloudynik
Reviews.Content: Got this for my husband for Christmas for his Office. The picture is sharp & detailed, & it was very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Patty S.
Reviews.Content: Bought this to put in my bedroom and am very happy with it.  Ended up mounting to wall so I could tip it down instead of it leaning back.

Reviews.Title: Great slim light weight tv
Reviews.Author: Jane0283
Reviews.Content: Great size. Thin and light weight. Great picture quality. I love Vizio TVs. Vizio is a great value and I prefer to buy Vizio TVs because I've had no problems with them over the past 5 years we've owned them.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Tzu
Reviews.Content: I love the TV itself but heavy hate the stand. I am going to have to buy a gmounting bracket and make adjustments to the custom furniture the TV fits into.

Reviews.Title: Very unhappy.....
Reviews.Author: jnccpf
Reviews.Content: This is going to be a multiparty review.  In this review I will attempt to cover both my original TV, my replacement TV and Vizio service department.I ordered this unit after reading the reviews and was confident that I was going to be receiving a quality product.  Amazon shipped on time and using Prime I received the TV as delivered.  So far, so good.TV 1 StoryI boxed  the set, took down my old set and connected everything together.  As far as setting up the TV, not a big deal.  We have Dish Network, Roku and a DVD home theater using AVI.  After I got everything hooked up, did some testing, found the dish network worked fine, Roku (I only tested to the point of scanning the menu). The next day we decided to stream a movie on Prime.  As soon as the movie would start we would only see a purple screen.  Off to google we went to search why.  The answer was the HDMI hand shake was not working, possible cause, TV, cable or Roku.  We did some trouble shooting and found the HDMI port was not working.  When we swapped ports between the dish network and Roku, the Roku would work and dish would not.  Being the type of person I am, I would rather chat than call and wait in a queue.Support storyI was disconnected twice from chat sessions.  I found this frustrating because you enter your phone number, bot they did not bother calling back after the session got dropped. So off to the old phone line.  I was already not happy, and when prompted said I would more than willing to complete a survey...  We'll after holding for a while, I got a tech on the phone and started following their trouble shooting process.  Turning TV on and off, a power reset, I was then asked to hold and...went right into the survey because they disconnected me again...  Called back again... Got a new tech, and had to go through the process again.  I am understanding that they have a script and process, but by now I had spent a great deal of time on the web and phone so I was a little grumpy.  In the end, I was told to take a picture and email it to them to verify the issue.  Send the email, wait 24 hours and call back...  Ok, a little strange but ok.  Called back and was told yup, they verified an issue... DUH!!  Then I was told to send them via email a copy of the proof of purchase and again wait 24 hours and call back.  UGH, ok, so I did this too.  Called back and this time I was told, ok we will ship a new TV.  They did via ground from CA to CT so 5 days later, plus multiple days on the phone I received a new TV.TV #2Yeah!!  New TV!!  Removed defective TV installed new TV.  HDMI ports work.  tested dish and Roku, both work.  Tested DVD, works fine.  Sat down and finally was able to enjoy the TV.  I will admit the screen is great, colors are great, sound is great.  However a few hours later notice that the sound and the picture are not in sync.  I went to the set up and found the l sync adjustment.  However that would only make it worse.  Right now I am stuck with turning the TV off and back on and presto back in sync for another couple house and then BAM out of sync again...Bottom line... 2 TVs multiple calls into Vizio more then A week later and I am still not a happy Vizo customer... Not at all.

Reviews.Title: Did not work upon receipt!
Reviews.Author: broomstick9
Reviews.Content: We recvd this TV on Dec 18 (a Christmas gift).  Went unopened until Dec 28.  Spent in excess of 3 hrs trying to get it to work, talking to Vizio tech support, moving TV from room to room connecting to various cable boxes, still No Signal.  Vizio determined that the TV is definitely faulty & said they would replace it.  Still waiting to hear when it will be replaced, if we are to return it to Amazon where it was purchased, or to Vizio who is replacing it.  This TV was a gift to my disabled son and, needless to say, we are very disappointed that it didn't work.  Have purchased 3 other Vizio TV's in the past & connected to Fios without a problem.

Reviews.Title: Good while it worked
Reviews.Author: Jim Talabach
Reviews.Content: Less than a year old and now will not power up. Very light use.  I will try to contact manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Defective item
Reviews.Author: Leeann Jacobs "leeannjake"
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, the digital tuner was bad when it arrived.Amazon was GREAT and issued a return authorization and my choice of a credit or replacement after their brief trouble shooting.

Reviews.Title: My Third Vizio
Reviews.Author: Doug W
Reviews.Content: This is my third Vizio purchase. Please allow me to make this disclaimer; I am not associated with this company in any manner. I do however enjoy their products. This model is awesome. Setup was a snap. Amazon processed my order as always in a very timely way. Televisions today generally require a lot less tweaking and setup than televisions of years ago. I remember televisions being shipped to the customer in a retail mode, meaning most all controls were jacked up to compensate for a retail store florresent lighting enviornment. This models picture is sharp, colors are true, skin tones are most pleasing, audio was better than expected even though mine is connected to a surround system. Late night viewing; I will utilize the built in speakers.I have read other reviews where the product arrived with damage visibly apparent on the outside. Hey folks, although this sickens me and is most upsetting; we need to take action and refuse delivery. I have on rare occasion, had a defective product but Amazon has always rectified my concerns. Speaking with a customer service representative in a polite yet acertive manner has generally produced an acceptable solution.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: goldie locks "gl"
Reviews.Content: I love the picture, great price for great quality. Little slow to start after turning on,but least of my worries. Arrived quickly easy to use and assemble TV to stand. My first flat screen enjoying it and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Michelle A. Trubilowicz
Reviews.Content: VIZIO Tv is one of the best pictures made, i have no con on this one. A must buy. Great for any home.

Reviews.Title: Perfect unit for the price, but just be aware of some minor things
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: First, a little history.  Our last Vizio model, the VW32LHDTV20A, was hit by a power surge through a faulty surge protector the last full week of march, and since then it has become unusable.  It was a great TV for being nearly 8 years old and I was sad to see it go, had it not been for the power surge I would still be using it today.  That being said, I can't fault Vizio for a power surge and because of my satisfactory experience with the previous TV, I was willing to buy from them again.I did some research and chose a unit based on my needs.  I wanted a unit with the following inputs and outputs:-Minimum of 2 HDMI inputs-SPDIF out-Coaxial input-RGB input-At least one component input-At least one AV inputAfter doing some research on Amazon and other sites across the web, my options became very apparent.  I can pay tens or even hundreds of dollars more to get a reliable unit from a trusted brand that has everything I just listed, or, I can pay as much as 100 dollars LESS on a less reliable unit from a more obscure brand.  After weighing my options and considering the fact that I can live without the RGB input since my computer has an HDMI output, this TV was the only standout.  It was within my price range ($250-300) and had enough inputs and outputs that I could get by with no problem on my current setup and still have room to grow.  I did briefly consider the next step up (the E320i-AO) but since we use our recently custom built desktop PC as a media hub, we did not require a smart TV with apps and wifi connection.  If you use your desktop PC as a media hub for your HDTV like us, I would strongly advise that you save yourself 40 dollars or so and consider this model.  The LED LCD panel is the same and you won't really notice a difference in your viewing experience.  As far as the difference between 720 and 1080 resolutions, take it from me, don't waste your money on anything under 40 inches that is 1080.  You really can't see a difference.  I have a friend with a 1080p unit and I can't tell the difference.  I can't see the difference when they are side by side either.  I have noticed however that when a 1080p signal is transmitted to the TV through HDMI, it displays "1080p" in the upper right hand corner.  Whether or not it's actually displaying in 1080p, I do not know, because like I said I can't tell a difference.  I just know it says 720p on the product page.Now let's discuss my actual experience using this unit.  When compared with our previous traditional LCD TV (VW32LHDTV20A) the picture is a much better.  The colors seem to be deeper and richer, and the edges and corners of objects are very smooth with no pixilation.  Our previous unit had occasional pixilation, especially when handling darker colors and while watching local TV channels.Yes, it only has two HDMI inputs.  But considering that most new surround sound units now have 4 or more HDMI inputs, a true home theater junky will not see the need to have this many on your TV.  A friend of mine runs all of his HDMI cables into his surround sound receiver and only one HDMI cable from his surround sound to the TV.  The surround sound acts as the hub for all of his devices.  Many DVD and BluRay players also have additional inputs for other devices as well, so the need for many HDMI inputs on TVs anymore is becoming questionable.  So if you have a newer surround sound unit or other device that has HDMI inputs, you will not need many on your TV.Scanning for channels is about twice as fast as it was on our previous unit.  This TV also seems to have a more sensitive tuner card, as we picked up channels from sources about 120 miles away.  Our previous unit never received channels that this unit will.  While I did block some of the channels because their signal wasn't strong enough to render then watchable, this unit does have a far more powerful tuner card than previous generations of Vizio TVs.  My only true complaint is that there appears to be no way to see the upcoming schedule in the TV's guide, you can only see info for the current time slot.  I like to look ahead sometimes to see if there is anything I would like to watch, and having to skip over to the computer or pick up a TV Guide at the store is bothersome.  I am surprised this slipped the minds of the engineers at Vizio.  Maybe a firmware update will return this capability in the future.  Of course if there is a way to view a full guide with upcoming show information, please leave me a comment.I have read some complaints about sound quality on this unit.  I honestly do not see where the trouble is.  Compared to several previous generations of Vizio TVs, the audio quality is clearly superior.  Some of their previous generations had speakers that sounded more like cell phone speakers than a traditional TV speaker.  The sound had no depth.  Our previous unit had fairly large speakers, I can not tell you what the wattage was, but while they had depth, the clarity and surround sound on them was not as good as it is on this TV.  Granted the sound may not be as good on this TV as more costly 32 inch units from other brands, but at this price point they are more than satisfactory, and I see no reason to complain.  If you plan on using surround sound, then you have no reason to worry about this, as long as it works.I have read some complaints about the backlighting.  This isn't really a problem, you just have to make some adjustments to get it to a level you are satisfied with.  Go to Menu, Picture, More, Advanced Picture and adjust the Ambient Light Settings to "Low" or "Off".  Problem solved.  If you turn it off, adjust the backlighting to a satisfactory level in the Picture menu.As far as the physical aspects of this unit, the thin bezel sure is nice, particularly for a small living room like ours.  It helps the room feel bigger.  The thin design also helps the unit feel less intrusive than previous generations of Vizio TVs.  The real estate savings are enough to make a positive impact on our entertainment center.  The only downfall is that it makes it more difficult to hide the cables behind the unit.  An easy fix is to either direct all the cables directly behind the stand, or to bundle them up nice and neat wherever they fall so they don't look so sloppy.Speaking of the stand, this was the only part of the setup where I had trouble.  I read another review where someone else had trouble.  They couldn't get a screw to start, but a family member made a suggestion that worked for them to resolve the issue.  I had a hole that was milled too big for any of the screws that shipped with the unit.  Since it was where the two portions of the base connect, it wasn't really a big deal because the full weight of the TV is directed downward onto it.  I used a longer and coarser screw I had on hand instead of the provided screws to fix this problem.  However it did provide me with 10 minutes of frustration or so.  Also, go easy when attaching the stand to the TV itself, I heard a "pop" noise when turning one of the screws in, and now it won't back out.  I assume they had a nut that was either spot welded in or molded into the plastic internally, and the weld or mold failed.  This really isn't a problem for me since I do not intend on ever mounting this TV, thus ever having to remove the stand, so at least that screw is secure.  However Vizio really needs to get with the supplier that molds their plastic components and make sure they are producing quality products.  Since I'm not the first one to have a problem with the stand, a trend is becoming obvious.  This isn't enough to remove a star for me since everything functions as intended, but it is a problem that can be remedied easily, and I am certain and could be worthy of a lower rating for someone who needs to wall mount this unit and finds they can't remove their base.So all in all, I am satisfied with this unit.  It works as intended for the price point and also has a stellar picture.  When you compare the ratings and features (primarily the inputs and outputs) of this unit with others in the price range, there aren't very many other options worth considering.

Reviews.Title: Vizio ROCKS!
Reviews.Author: Glenn R. Eigabroadt
Reviews.Content: I own both this and a Vizio 60" TV and also a Vizio sound-bar.  One word to describe these products is "Outstanding".

Reviews.Title: Defective upon arrival
Reviews.Author: G. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing this VIZIO, I already own 2 of them and have been very pleased.  Upon receiving this 29" model, I placed it in service and the picture was destorted on left side for about a third of the screen.  I promptly called VISIO help line and after a few attempts to correct the problem, VISIO techs determined that it needed to be returned.  They sent me a new TV and I returned the old one.  It took about a week to get through all this but I'm happy to say that I'm was pleased with the service.  They are a great company to work with when you have service issues.  And all the people you talk with are actually in the good old US of A.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Mass Effect Maniac.
Reviews.Content: Awesome quality, great sound, and it's from a brand I trust. If you want a nice little dorm room tv or bedroom tv that's easily portable (it's not cumbersome to carry around) get this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: hinesch1
Reviews.Content: Ordered it on 2/6/2013 and received it on 2/8/2013, as today there is no issues. It was easy to set up I love it!

Reviews.Title: VIZEO E320-A1 32-inch 720p LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is excellent but sound quality isn't too good. The sound vibrates the shell of the TV and distorts some at higher volume levels. At "normal" levels, sound is average. I put this TV in my RV and overall, I'm very happy with it. The size and picture quality are terrific.

Reviews.Title: Monitor to mac mini
Reviews.Author: EdmailMusic
Reviews.Content: I was looking around for an affordable monitor with HDMI for my Mac Mini.  After a lot of searching decided this one which works very good with a great display for my purposes.Give it 4 stars because I'm not crazy about the TV base which limits the hight and horizontal mobility of the TV.  As a monitor, for the Mac Mini just plug through HDMI entrance and it looks good.  I would not recomend this TV as monitor for someone who works with graphic design or related field.Mainly used for music recording which gives me a great display

Reviews.Title: Sound Cuts Out
Reviews.Author: John W. Reed
Reviews.Content: It took a lot of hard work getting the TV to stop terminating the sound.  Changing channels or muting the sound randomly caused the sound to be permanently muted.  This happened two or three times a day.  The only solution was to turn the TV off and on again to restore the sound.  I contacted Vizio and their explanation was: " What happens is the digital audio out on the device connected to the TV is set to Dolby Digital. This overloads the chip on the TV which causes anomalies such as this."  They suggested "...trying first is set the audio out on the connected device to PCM or LPCM."  This turned out not to be easy for this challenged electronics user.  I contacted Comcast, my cable provider, and they were very little help.  Finally, I found the users manual for my Motorola DCX3200M set top box (it turned out to be the manual for model RNG 150N).  The trick was getting into the setup window for the STB (power off and instantly hit the menu button on the remote control).  I changed the sound output to PCM and everything is now working. Too much work!  I think Vizio would do their customers service if they changed the sound chip to one that is compatible with Dolby Digital 5.1.

Reviews.Title: The E291 is everything I expected
Reviews.Author: Jay Lideen
Reviews.Content: The total  process of research on the TV, price, payment, unbelievable short delivery time and follow up by Amazon was an 11 out of 1 - 10 rating, The E291-a1 came new, in a factory fresh unopened box, at the correct total purchase price, shipped on the date they said it would be, and delivered when Amazon said I would get it.  Amazon's prices, method of marketing and to the door delivery is second to none.  If it wasn't, I would LOUDLY say so.  The only reason I got the E291 was Amazon was more on the ball than anyother vender I could find, including local stores.  Amazon was marketing a brand new model that just came out in Oct. of 2012 where everybody else was selling 1,2,3 year old models to clear out old electronics at bargain sale prices.  I know because I have been researching LED TVs for over a year looking for the right size one to fit in my kitchen at the best total price I could find.  I had decided on a Vizo E261va (3rd. generation) with it's front facing speakers, because across the board complaints on all flat screen tv's poor sound quality.  I saw that a lot of buyers though like me and liked the m260, e260, and the e261, because venders couldn't keep them in stock, even the older versions, including Amazon.  I was ready to buy the E261va on Amazon because they had the best TOTAL price, when I found the E291 there for $10 more.  3" bigger screen, same over all size, new model, and maybe improved speakers,,, I hit the "put in cart button"  E291 Review:  Out of the box; perfect condition. Assembly; easy, heavyduty stand (note depth with stand), Picture; excellent with 430i cable, 720HD or 1080HD (I'm picky, I know it's only a 720 TV), wife watched the Rose Bowl Parade", knocked her socks off. Remote; small and can do anything you need,  And of coarse the sound, my big concern, better than I though it would be, no issues. Instructions; A little lame, but full instructions available on the net.  What do you want for under $250 to the door,,,, A Rollex  Great--TV,,,, Great--Price,,, Great--Amazon

Reviews.Title: A Very Pleasant Surprise
Reviews.Author: David B. Wheeler "Airman"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my bedroom a week ago. I am confined to a width of 38.2 inches, so I have been watching a Sony KDL 600 series 40" LED for the last 2 years. I wanted a 42" for the room but the only 42 that would fit was a Samsung with the skinny frame that was way too expensive.When I saw the dimensions on this new Vizio, I jumped, even if I doubted that it could be as good as my Sony. HA!The picture on this LED is amazingly good, and the sound is good too. I always shut off the ambient light sensor on these tv's, regardless of brand, and then spend quite a bit of time tweaking the picture settings. The only thing I set on this tv was changing the picture mode from standard to the Golf setting, and it looks perfect.There is no better bargain on the market at this price point

Reviews.Title: Potential wall mount issues
Reviews.Author: Ross A. Seymour "rseymour10"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the kitchen.  I had a rail style wall mount.  The two rails screw into the back of the TV and then hang on a rail bolted into the wall.  One of the rails came down over the power plug in the back of the TV.  You can see on a back view of the TV how the two mounting screw holes are directly over the power plug.  Because of a modification I had made to the rail on the prior TV I was able to get it to work (I cut off the bottom of the rail to shorten it).  This issue would have been solved by moving the power plug elsewhere on the unit or having a right angle plug.  Also, the cable connection comes straight out the back.  Again, this wasn't too much of a problem as I had enough space between the back of the unit and the wall but a tighter fit to the wall would have posed a problem for the cable connection.  Finally, while I don't have an HDMI plug, the location of the plug would probably cause problems with a rail mount as well.As to the TV itself, the picture is good considering the price of the TV.  Many ways to tweak the audio and, more so, the picture.A good value overall.

Reviews.Title: We got a real lemon
Reviews.Author: Michael Edson
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Vizion high def TV refurbished about 4 years ago and have been very happy with it. This Vizion E390 turned out to be a real bummer. Constant flickering in the screen, shadows and medium color contrast.We first thought is could have been the cable, so checked that out and it appeared that it was the TV. Vizio would not replace it as our complaints were shortly after the 30 day complaint period, so at best they offered a repairman to come in or would give me a refurbished model. I told them I did not want to repair a brand new TV and getting a refurbished one when I just purchased a brand new TV from them was unacceptable.I think they could have tried just a little harder to keep a customer satisfied.Anyway, Amazon gives a little more time to return new electronics for a full refund, so this TV is going right back into Vizion's inventory.

Reviews.Title: No More VIZIO Ever Again
Reviews.Author: YouKnow
Reviews.Content: Purchased this new as a x-mas present for the in-laws, through Amazon and an electronics store selling through Amazon, this was the only store which I could purchase it from on the Amazon page.Arrived in perfect condition. I set it up after xmas, wall mounted it. 2 days later a green vertical line appeared on screen.Since the box it came in was already discarded I contacted Vizio about this, after numerous calls, chats, emails, online forms, and various submitted pictures from all angles Vizio left me hanging.At the end Vizio denies any warranty, it should have 11 months left on it, according to Vizio I purchased it through an "unauthorized dealer" and offered only a repair shops telephone number to get a $150 TV fixed at my own cost, which was ludicrous to even offer.So Vizio doesn't stand behind their product, their warranty, their name.US based company, JD Power Rated for customer satisfaction, laughable. Never ever again a Vizio.Update:Contacted the seller, who offered warranty and is providing a fedex label for return.

Reviews.Title: Crappy Stand
Reviews.Author: Unnamed
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my father who is in a senior apartment, he has a cat. the cat knocks the tv over repeatedly just by slightly brushing by because the stand is terribly designed.  when I put it together, and set it on the stand, I just lightly tapped it with my hand and it wobbled, like one of those inflatable punching ball clowns.  and the stand was ridiculous to assemble, the screws have to be in this long narrow channel, that you have to guess if they are in or not, because you cant see them down the long tunnel.  long story short, stand is crap, will absolutely fall over, even if you're just dusting by the tv, or if you're adjusting the cables, any slight touch will send it over.  the tv is fine, if you can keep in a standing position.

Reviews.Title: Really Nice
Reviews.Author: Dan and Sherri from PA
