Reviews.Content: This tv really looks good in our living room, just the right size, it doesn't take over the room. has a great picture and sound. I would recommend this to those who want a big tv at an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: TVJunkie
Reviews.Content: This TV has been great.  It fits perfectly in our media stand and looks amazing.  The HD is clear, colorful and the image is sharp.

Reviews.Title: Got this TV for the Bedroom
Reviews.Author: Laura K. Fox
Reviews.Content: This is a crazy good TV.  The viewing portion of this TV is amazing.  Very little rim area.  The picture is really nice.  Great all around.

Reviews.Title: 32" Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: alco
Reviews.Content: Great size TV for the bedroom.  Sharp, bright picture with great color.  Definitely pleased with it.  Would positively recommend it.Good Value, too.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: AaronD
Reviews.Content: its not a terrible set by any means. the sound is great for being an LED, and the picture quality is okay. the only thing ive noticed is that there seems to be a bit of picture noise with video games and blu rays. but for the price, you cant beat it. love the style to this particular set as well.

Reviews.Title: JUNK!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carrie H.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv for my daughter for Christmas, 2 months later it just stopped working... I took it to a local repair shoo because of course it did not come with any warranty information and as far as I can tell I only had 30 days to return it.  Anyway, the motherboard is fried after only two months of use.  Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: Vizio e221-a1 22 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV at Walmart for full price on May 5, 2013. It worked well for about 9 months until it started having issues. The screen turns solid white during operation and remains that way for hours. Sometimes a restart will fix it temporarily, sometimes it will not. Vizio customer service is fast and easy to talk to. I really appreciate the employees in the call centers. Even though the people are nice, what I was offered as a solution was not. I would have to pay for shipping my faulty TV to them and be without it for an estimated month. After they receive the TV and decide to send me another, it will be a used TV that was received as a return. Is this TV worth the money for as long as it lasts? Not to mention that I will have spent more time and money just to get a used TV in the long run. Be cautious when selecting a lower priced TV. Imagine spending full price for a TV to later spend more for it to become a used TV. Nine months of usage is not worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: Notthing good to say!
Reviews.Author: Kid Twist
Reviews.Content: That's not true, the TV fits perfectly in our entertainment center. It also has a terrible, purplish picture when views from any angle other than straight on. It's also dim, even with optimum settings. It's really cheap and still not worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Picture is ok but audio is awful
Reviews.Author: M Landheer
Reviews.Content: The audio on the TV changes every few minutes requiring you to adjust the volume all the time.  I called Vizio for technical support, but they were no help, referring me to the user manual instead.  Will never buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: Corynne Hoefner
Reviews.Content: Received on time and works great!  Easy to set up and no malfunctions so far.  I have owned one vizio TV for 4 years, so when I wanted a secondary TV the choice was simple.  I hope this new generation TV will last just as long.  The first TV is still functioning wonderfully and with great quality picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Love it so far
Reviews.Author: Godisgreat7
Reviews.Content: I have had the 42inch for only a short while but so far I love it. Picture is great and the sound is great. Those are the 2 things that I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Rocks!
Reviews.Author: Mark Leveck "mlv//"
Reviews.Content: We loved our 39" Visio so much, this 29" addition to the family room was a no brainer. Both sets are rock solid after 6mo/1year and Visio is a great brand

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320-A1 does not have a PC VGA input
Reviews.Author: L. Benson "SoundMan"
Reviews.Content: Just be aware Amazon does not list the entire specs on these TV's and This model does NOT come with a PC or VGA input for use with a computer feed.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO LED
Reviews.Author: Allen F. Baum
Reviews.Content: I have seen many TVs in bars and restaurants and the best ones always seem to be Vizio.  The quality of the picture and the sound are worth the investment if you are looking for a good quality TV that doesn't have all of the gadgets.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great colors, great tv
Reviews.Author: hp210
Reviews.Content: We bought this to use outside on our deck to watch baseball in the evenings. We store it inside when not watching it (because it's very very bad for non all weather televisions to sit outside, obviously). We didn't want to spend much money as we fully anticipate watching it outside will eventually ruin the tv, and I'm amazed at what a great tv you can get for under $200 these days.The size is good for our needs, colors are true, and it's incredibly lightweight. We hook it up to an external speaker system, so we haven't had a problem with the sound cutting out as some people mentioned. Also we have direct tv, and I think it's an issue with certain cable providers, so either way, I think we'd be fine.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size for my bedroom
Reviews.Author: Layne Newman "theatercritic"
Reviews.Content: I had previously purchased the 42 Vizio for my living room and loved it, so when the time came to replace the TV in my bedroom, I naturally turned to something I knew and was comfortable with. Great color and clarity and just the right size to sit at the end of my bed without being obtrusive. So far the quality has not failed me.  I couldnt be happier.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture -- but
Reviews.Author: PlayChess
Reviews.Content: Selected this TV because it would fit in the cabinet that held my old 36" tube tv.  It has a slim frame that allowed it to fit where other 37" flat-screens would not.  Would have preferred 1080p and selected a higher end tv had I found one that would fit at this screen size.Main complaint while the tv worked was poor (tinny) speakers.  I might have bought external speakers for it had it continued to work... but after about 2 weeks of use the picture suddenly rotated 180 degrees.  At first I thought I had accidently put it in a different mode that wasn't explained in the manual.  But after several factory resets and looking at every option I called Vizio Support.  Or should I call them Vizio lack-of-Support.The online and phone operators didn't seem knowledgable or helpful.  They both read from a very rehearsed script and asked me questions that didn't even pertain to the problem.  I gave up with them and called Amazon instead.The Amazon support person seemed more knowledgeable and helpful.  Unfortunately we still were not able to resolve the problem.  Amazon expedited a replacement to me in less than 2 days.  Way to go Amazon!  Vizio... not so much.3 Stars for the Vizio TV, 1 Star for Vizio Service = 2 Stars Overall.

Reviews.Title: Color Problems
Reviews.Author: Bob, Lake Wales Florida
Reviews.Content: I have had the set for 1 month and have not yet been able to adjust the color properly. Picture is sharp and clear on HD channels but the colors seem a bit washed out.

Reviews.Title: Vizio television was loved.
Reviews.Author: Darlene Madjerich
Reviews.Content: Very nice television, sound and picture quality amazing.  I made one young man very happy.  A great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very solid TV
Reviews.Author: Robert G. Ballen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV because it was the largest screen that I could fit in an existing cabinet.  Picture (including for fast action sports) and sound are just fine.  I use it in the master bedroom and like that the picture brightness automatically adjusts when I turn the lights out.  I did not find the set up with the stand or the slight upward tilt of the TV to be an issue, about which others have raised concerns.  The TV also works with wireless headphones (using the TV headphone jack, not the audio output), although the TV external speakers automatically turn off when the headphones are plugged in, regardless of whether you set in the menu the external speakers to On or Off.  This would be a problem for you if you want to watch the TV with headphones and another wants to watch the TV without the headphones.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love all things Vizio.  They really give you bang for your buck.  This TV has a great picture and sound.  I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very nice television, terrible stand.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Pro's:  The TV itself is great.  Great colors, crisp pictures, stylish design with narrow edges around the screen is all terrific.  Interface is easy to use and set up.Con's:  The only problem I see with this set so far is the stand.  This obviously won't be a problem if you're going to wall mount the set.  I'm going to just have to buy a separate stand or wall mount.  The provided stand is basically a fancy kickstand for the TV.  The TV itself rests on the surface, and there is no way to adjust the angle of the television or raise it off the surface with the provided stand.

Reviews.Title: its not exactly the same as i see in the their official web site
Reviews.Author: Yining
Reviews.Content: can not connect to the internet, but the price is coolcan use my USB device to see pictures, but don't know how to listen music.anyway, it worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 24" tv Razor LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: R Murrell
Reviews.Content: The tv is very nice, works perfect!!! The only complaint my son has is that the tv sits at horizontal angle and is hard to see clearly while laying on his bed. Will probably have to buy a wall mount since the stand the tv comes with leans it back to far

Reviews.Title: Best. TV. Ever.
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I will only ever purchase Vizios from here on out.  We have this 29" in Master bedroom wall mounted, 32" in Living Room in entertainment center and 60" in basement wall mounted.  This is a perfect size for our bedroom and having it wall mounted makes it perfect.  We tried the 32" first but it was just a bit too big.  A much better fit in the living room.  This 29" is perfect.  Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Value Monitor/TV
Reviews.Author: Tens Therapy PNW
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a 720p 32" monitor/tv that was taking up way too much space on my desk (moved that into the guest bedroom). This 24" wide screen is the perfect size, not overbearing, and looks great. I mounted it on the wall in my office to free up space on my desk. The picture quality is clear and most importantly the price was affordable compared to buying a regular computer monitor for $500+. Only con would be one hdmi hookup in the back, but if you are only going to use it as a monitor then you're o.k.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: Excellent color & clarity.  Fits nicely where I placed it.  Easy set up.  Initially bought a 22" JVC at Sam's Club.  Got it home and had difficulty setting it up with the DirecTv remote.  When I called JVC for help, found out they didn't build it but they had given some other company (that I had never heard of) a license to use their name.  Immediately returned it to Sam's Club.  Was going to get a Vizio there but they didn't have what I wanted.  I already had 2 other Vizio TV's & love them.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV Review
Reviews.Author: James P Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Original one ordered would not power on. Contacted Amazon and they replaced it with another of same model. This one powers on but am having trouble getting proper color in the picture.

Reviews.Title: Does both well
Reviews.Author: Graybear "Graybear"
Reviews.Content: I needed a TV (preferred HD) and a computer monitor in the same room - a guest room/den.  This does both admirably.  I use it mostly with the computer.  It's bigger than my old monitor, very clear, hooks up to computer easily, and changes to TV with a couple of buttons on the remote.  Im satisfied.

Reviews.Title: It fills the same space as a 27" CRT TV
Reviews.Author: Zargon "gadget user"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for one reason; it is the biggest flat screen TV that fits in the same hole as my old 27" CRT TV.PROS- It fills the same space as a 27" CRT TV (edge-to-edge).  Top-to-bottom it is much shorter.- Setup was very easy.CONS- The TV reduces the range of my remotes from over 30 feet to less than 10 feet (both Philips and Panasonic).  Based on a comment on a video board, I turned off the Ambient Light Sensor and all of the remotes are back to full range.  I never would have guessed to turn it off in a million years.- The picture has a blue tint, adjusting the TV doesn't change it.  It is reminiscent of the blue glow of CRT TVs.- Sound is tinny (as it is on most flat screens).- The stand makes it sit really low.  Also no tilt.  It was another $50.00 to MCM for a "desktop" stand that would raise it up for viewing.

Reviews.Title: 32" Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Priscilla A Fontaine
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with this product 32" Vizio TV.  Good picture, easy to operate.  I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: This item is excellent ...
Reviews.Author: an
Reviews.Content: Hi !I bought this item in the Thank's Giving . It works very good . The picture is excellent .Thank you a lot .

Reviews.Title: So far So Good
Reviews.Author: Davida Disaster
Reviews.Content: My husband surprised me with this one and so far everythings good. It's has nice picture quality and I love the remote.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for our Motorhome
Reviews.Author: all across america
Reviews.Content: Would have rated this 5 stars but have trouble giving that rating to anything.  We have a motorhome and about 4 years ago we changed our old style tube TV for a a 22 in Samsung.  We did minimal cabinet modification and it did OK. Looking for a replacement for the Samsung was difficult because most smaller TVs are pretty thick and 32 inch was too big without cabinet modification.We are very happy with this 29 in Vizio.  Of course it is bigger but it is also lighter, thinner with much better sound a very nice picture.  When we bought it from Amazon, there were no reviews so we were nervous.  It fits the bill for us and we highly recommend this Vizio.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: Billy Mosher
Reviews.Content: good product.  really liked it.  every thing i expected and more.  very easy setup.  we expect to purchase one more for the bed room of the rv

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Dimples
Reviews.Content: It fits well with my sound bar and the picture is great.  Still trying to get a USB Chromecast adapter to work with it.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful product
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Beautiful product for the price, the best you can get for it.it is an hdtv that is the best i have ever had.i will continue to buy from vizio, as they make great products.

Reviews.Title: Content
Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: Its a nice tv for a small living room. It has a great style too it. The two things I dislike, were the packaging and the slant the tv has once you set it up. The tv came with no directions nothing. Hell i am sure this tv,  can do other things I just do not know because there is no guide.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: Norman Shackelford
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. I'd  highly recommend an RCA antenna or signal booster WITH ANY antenna. The TV and the remote BOTH work for now.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Priscilla Pettingell
Reviews.Content: I purchased my TV and when it arrived, a friend came and put it up.  It is the best TV I own and when I purchase my next electronic purchase I will be sure to check with Amazon first then compare prices with other locations and will probably go back to Amazon and purchase.  The picture is fantastic, the sound is great.  Overall the best.

Reviews.Title: Tv RTS to senderas it was an oder stopped and it wasn't. Sender received and signed for it on May 15. Card still charged.
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: Returned both ordered. One was coming too late and the other was for a friend that already purchased online. RTD to senders on one I asked not to send and was coming anyway. Sender received it back on May 15 with signature and credit card still changed with no credit. Had plenty of time to submit credit and didn't. With be disputing charge as it is still on my bill. Just not right. I spend a lot of money every month on Amazon for this. You want people to spend too much time reviewing things.

Reviews.Title: Happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: B. Briola "ByBil"
Reviews.Content: Not the best picture or sound but by far not the worst. I think considering how much I paid for it I am very happy with the quality.

Reviews.Title: Good as a TV, not-so-good as a monitor
Reviews.Author: Brian Guinitaran
Reviews.Content: At least with a Mac Mini, the only way to get this function well as a monitor is to buy an Apple-branded displayport-to-VGA adapter.  Using the HDMI-out will produce horrible contrast that cannot be corrected through any adjustments in both software and hardware.The same HDMI connection to the TV, however, does produce decent HD video via a cable box.  Controls are fairly simple, and this can be paired with a decent monitor arm due to its size and weight.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Billieg
Reviews.Content: Vizio make a great TV with bright screens and a great picture. This is the third one I bought. The only con is the speakers. They are not very good. One of the best TV's for the money. Go to Walmart and see the difference in the picture between Virizo's and others then come back to Amazon and get a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: norm sherents
Reviews.Content: This tv seemed nice. For 2 days it worked great. Then NOTHING. NO PIC, NO AUDIO..returned and got another one. Same issue as the first one but it died after about a week. I will say, this tv smells slightly better than actual garbage. So that's a plus.

Reviews.Title: Crisp picture with excellent dynamic range
Reviews.Author: tvgnus
Reviews.Content: Frankly, given the price, we didn't expect much and planned to use this as a second set.  But the excellent, razor-sharp picture with its remarkable color earned it a spot in the family room.Setting it up could not have been easier. It quickly scans for channels (we've gone back to using an antenna) and picks up all that put a signal overhead.Only drawback, if that, is that the remote is smallish for largish hands. Also, like so much of the world of electronics, black is the operative color. Would it be too much to have often-used keys, such as the MUTE-THE-@#$%-THING button be in a bright color?

Reviews.Title: Saved a lot of money
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: Saved a lot of money TV came packaged like a NEW NEVER OPENED TV. Has not EVER given me a single problem.

Reviews.Title: LED screen
Reviews.Author: Tami
Reviews.Content: Great looking screen.  Use it to hook a laptop too as a second screen.  Have now ordered multiple ones for the office.

Reviews.Title: Not Built to Last
Reviews.Author: J Taylor
Reviews.Content: After 14 months of standard use, the unit no longer would power up; may be able to repair a capacitor, but expected more from this investment than one year of reliable use.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Matthews
Reviews.Content: Ecellent TV and features.. Size is perfect for being close without burning out ones eyes. Picture is excellent. Sound on this is amazing loud and very good tone quaility. Also I took th eback cover off, only to 8x8 inch circuit boards, which are very well soldered and looks very easy to replace if need be iin years to come.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ellen
Reviews.Content: This was a refurbished model. I could not tell it at all. It came in just a few days. Packaged as if it was brand new. Not a scratch or mark of any kind. The picture is far more brilliant then my last flat screen. It only has two HMDI ports which can be a problem if you attach a lot of electronics to your T.V.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 24" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mry Hol
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for a home office.  Picture sharp and clear with amazing colors.  For the price, an ideal unit for a bedroom or office

Reviews.Title: Great picture, good sound
Reviews.Author: Robert Myers
Reviews.Content: Monitor itself is a good product with a clear picture and acceptable sound quality. No cracking with high pitch/volume as experienced with other similar monitors. Major complaint is the back stand which seems very flimsy and could break easily if it was ever tipped over but that has not happened as of yet. Would be better if you wall mounted it which is available on this model.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Morgan Sheridan "morgansher"
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV to replace an old analog TV that was incompatible with a new DVD player we'd purchased.  We chose it after reviewing several other TVs and after seeing our friend's Vizio sets and how nicely they work.  We're not hard core TV or movie enthusiasts, but this TV is going to be with us for quite a long time.

Reviews.Title: Grat Price
Reviews.Author: dperk
Reviews.Content: I Bought it as a gift for my son, he loves it and I loved the price, easy set-up.  Great item

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Many Interests
Reviews.Content: This is a good quality television with a nice picture.  It does not have all the bells and whistles of some of the higher end models, but for a child's room or guest room, it is great.

Reviews.Title: Geart  TV
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Woodward
Reviews.Content: This tv was a great price and has a excellent picture.  I would recommend this purchase to everyone. Awesome deal

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E241-A1 24-inch 1080p 60HZ Razor LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Hershel G.
Reviews.Content: I bought it a year ago for my wife she wanted a little tv for the computator room. She loves it, works great good picture and no problems so far. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: Customer
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with this tv. Does not contain all of the functionality of the more expensive models but didn't cost as much. Only giving 4 stars on account of the remote which could use some work. Some of the remote buttons do not work well and need to be pushed several times.

Reviews.Title: Good lil tv
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the garage and it works great good sound and picture. I would reccomend this for a kids room tv also due to its easy to use remote

Reviews.Title: Oh, do I like this!
Reviews.Author: Helen Mayer
Reviews.Content: I never had a flat screen before, and I thought it was time to bring myself into the 21st century.  I love it!  I like the sleep function on it, and I bought a Chromecast (from Amazon) so I could watch Netflix on it. I initially bought this so I could get a digital antenna and lose my monthly cable bill, and that alone will pay for the (very reasonably priced) Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Michael Mutch
Reviews.Content: Sharp image, lots of video inputs.  Excellent sound quality.  Remote reception is a bit picky.  Look less than 10 minutes to setup.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Tara R Timpone
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this model, especially for the price. It exceeded or meet all of my expectations. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: What a Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ken "Bugmanken"
Reviews.Content: Great price, great features, perfect for my use. This TV is used in my RV and is durable and perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Gina Ann
Reviews.Content: Even though I do not have it hooked up to cable HD, the picture is quite good.  Love the built in tilt holder, perfect for that small bedroom.

Reviews.Title: great quality tv
Reviews.Author: Freya Heick
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. It's a good size and crystal clear. The only problem is that on the very far right edge the image is slightly distorted. My guess the screen was hit during shipping. It's a minimal issue and I can ignore it. I am still happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Broke After 7 months
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: The screen stopped working after 7 months, you need to pay for shipping when requesting a fix.Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good TV
Reviews.Author: P. Metts
Reviews.Content: The colors are bright and the whites are very white.The only issues I found are: 1) it reports as a 1080i native display when used as a PC monitor; 2) the blacks are a little washed out with some minor light leakage along the bottom.

Reviews.Title: Power issues
Reviews.Author: toodledoo
Reviews.Content: I bought this in August, started having problems in January, and by May it was dead. I bought it refurbished so it only had a 90-day warranty.First, the sound would quit. When I turned off the power and turned it back on, the sound came back fine. Then, I started having problems with the power; randomly, it just wouldn't turn on. I could unplug the power cord and plug it back in, repeat a couple of times, and eventually it came back on. We finally just left it on all the time; but after about a month of that, it died all together. It's a piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: It fits me
Reviews.Author: Keith Conklin
Reviews.Content: I have to say I have never had a Vizio TV before, but this unit surpasses anything I have ever had.  The color is great and the picture astounding. I have to say that I am extremely happy with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Sandy "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: I thought my old 27" TV was good, until I saw the fantastic picture on the Vizio, even the sound is good. A bargain at the price.

Reviews.Title: Great as a 2nd monitor
Reviews.Author: mike juha
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a 2nd monitor for my desktop.  It works great as a 1920x1080 monitor, and also lets me view TV broadcasts.  I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Be extra careful
Reviews.Author: David L Litten
Reviews.Content: The TV is fine however it did not have the parts required to stand on a  table.. When requested from Vizio was informed  unit was not in warranty so parts could not provided and that TV had been sold by unauthorized seller. Bottom line be careful when an Amazon purchase is shipped by second party you may not receive what you think you ordered!!!

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: N. Hubbell
Reviews.Content: This is an unbelievably good TV for an extremely low price. My son didn't program the channels properly, so I'm not sure how many channels it can hold, but the picture is good and it's a great size and price for a teenager.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: I haven't had any problem with this TV. The color is beautiful, the sound is even, doesn't get louder during commercial. Easy hook up, works great with my smart Blu Ray DVD player. Good quality for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Vizio - perfect choice!
Reviews.Author: Wendy Wozniak
Reviews.Content: Amazing picture, easy set up, not a single issue! Great price, great television! Can't miss with this especially if space is a concern.

Reviews.Title: Did what I expected
Reviews.Author: James C. Thomson
Reviews.Content: after receiving the 1st one broken, I was worried how the 2nd would arrive, it was OKOn hidef great picture, good sound...

Reviews.Title: 24" Vizio E241-A1 1080p 60hz LED
Reviews.Author: Chad Schafer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to use as a computer monitor. Package arrived, unboxed it and had it set up in 15 mins. The design is very slim and lightweight with forward facing speakers and the stand that many dislike is fine for the 24" model, seems sturdy to me. After choosing vivid mode and a few other minor adjustments the picture is stunning at 1080p, really breathtaking. The picture is bright, well back lit and is a clear as can be. As a monitor it works great, switched to wide screen mode and it runs 1900x1080 and uses the entire display area w/o distortion. Overall I am very pleased with price vs performance of this vizio and would recommend it to anyone looking for this size LED tv.

Reviews.Title: Love IT!!
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: Great image! Love this television. I was not sure at first, because I never heard of VIZIO, but the image is so clear and the quality is great. Good on electricity

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Brandywine Jim "Jim"
Reviews.Content: I'm really pleased at how easy it was to set up (a few hex screws for the base, answer two on screen questions and it's ready), how light it is and how good the picture is. It is a little hard to see in a well lit room, though. Not sure if that's particular to this tv as I have no previous there with which to compare.I didn't find any other 39"ers near the price - $222, $285 with coast to coast shipping.

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: Ryan Broussard
Reviews.Content: Audio is terrible.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: Love it! Its a T.V with great sound and great picture. Does everything I need it to do! Would order again.

Reviews.Title: I like the quality of this product.
Reviews.Author: Ivan Dudin
Reviews.Content: I like the quality of this product.I recommend buying this product to everyone.I'm glad I bought this product!

Reviews.Title: very good Vizio.
Reviews.Author: SHIG
Reviews.Content: very good everything!I love it and I recommended everyone.Thank you very much Vizio E221-A1 22-inch LED HDTV, I am happy.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Hiromi Kumamaru
Reviews.Content: There is no problem to watch the TV. I think this one is good one. I am pretty happy to this TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture
Reviews.Author: Denbouch "Dennis"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the bedroom and I'm very happy with the picture. It's much better than the $900.00 TV I have in the Living room.I would definitely recommend this TV. The colors are vivid and the sharpness is phenomenal. Vizio has the best TV on the market as far as I'm concerned.

Reviews.Title: Great tv.
Reviews.Author: Edd
Reviews.Content: Great television and my second vizio. Amazing picture when connected to HD. Sound quality is pretty good. Would definitely purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: My New TV
Reviews.Author: Elaine Simpson
Reviews.Content: It fits on my dresser better than my old clunky set and has a great picture, especially in Hi Def

Reviews.Title: An adjusting arm for my tv
Reviews.Author: gjweis
Reviews.Content: It worked very well and it was not to bad in installing it and just a few tools were needed.  The price was right and the shipping was free.

Reviews.Title: Not disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Kirby Ommen
Reviews.Content: It's a pretty fantastic deal for the money. And it's a Vizio, so you know it's high quality stuff. Not the biggest TV out there, but definitely the most bang for your buck. It's big enough to watch from a distance, but small enough to not look obscene. If it ever breaks in the future, I want another one just like it.

Reviews.Title: Great and pleasant purchase. Expedited shipping worth the money to have next day.
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Finally purchased my first flat screen tv and is very happy! No hassles or complaints. Didn't know the 32'' was this size, but i know what to get next time. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: CMay "Carol"
Reviews.Content: I had a 32" flat screen I bought 5 yrs ago. This new 42" was much lighter, thinner and SO clear! It was actually no higher than the smaller TV but the thin edges gives a beautiful picture.I order it 3 days before Superbowl and I got it in 2-days. VERY Happy! Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: HDTV
Reviews.Author: Bob Holcomb
Reviews.Content: Great TV and great price.Exceeded our hopes and have used it everyday and could not ask for more.  Very hapy

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, no problems thus far.
Reviews.Author: Jarred
Reviews.Content: I got this T.V a little over 5-6 months ago, and let me be bold and say that this television is amazing.I myself use it for gaming primarily, but I also watch Netflix and Blue-Rays/DVD's. Being somewhat of a 'perfectionist', I enjoy a high quality viewing experience.If you are going to mount it on a wall, make sure ALMOST everything is hooked up first. There is little to no room to work with behind the television while it is mounted (Unless of course you have a full motion mount).I will in fact recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a good 32-inch TV. Cheers!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Shelly Reidinger
Reviews.Content: Great and easy to setup, size perfect it was for a kids room. Picture is great on regular cable source

Reviews.Title: TV okay Stand poor.
Reviews.Author: Garden Girl
Reviews.Content: The overall picture quality is good and sound is very strong. However the stand the TV comes with cocks the set backwards at a funny angle which effect the viewing. The stand is poorly designed in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Great !!!
Reviews.Author: ladybell86
Reviews.Content: Love! Love! This Telly. The picture quality is absolutely beautiful. I would recommend this product to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: pond maker
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my CCTV camera monitor. Works great can fit all my eight cameras on the entire screen. Will recommend this product. It's my second year with the tv and it works great

Reviews.Title: My husband LOVES it!
Reviews.Author: GLD
Reviews.Content: We had a smaller screen for several years and it didn't matter much to me because I don't watch a lot of TV except for the news. But my husband is a sports addict, and he LOVES his new VIZIO screen! It installed easily and has had no problems since we purchased it almost a year ago. He also used a earphone set so only HE can hear the TV and enjoy the loud sports announcers, commercials, etc.  we're both happy.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Thought I ordered the smart 24 inch Vizio but when it arrived I realized that I ordered this one.  I am not that technological advanced so I kept this TV.  Picture is great, easy to set up and small enough to take with you if the need me.  It is the 3rd Vizio I have purchased in the last 2 years.  Great TV for the money and my next one will be a Vizio.  The other 2 TV's are smart TV's but I rarely use the internet with them anyway so good purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great television
Reviews.Author: Andrei420
Reviews.Content: I love it, was a cheap TV and it looks delightful, great colors, and also light resolution.Big screen, send it fast.

Reviews.Title: Reliable tv
Reviews.Author: michael schyljuk
Reviews.Content: I use these tvs exclusively for my digital sign business. Great tv at a low price point. Nice picture with plenty of adjustments and good colors. I have seven of these running 24/7 and no problems in the first six months running. I have to open these up to make a small modification and the internal electronics are good quality. Would recommend this tv over any other less expensive tv.

Reviews.Title: I love my TV!
Reviews.Author: Candi Cabral
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  I even was able to set up the wall mount on my own and hang it with no help.  Easy to set up and the picture is great.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Charlene A. Scheib
Reviews.Content: Amazing picture beautiful clarity perfect for our bedroom to fit in our bed that has the TV come out of it

Reviews.Title: Vizio is Great!
Reviews.Author: Carla DeRise "KlubKid"
Reviews.Content: Love this tv! Great product for the price that I paid! I also got the Vizio Soundbar to go with it! Would definitely recommend this product to others!

Reviews.Title: Kool little TV
Reviews.Author: dclady
Reviews.Content: I love the TV. Great for small spaces. The only peeve my husband had we the sound, but he is use to the stone age TVs! At any rate, Great picture! Even though I need advice for setting the picture settings. I love my new lit' TV! Hope it lasts!

Reviews.Title: No surprises
Reviews.Author: skipper
Reviews.Content: Mounted to old hall "stand" without issues.Adjusted picture quality; no issues.Sound is a bit poor, but just turned it upWorks

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Waliocoolioflo
Reviews.Content: The TV works as advertised I'm digging it. The HD is on point. The SRS works very well. I'm actually very surprised how great the picture is considering the size of the TV, it's very nice. The stand it comes with is super easy to attach to the back of the TV all you need is a small screwdriver and about 5 minutes of your time.Actually my only issue came about when my TV got to my house there was no remote Lmao! Now I laugh, but at the time I was very pissed because it's like, as a shipper how could you forget to include the remote when you're shipping a frekin TV... But hey everybody makes mistakes and they actually sent it to me in about 4 days with batteries included, so yeah it worked out in the end. I'm very satisfied with this product... It was worth every dollar I spent..Side Note: The pictures they show are all accurate BESIDES the one where it has tv functional buttons on the side. That is FALSE! The only button this TV has on the side or back is for powering on/off.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Chris callahan
Reviews.Content: My daughter needed a new TV and this fit the need and the price.  She is very Happy.  Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: T. Eleuteri
Reviews.Content: The tv came quickly and it color is good. It was packed well and with it being a cheaper option I think we got our moneys worth.

Reviews.Title: Very good picture!
Reviews.Author: Tom E. COTE
Reviews.Content: Performance is very good.  Would have liked a more inclusive manual. Otherwise, no complaints.  That's all I have to say.

Reviews.Title: This is a good, small, smart TV But....
Reviews.Author: James R Burke
Reviews.Content: This is a good, small, smart TV but the sound quality isn't the best. The sound quality is like it is coming from a really tiny speaker....it sounds really tinny....(if tinny is a real word). Other than the sound, it's a great TV

Reviews.Title: TV Bliss
Reviews.Author: brhunt
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Easy to learn how to operate.  Nice addition to my home.  Looked at several of the top sellers and decided this was the best for my money.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E420-A0 42-inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Alin Raven
Reviews.Content: I love this TV! Its inexpensive and it works GREAT! the picture is clear. I have left things on it for house and the image didn't burn into the screen. it has the HDMI ports and it looks nice!

Reviews.Title: Master Bedroom TV for my retirement home.
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: I bought a Vizio TV for the den of our retirement home. I liked the quality of the picture and the ease of setting it up.  I bought a second Vizio TV for the master bedroom, which didn't work and had no trouble returning it however, a replacement was not available. I waited a couple of weeks and purchased another one and I am satisfied with it's performance. It is the same quality as the first one I bought and the packaging was not damaged on delivery.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: sidhartha
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these from Amazon Warehouse expecting them to be slightly used. I was surprised to find them in an untouched condition. I have been using these as my primary and secondary computer monitors. So far they have worked flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Good Price
Reviews.Author: Jamaica
Reviews.Content: This was a good price but the picture quality was not clear.  I like the TV just wish the picture quality was clearer.

Reviews.Title: Picture Characteristics
Reviews.Author: Patrice E. Kindle
Reviews.Content: Because I do not yet have a HD dish or receiver picture contrast is not the best and color is dull.  I imagine when I get HD service these will improve.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 24 inch TV and Monitor
Reviews.Author: David C. Bauer
Reviews.Content: VIZIO makes a good quality product at a reasonable price.  I own a couple of VIZIO TVs and have never had a problem with them.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Perfect size, great picture, sleek look, quick, easy set-up, great value and on time at the door delivery. Great choice!

Reviews.Title: Works for the price.
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Not the best audio but for the price you can't beat it. comes with a mount to stabilize the TV, but the mount is not very sturdy so hope you can bolt it down to something or you might wake up with the TV face down.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Curt Weber
Reviews.Content: Didn't like the way it leaned back on it's stand, and the video quality was so so. I returned it.

Reviews.Title: The true test of service is when things don't work correctly...
Reviews.Author: Phil Singleton
Reviews.Content: ...this TV was delivered with single a bad pixel, which caused a permanent line across the video which was very noticeable and annoying. Amazon replaced the TV, no questions asked, no hassle, no extra costs. I had the replacement TV before I could return the original...restored my faith in online shopping!

Reviews.Title: Nice picture, tinny sound.
Reviews.Author: John Ewert
Reviews.Content: Amazingly this is our first flat screen TV. We have a relative that has a 37" Vizio and it is a very nice set with decent sound. We thought we'd be safe with a Vizio but are somewhat disappointed with the sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Taylor "Taylor D. Woullard"
Reviews.Content: I had ordered this product on the first of march and just recieved it today on the 6th,pretty fast delivery for the most part. It has an easy set up and menu, easy programming. The picture isn't the best i've seen but for just paying 100+ for it , it has a decent picture. The volume is pretty good and loud, and also clear. Plus i like how slim the vizio , so looks are a plus.Yes , i would recommend people to get this t.v.Very affordable and nicegreat for small families and a Room or kitchen t.v.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: ASHLEY O.
Reviews.Content: Thank you Amazon Prime! I loved getting a discount on this TV, but I would still be satisfied with it regardless. Good sound, great picture, and a good size. I am happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: Shadow Mom
Reviews.Content: HBTV came out of the box pluged in and added Blueray DVD and was ready to enjoy.  Has good picture, easy to operate.  This TV was just what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Great  Tv
Reviews.Author: Bernadette McDaniel "Knitchickie"
Reviews.Content: I  bought  this  for  the  living room  and  the  picture is outstanding!  I  am  very  happy  with it.  I  would  recommend

Reviews.Title: Nice HDTV
Reviews.Author: Craig Tieman

Reviews.Title: Great Picture...but...24" vizio review
Reviews.Author: Faja4x
Reviews.Content: Overall I am pretty pleased with the unit.  Essentially I got this around president's day and the price was at least $45 lower so it was really a no brainer of a purchase.I am really happy with the picture...both standard and HD stations are really good and the colors are accurate.  Far more accurate than a 22" samsung that this unit replaces.But the samsung kept the relative screen sizing for the analog and digital channels.  What does this mean.  Well, these days, most stations have adjusted their analog stations to have a bar at the top so you can zoom and get a full picture without loosing much real estate.  And you can zoom with this set, but it stays on zoom when you then change to a digital station.  The samsung did not do that.  It is annoying to have to change it.  But I can live with it.I have no clue about the sound because I never tried it.  Hooked up a pair of Bose silver desktop speakers and had to turn the base down (it was nice that it had this option) on the equalizer settings.  So I have nice full sound with the bose.  Tough to get good sound with flat panels, especially small ones.No favorites on the remote.  Really?  Again, not the end of the world but really?  I watch like 3 stations on this kitchen tv and having favorites is very helpful.Lastly, the smell was overpowering.  It was really stunning how strong of a plastic smell there was.  I ended up lightly spritzing the plastic with Fabreeze where able without getting into the electronics or on the panel and rubbing it in.  Worked pretty well to reduce it dramatically.  Still, there was a hint of plastic smell even a week later.But, for what I paid...it deserves at least 4 stars.  The colors on the Samsung were pathetic.

Reviews.Content: This TV came packaged excellent! It delivered on time and quick. I bought this TV specifically for better quality overall which you can clearly see picture crystal clear. Also the TV looked brand new, there were absolutely no marks or wear on it whatsoever. The 24 inch is a decent size for any child, teen, or dorm room and I know you will not be dissapointed. Thought I'd save someone the headache of having to return it like I do!

Reviews.Title: Good general purpose Vizio HDTV
Reviews.Author: JackSan
Reviews.Content: I shopped around for this size and price television for quite a while during the Black Friday time period.  I got tired of local box stores raising and lowering prices every week and decided to save about $30 in sales tax.  Amazon has a good reputation, competitive prices, free shipping, and a good return policy so I decided to buy from them.At first I was going to get the "smart TV"  with streaming applications but then decided on this 'unsmart' version.  I also  wanted a Blu Ray dvd player so I bought one with "smart" streaming applications.  I only wish the TV had 3 hdmi inputs rather than the two it has.  I also think the sound has improved, especially from smaller models.I'm very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Hot Buy!

I'm excited because Vizio puts out a great product, I compare them to other top TV's.I would recommend this TV to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Vizio #241-A1 24-inch 1080p Razor LED HDTV 2013 model
Reviews.Author: C Bean
Reviews.Content: Pros -It has a good looking picture and is easy to program.Cons - The stand when used lets the TV tilt back just enough that the screen seems a little darker than it actually is.I was a little disappointed but it was really my fault because I looked at so many online that I actually mixed up the specs from one TV with this one. I was expecting it to have wireless capabilities and this one was not the one that had wifi. The only reason I am telling this is to warn others out there that comparison shop online and lose focus. It pays to double check and be sure you order the one with all the specs that you are interested in. All in all it is a descent TV and a lot better than the hundred pound dinosaur it replaced. And the price was descent as well.

Reviews.Title: Good picture

Reviews.Content: We are not techies so a friend installed our new Vizio for us.  We love it.  It requires two clickers but that's OK.  It is worth it!!

Reviews.Title: A lot bigger than I imagined
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  Its the perfect size for my living room.  The picture is really nice!  I was surprised with the excellent sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Not a TV for antenna use
Reviews.Author: S. Porter
Reviews.Content: We live in a fringe over the air reception area. This TV will not pull in broadcast stations that our Apex will when hooked to the same antenna . We recieve seven stations with the Apex but only two with the Vizio, very disappointing. It works OK with a disc player and the two stations that it will bring in. Wish I had not bought it.

Reviews.Title: 4 out of 5 Stars
Reviews.Author: LEON R. MORRIS
Reviews.Content: Purchased a Vizio E-420-A0 42 inch television the advertising displayed with the listing indicated that this model of television set included the Smart TV function of which this television when delivered did not include. This must of been an older model as the current models do include that Smart TV function. Overall I am satisfied with the televsion set but I had been shopped for one with the Smart TV function of which this was not so I am a little disappointed as it was a gift for my wife that did not work out as planned. This is the reason that only four stars can be given rather than five. What I thought was a great deal turned out to be an Ok deal as I had seen other sets priced at the same or less without the Smart TV function.

Reviews.Content: The Visio lasted four months before it pretty much went dark on me.  It would come on 10 percent of the time.  Visio is going to repair it but I have to pay to send it across the country, they will pay for the return trip.

Reviews.Title: very good TV

Reviews.Content: TV arrived on time, was easy to set up and operates very well.  The information on Amazon's web site was accurate.  I would recommend both Amazon and this product for purchase.  The TV is very light and easy to move around.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture - Cheap Materials
Reviews.Author: Philip Alexander
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound on this unit are good. The casing and remote are the cheapest plastics I have seen on any TV I have purchased. Overall I am happy given the price.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price, but not great
Reviews.Author: Alan R "Alan"
Reviews.Content: Read the reviews, saw that some people had a problem with the audio dropping and having to restart the TV to clear up. I started having this issue after about 6 months, getting a bit worse each month. Have noticed that it tends to happen with power fluctuations such as starting a microwave or turning on a fan. Some luck changing the channel and then back then the audio comes back on. But most of the time it will turn off and on by it self with a loud "pop" through the speakers.It is sharp, overkill for 1080p on a 24" inch TV. But the screen is a bit dark and sensitive to tilt angle for maximum brightness. The included stand doesn't help since it's not adjustable and kicks the screen back at approx 5 degrees of more. Standard set of options and setting for a budget TV, but why doesn't anyone have a built-in clock anymore?Just ordered a Samsung to replace it as our primary TV, but it will be moved to another room instead of retiring it. Worth the price.

Reviews.Title: just a small screen TV needed for the kitchen

Reviews.Content: Works just fine.  Just what you'd expect or what we needed to have the news on while we worked in the kitchen, sitting down for dinner, etc.  Easy to set up.  Put on multi-position mount on the wall.  Wires are a mess using cable, but that is certainly no fault of the set.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 29 inch TV

Reviews.Content: We wanted a small TV for our Kitchen. This was easy to set up with instructions simple and easy to follow. Picture and sound are good for an inexpensive TV. I recommend for smaller TV viewing area.

Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: I love the picture quality with this television. Vizio has consistently impressed me with their quality pictures. I now own three of their televisions. The frame type stand on this television takes some getting used to. It is different than a table top stand. However, if you need or desire the tv to stand more upright you can place something (wire, such as hdmi) under the frame to prop the tv upright a bit more. Very easy to do. Vizio value is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV

The stand that comes with it leans the TV back a little too far,but easily adjusted by putting something under the back to make lean less.Overall, perfect TV for my needs

Reviews.Title: good tv so-so sound
Reviews.Author: shytyro
Reviews.Content: I like the tv  since it does everything expected of it- except for one thing.  I have been unable to discover how to connect a recorder to it.  I got no satisfaction from the Vizio dealer and  it is a daunting (if not impossible) task to reach the manufacturer.  As for the picture, I have been unable to obtain a sharp clear picture, but once I got used to it and quit comparing it to the picture I had onmy old Sony before it quit working,  I don't notice it so much.  Had I bought it from a local dealer (Walmart) I would have returned it,but I didn't want to go through the mess of returning it to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV

Reviews.Title: nice kitchen TV.

Reviews.Title: great price and picture

Reviews.Title: Thank U

Reviews.Title: Vizio

Reviews.Title: Nice size for limited space
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "RVRoamer"
Reviews.Content: I bought this 29" LED TV because I needed a size that fit in a pre-defined space. The front TV cabinet in my motorhome cannot be easily expended without major cabinetry re-work, and this 29" model fits with just 0.5" to spare.  The stores only carry 26" and 32", probably because the 29" costs the same as 32", but I was happy to find this 29" on Amazon.This is a size upgrade from the previous Sony 26" LCD. It's lighter (only 13 lbs) and has a thinner frame than the 2008 vintage Sony.  One of the signal sources for the tv is the old fashion non-HD composite video and I think the Sony did a better job of that, but the Vizio is adequate. In HD (720P) the picture quality in the Vizio is every bit as good as the more expensive Sony.  Plus, the LED display looks brighter than the older Sony's vanilla LCD display (this is generally true of LED vs LCD).This tv is wall-mounted using the standard VESA mounts on the back. I was somewhat disappointed in the mount because the back case of the tv is not very rigid. It allows a lot of flex and the tv can wiggle quite a bit both vertically and horizontally, even though firmly bolted to the wall bracket.  It  wouldn't make any difference on a house wall, but in a motorhome, subject to road vibration and bouncing, I don't think it would last at all. I made a slim metal bracket for underneath to support it over road bumps and wedged dense foam behind it to dampen vibration. Seemed solid enough once I did those two things.One other comment re the sound system: If anything is plugged into the external audio output jack on the rear of the tv, the Vizio disables its internal speakers. You have no control over this except to physically plug & unplug the external audio jack, difficult to do with any wall mounted tv. The previous Sony had a menu option to enable or disable the speakers and/or external audio. If you need selectable audio output, this is not the tv for you. I doubt if many people would care about this, but I wanted to point it out in case you do.

Reviews.Title: Vizio A370-A0 is a great HDTV!
Reviews.Author: John Black "John"
Reviews.Content: Our first HDTV was a Phillips CRT that I bought at the end of 2005. It was still performing perfectly. when I bought the Vizio recently. However, the Phillips 30 inch only had an analog tuner so we used an LG LST- 3510A combination digital tuner and upconverting DVD player to pull in about 22 OTA channels. As you can guess, rather than have cable or satellite we use an attic-mounted antenna that I bought at RadioShack in 1987. We watch more DVDs than TV broadcasts.In order to simplify our viewing we decided to go with a flat-panel TV that would fit our existing TV cabinet. 37 inches was the max that would fit the cabinet, and research on Amazon revealed that Vizio's E370 filled the bill. It has a stunning picture at 720p on TV broadcasts, and it goes all the way up to 1080p on DVDs. We are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: ILOVE IT

Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT. THE TV CAME AS PROMISED, THE SET UP WAS EASY AND THE PICTURE IS GREAT.  THIS IS THE SECOND VIZIO I PURCHASED FROM AMAZON AND I COULD NOT BE MORE PLEASED

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Shaun Clements
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace a set from 2002 that was on its last leg. My other LCD is an LG and I was looking at LG's but they were twice as much as this one. With Amazon's super saver shipping it was even more of a bargain for me (and no sales tax). It only took three days to arrive via UPS ground. The picture is good quality for a 720p. It was very easy to set up, though the initial scan for cable channels took a little longer than I was expecting, I thought it was not picking up any channels at first. The picture took some tweaking to get to my preferences. I did not like any of the presets so I went with my own custom. The sound is adequate, and I have stereo through my cable box into my stereo system. I have no trouble watching TV on this set with just the internal speakers on. I almost went with the 39 but I like the 37 just fine. It's a great TV for the money, a good value! I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: An excellent bargain
Reviews.Author: Callanish
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace an older lcd 26 inch panasonic viera for the bedroom. Priority one was to find a bedroom sized tv that had a rca analog audio out connection. Not as easy as I thought because a lot of tv's now seem to have a digital optical connection only and I was going to purchase a new tv to use it with wireless headphones. Digital optical wireless headphones are really expensive, so a pair of sennheiser rs 120's with this Vizio 32 inch tv has made all the difference and makes a good combination.As for the TV itself. Easy to setup and easy to configure with the end result being a 32 inch tv with a really nice picture and due to the bezel size, it's pretty much the same size as the older lcd tv I replaced it with. I use a zvox audio system for sound with it, so I can't give my two cents worth on audio quality, but so far $250 for a 32 inch led tv, I'm pretty impressed. Didn't need a smart tv, only needed one that provided decent picture quality and that's what this one does.

Reviews.Title: Great value

Reviews.Title: Excellent LED HDTV but no smart functions
Reviews.Author: NZL32
Reviews.Content: This is an attractive TV with a thin body and good screen and picture quality. It has easy-to-navigate menus and a simple but functional remote. Unfortunately it bears a ridiculously similar model number to the  Vizio e320i-a0 smart TV that I actually wanted to buy. Once I realised I had accidentally ordered the wrong model, I exchanged it for the correct one and I am very happy with it. The i-A0 is a little thicker than the A1 and the smart functions are a little slow especially when using the non-keyboard access remote. The sound and picture quality are good. It works great when connected to my Macbook Pro via HDMI cable also. Both TVs are good quality for the price you pay and I would recommend either, depending on your requirements. I just suggest watching out that you order the correct one as the nomenclature is a bit confusing.

Reviews.Title: A Surprisingly Good TV at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Day
Reviews.Content: I have always been a Samsung TV user, so this is my first Vizio experience.  I purchased this for a second TV down in my basement where we just set up a play area for my daughter.  I was pleasantly surprised all the way around.  So surprised by Vizio in fact, that it gave me the confidence to look at them for a replacement to my 50" Samsung Plasma with the New 55" M-Series LED TV (you can see my full review for that TV as well).First and foremost, this isn't a primary TV for us and it's certainly not going to compare to high end TV's.  However, it is a tremendous TV for the value.  I thought I would have to go with a 32" given my space, but the razor thin edge allowed me to go up to a 37" in the same space.  The look of the TV is great and the small bezel is wonderful. I can't speak to the stand, as I mounted this on a small  entertainment center that had a mount (a necessity so my daughter wouldn't pull it over), but it looked fairly sturdy and it doesn't seem to distract from the sleek design in the photos.  Very light weight and I mounted it by myself.The picture quality surprised me, probably because I have been viewing Plasma for so long.  LED really is a great improvement over LCD and it certainly shows with this TV.  I changed the picture presets but you don't have near the level of tweaking available as you do with higher end TVs.  That said, the preset options were fine and the colors were impressive.  It's only a 60 hz TV, so don't expect  the smoothest of images with live action sports or action scenes, but I watch a lot of Cardinals baseball in the evenings when my daughter is playing downstairs and the image quality is impressive and has been growing on my each day I've had the TV. It's only 37" TV and we don't sit ridiculously close to the set, so there is really no reason to invest in 1080p.  My primary source is 720p cable and even when I do put a PS3 or Blu-ray player down there, my eyes won't really be able to see the difference at my distance and with a set this small. I was very impressed with the look of the 720p and probably won't ever care that it isn't 1080p.The biggest surprise was the sound. I was looking at sound bars when I ordered the TV thinking for sure I would be appalled at the sound (I have a nice Klipsch/Yamaha home theater set up with my primary TV).  However, I was pleasantly surprised and might skip the sound bar altogether.  With the surround sound option on, it was pretty good.  I won't be showing off the sound of it to my friends or anything, but it was actually very good for a TV :-)I don't use the remote as I have it programed to adjust the volume with my Uverse remote (as its my only source hooked up for now), but it seemed just fine to me when I first used it.  Also worth noting is that the TV qualifies for Amazon's low price guarantee & free super saving shipping.  I purchased this for $30 under the list price and then it was an addition $20 below that a week after I ordered it.  I went on the web and submitted the claim to Amazon and they refunded the difference.A good overall LED Tv and a good purchasing experience from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Plug-N-Play
Reviews.Author: Ayris "Ayris"
Reviews.Content: This TV is super simple to set up, has great picture quality, and the audio sounds wonderful, even in my 10x10 living room. The backlight is also perfect for us. We keep the apartment very dark. Too much backlight would have killed my eyes, I am very photosensitive. Somehow it manages to be wonderful with all the lights on and wonderful with all the lights off, definitely a good indoor TV.The menus and generally using the TV is pretty intuitive.The remote is small and straight forward. I like this, but not everyone will.Set up was as easy as having a philips on hand and about 5 minutes. The instructions aren't super clear on how and where to screw, but logic worked out fine in the end.My husband had a brain fail and didn't figure this out at first, but AV(3 connectors, red/yellow/white) needs to be on AV input setting rather than composite(5 connectors) or it will be black and white. He googled it and saw the question occured often, so I thought I should share. The composite/AV inputs are color labeled. Since the TV doesn't pivot, you might not want to put much things next to your TV if you have to change them out often and don't want to use a switcher.I wish the 2 HDMI ports were labeled better than 1 & 2. I can never remember which one is what. Arrow to where the cord connects to the TV would have been nice.My only issue was with the TruVolume. When playing a movie when it transferred from a loud fighting scene to a heart to heart, the TruVolume took too long to ramp up. I missed half the talking. However, when I turned off TruVolume I discovered that my portable movie device's volume was almost silent. It ramped it all the way up to a listening volume with no distortion from nearly inaudible. That was impressive.The equalizing also makes the background music a little too loud when there is talking, mostly for epic scenes. All my issues can be adjusted though. I love technology.We use this TV mostly for gaming. Everything we've connected there's been no issue with, including older consoles. It also works great with my PC.I think all around it's a good price for a good TV. It doesn't have all the fancy features that new smart TV's have, but I don't have internet either way and didn't want to bother with all of that. It was the perfect TV.Thank you amazon, as well, for making this particular buying experience wonderful, even though you had no control over the amazon market vendor that upset me originally.

Reviews.Title: Stunning picture
Reviews.Author: Vern Dewitt
Reviews.Content: This set is hooked up in a bedroom to standard cable (No HD).  The picture is amazing.  Setup was easy.  Only negative is the remote is small, and unlit.

Reviews.Title: It's take to long for my Feedback
Reviews.Author: Leyla
Reviews.Content: Finally I got today the connections with the TV Cable Service and this little TV I ordered is just amazing, great picture and color.. sound is perfect. I'm glad I ordered this one. Enjoying.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Peter W.
Reviews.Content: Pros:-Very good picture; the black levels are very good & the colors are accurate.-Has digital audio out-3.5 mm analog audio out (side) - headphone/earphone jack*Note, some consumers are saying this TV no longer has a headphone jack. Mine does, but maybe Vizio made a change & the TV no longer has the jack. Go to Vizio's website for specific spec information. There is a cheap & easy work-around if you only have RCA jacks. Buy this:2 x RCA Male, 1 x 3.5mm Stereo Female, Y-Cable 6-Inch It will allow you to plug in your 3.5 mm headphones.-2 HDMI (1 side, 1 back)-1 USB (side)-Slim frame design looks really nice & takes up less space horizontally/vertically. The TV is still kind of "thick" but that's because it has the LEDs mounted behind the screen NOT along the edge.-Direct-Lit/Full-Array LED; NOT the CCFL Edge-Lit.-Matte Screen is pretty good in a bright room but not excellent; some minor reflections.-The 32-inch model has a plastic rectangular stand not the strange triangle/leaning version on the 29-inch TV.-Audio is better than most TVs in this size/price. It has 2 -10W speakers. It's not audiophile quality but acceptable & better than many.-SRS TruVolume which evens out the spikes in volume. This used to be an issue with commercials but with the passage & implementation of the CALM Act (Law passed by Congress that makes it illegal for commercials to be broadcast at louder volume) that's less of an issue. It can still be helpful when streaming movies, etc.-Ambient Light Sensor - I'm kind of indifferent to this feature.-Simple RemoteCons:-Unlit remote, small buttons-Stand doesn't swivel-No "Smart Dimming" (Vizio's name for Local Dimming)-60Hz-720p-No dedicated PC connection but you can use HDMI with the proper cords.-No Ethernet-Guide - My old Vizio's have the guide that shows what is currently on & what is coming up. This new Vizio only shows what is currently on the channel. I really liked the old way because I could see what TV programs will be shown throughout the day.I ordered it here at Amazon, price is just amazing: http://amzn.to/13Errkw

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: alan
Reviews.Content: Great value.  Excellent picture quality and enough features to attach most peripheral devices. The color is excellent, VISIO continues to make good TVs

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: ssymms
Reviews.Content: Vizio seems to be getting better and better with their quality.  This tv has an excellent picture.  For the price, you cannot beat the quality.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Daisy
Reviews.Content: it was easy to mount took a little while so works great no issues with it brightness is good colors great

Reviews.Title: TV nice
Reviews.Author: Marilin Rangel
Reviews.Content: This TV looks nice. Clean front. It is extremely light. The base feels sturdy and big enough to support the TV without risk of falling over. It was simple to put together with 8 screws in the base.

Reviews.Title: Best buy for the money!!
Reviews.Author: Heavieth
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic display!  I purchased it for my son for his birthday and he can't stop going on about how good it looks!

Reviews.Title: clear picture
Reviews.Author: JoEllen
Reviews.Content: Love the TV.  Picture is clear.  I don't have a HD box for this TV but the picture is almost as clear as if I did.  This is our 2nd VIZIO purchase and I would buy a third if I needed another TV.  Good price; good quality.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Scott Masingill "Scott"
Reviews.Content: A very good TV, and easy to set up and program.  Used it in a bathroom and perfect size for a small room.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: KBroadhead
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to put in my Dad's room at the care center. It is small enough to fit on the dresser and the picture quality is excellent. The only problem is that the channels on the screen are very small.

Reviews.Title: Wow oh wow
Reviews.Author: Rebecca A Epperson
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these to replace big old tube TV's... I'm so very glad I did... Great picture and sound... I am thinking about buying one more for the computer room...

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: CRAIG GARASICH
Reviews.Content: great  picture, great price, there is nothing to dislike about the product! i would recommend this product to all of my friends!

Reviews.Title: Vizio does it again!
Reviews.Author: PrestoChango
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this tv. VERY clear picture on hd channels, VERY clear while playing xbox 360....going to try Blu-ray next and see how that goes(which I'm sure will look amazing)

Reviews.Title: I Love IT!!
Reviews.Author: Nicole Martinez
Reviews.Content: I love this Vizio....brilliant clear picture, great sound and great condition. I bought another one for my bedroom. I would HIGHLY recommend to anyone. LED is better.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: A. J. Watson
Reviews.Content: We bought this television for our kitchen for a couple of reasons: it's a little bigger than others in this price range (29" vs the more common 26" or so), an because it has audio output. We have it on the wall now. True, it is only 720p, so the picture could probably be a bit sharper. But we are completely satisfied with this small screen addition to our kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Great set for price.
Reviews.Author: Sam A. Thomson
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for our bedroom to replace an older TV (not HDTV) primarily to watch the news before retiring in the evening and to see the weather reports in the AM before work.  Picture quality is very good except when viewed on an angle which occurs only when entering or exiting the room.  For the most part it is viewed head on so picture quality is fine.  It does not compare to our main TV's which are Sony, but are also considerably more expensive.

Reviews.Title: Good picture not great sound
Reviews.Author: Sara J. Seaman
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tv for my fiancé for his birthday. I was fairly impressed with the quality of the picture, unfortunately the sound is lousy. I have looked into sound bars and other ideas but after spending that much on a tv I'm not looking forward to spending another 100+ on the sound system.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv in this size/price range
Reviews.Author: runtymom
Reviews.Content: My only complaint is the speakers are located at the bottom of the tv towards the back, when hung on wall the sound is somewhat lessened. If you turn it up to compensate for this the sound is still very clear, no distortion so it's not a big deal. Excellent picture for the money, also very lightweight and easy to move. So glad I went with this tv. We use it primarily on our enclosed porch.

Reviews.Title: TV for convenience
Reviews.Author: MAmom "MAmom"
Reviews.Content: 1st TV arrived damaged. Amazon replaced it in 2 days via Fedx Express! 2nd TV works well, fits tight spot. Using it on it's stand at the moment. Plan to mount it on a wall bracket that rotates, This will rotate for visibility from the easy chair to the bed for a disabled person.

Reviews.Title: what a picture
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Davis
Reviews.Content: I just love my Vizo T.V. it's more then I expected, the picture is so clear and bright, the sound is great, I'm so so happy with it. Thank You, one happy lady

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: CPilleteri
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is out of this world it could use a few more hdmi inputs though it only has two the sound is also better than expected over all I'm very pleased

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Maureen C Goldstein
Reviews.Content: Portable enough for outside viewing.  Great picture. Lighting modulation works. Tripod stand is unique and stable. Highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: First TV I've purchased in over 20 years, a pleasant improvement.
Reviews.Author: upnorthfan "upnorthfan"
Reviews.Content: So, I'd owned my previous TV since the early 90's.  I was forced into buying a new one and, after looking a variety of online reviews, decided upon this VIZIO 32".  I really don't need the wireless feature and decided to save a few $$.  I came in just a few days, well packaged, right to my doorstep.  I assembled and attached the stand (the directions were terrible, missing an entire step that I figured out for myself) and was able to hook it up to my cable and DVD player by MYSELF!  This is a big deal.  The picture is great, bright, vivid and very clear.  I only wish the speakers faced the front instead of the back (who sits behind their TV?).  My two grown sons came home for a visit and also love the picture.  The remote is kind of lightweight with smaller buttons, but I was able to figure that out also.  It would be nice to include a complete owner's manual as not everyone has access to the internet from their home to "download" one to their computer (that would be me).  Walmart also carries this model, but  the stores in my area never had it in stock, and frankly, with the same price and free shipping right to your door, why go through all the hassle of the Walmart check out line, carrying the TV through the parking lot, getting it into your car, out again and into the house?

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Dianne Benson
Reviews.Content: A TV I can actually watch without my glasses on - great picture.  Very easy to set up.  My grandchildren and guests will, I'm sure will enjoy watching this a great TV.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E241-A1 24-inch 1080p 60Hz Razor LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dianne Benson
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my grandson's play room.  They love it and I find myself watching it there too.  Great picture.

Reviews.Title: Nice low-cost TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: tvideo
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little TV for the bedroom. I got 2 of them. I can't say that I am "overly" impressed with LED as to me it looks almost the same as LCD but not quite as good (low energy savor version of LCD).In terms of quality obviously this is not what you are buying this for, though it does support full 1080p and even PAL 576 (a lot of US TVs won't support PAL for some strange reason). IMO CRT still has the best quality and Plasma second, unfortunately can't do CRT in HD so that's irrelevant.For me supported res I have tested/used and confirmed are:480i/480p576i/576p720i/720p1080i/1080pI always recommend using a custom color adjustment DVD as none of the factory settings get it quite right.

Reviews.Title: Perfect For The Price!
Reviews.Author: cj
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased for my grandmother so that she would be able to better see the screen. The image is quite crisp and the TV looks very classy with the minimal bezel.The feature that sealed the deal was the ability to control the analoge audio out with the televisions remote control. E.i. Turning the speakers up and down on the TV also adjusts the external speakers volume. The mute button also mutes the external speakers. (It is also possible to change the audio out to a constant fixed audio out in the settings.) The variable audio out was paired with a pre-amp and a set of desktop 3.5mm computer speakers placed next to my grandmother's chair so she could better hear the tv.

Reviews.Title: Solid no frills TV
Reviews.Author: Joseph Funston
Reviews.Content: Already have a wifi bluray so didn't need all the extras, this TV has a great picture and very small bezel so it looks sharp!  The price is right if you just need a good picture.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Rex1238
Reviews.Content: I used it as a computer monitor and it works great.  Its price is the least expensive in the market.

Reviews.Title: Mom Loves It
Reviews.Author: Carol Wright
Reviews.Content: Got this for my Mom for her Birthday for her bedroom and she just loves it... Great picture... good value.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Jerry Postma
Reviews.Content: Easy set up. Great picture. It is everything I expected for the price. I would highly recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice replacement TV
Reviews.Author: Rodeo
Reviews.Content: Works perfect in the small space we had to mount it.  Had to jury rig some support arms to anchor the monitor in a forward tilted position as the included base is oddly tilted back slightly.  Color is perfect when viewed from pretty much straight on.  At an angle left or right color washes out.  Otherwise nice sharp picture and audio is acceptable

Reviews.Title: perfect fit
Reviews.Author: mike weiner
Reviews.Content: Our cable service was changing over to all HD and several channels on our "old"  bedroom TV were being eliminated.  The old TV sat in a cabinet with an odd sized opening (too small for a 32 inch) and we found the 29 inch Vizio on line with the perfect dimensions.  Not only was the fit almost exact, the sound/clarity exceeded our expectations.  Wife and I are extremely pleased overall with TV, Amazon service, and delivery within 3-4 days.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: mary crismond
Reviews.Content: Great picture and it practically installed itself! It is a perfect size and the stand that it come with is very sleek and modern looking.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for the kitchen or breakfast nook.
Reviews.Author: Michael Kling "Gadgeteer"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, and I thought the sound was just fine.  I'm not trying to play games on it, or watch my favorite movies or concerts.  I just use it for catching up on the news when I'm in the kitchen.  I would definitely buy another one if I needed a small TV.

Reviews.Title: It is as expected for its price.
Reviews.Author: Peter Chow
Reviews.Content: It does an adequate job for a small room tv.  Picture quality is better than average. More aspect ratio adjustment will be helpful.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: YB
