Reviews.Content: Great tv that was an addition over my treadmill for workouts. I knew it wouldn't be a great picture like 1080, but for the amount it's used and the price, you can't be beat. Really great wall-mount tv. No issues whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: A Great TV Set
Reviews.Author: Fred F.
Reviews.Content: We purchased this set to replace a malfunctioning Insignia TV which had stopped working.  The remote for this set has a "-" key, allowing direct access to digital channels like 25-1.  It is a wonderful set, and we would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Best TV purchase yet.
Reviews.Author: Christie L. Davis "oskerain"
Reviews.Content: We own many TV's in our home. This one has the best quality picture, sound and size. Fits in our entertainment center.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Dutch Man
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for the price.  Picture quality is excellent. We have other LCD TVs so I wasn't expecting much in the way of great sound but sound quality is surprisingly better than I thought it would be. Plenty of customizable settings for both picture and sound but it was set up fairly well right out of the box. If you are not looking for a Smart TV or care about 3D this is a very good choice.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Jeannie0314
Reviews.Content: This TV is lightweight, great picture and a good value for the $ - I had no problem setting it up myself and is ready to go!

Reviews.Title: LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Nancy Nurse
Reviews.Content: Chose for the size, wanted it for a bedroom and it meets my expectations! What else do you need? Really?

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Momof3Boys
Reviews.Content: We bought this to replace a 26 inch LCD that quit working for a bedroom.  For the price, it is great.  It actually takes up about the same amount of space as the old set, but with a larger picture. We have a Roku2, a DirecTV HD receiver, and an old PS2 hooked up.  The picture quality is very clear with all 3 devices and the setup took less than 10 minutes.  My husband was able to lift and mount it on the wall mount from the other TV with no help.  There are a lot of picture settings, and I don't care for the way some of the default color settings come up, but it is really easy to adjust.  I find the sound to be clear as well-- this is in a mid sized bedroom, and it is plenty loud for that space, with nice quality.  The remote is easy to use as well.  We have had it working for a little over a month and I have no complaints.  I would recommend this and would definitely consider Vizio again.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 29 inch LET HDTV
Reviews.Author: David S. Dupre
Reviews.Content: Image is fantastic,ordered this one to fit into a cabinet empty space. The tilted angle is a bit odd you get used to it. Sound is acceptable for this size TV.

Reviews.Title: Vizio lives up to its name
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I had no clue about big screen TVs...I had heard that Vizio was the best so I went with it.  It has a great picture, great sound and the support for any hookup issues is phenomenal!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: TomKat
Reviews.Content: Excellent price, value, picture quality. This was exactly the size I needed for the space I had available. I would recommend this TV to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: Fits in the space in our RV
Reviews.Author: malbre
Reviews.Content: It has a great picture , but the speakers aren't as good as they could be. For the price it is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: 24 inch Vizio
Reviews.Author: Jessica Itta
Reviews.Content: Arrived faster than we had expected! Easy set up. Perfect for a small room. Not a five star rating because of the sound. The sound is okay, but could use a surround system for a bigger room.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E291-A1 29-inch 720p 60Hz Razor LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Twylajane
Reviews.Content: Nice little flat screen, a breeze to set up and easy on the eyes. So thin and light in comparison to the 27" Flat screen tube TV it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Very nice!
Reviews.Author: Amy Wunsh
Reviews.Content: I really love my 32 inch Vizio I bought for my bedroom! It was very easy to set up, and, has a great picture right out of the box. I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: great pic
Reviews.Author: Soyldp
Reviews.Content: I love this tv, Interacts well with my cable HD. It is well worth the great price i got it for!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: RJG1999
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Lots of connections and a good built in tuner. It's very light and easy to mount on the wall. Overall very good value.

Reviews.Title: G
Reviews.Author: Karen Griffin
Reviews.Content: First digital TV and I now get channels I have never had before.  Very nice picture quality to view them all.  Decent price, great picture and size is perfect for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Jorge A. Gomez "spainusa"
Reviews.Content: I'm using it in a small bedroom and the picture and sound quality are very impressive. It has a nice viewing angle. No issues with the base as I hung it up on a wall. Easy to program. I love how thin and light it is. Maybe buying another one for the kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Spare bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have seen the reviews and complaints from others.  I must say that you should disregard them.  This TV is a wonderful spare bedroom TV.  The picture and sound are outstanding for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Dana98
Reviews.Content: I just set this tv up today and I'm very happy that I purchased.  Great clarity and sound! I have cable but not yet subscribed to HD. However, 1 channel is in HD for some reason and it is crystal clear. Will definitely be subscribing because it does make a huge difference. I like that this tv that it has 4 different options for picture size. I saw reviews about sound not being great. I have it a quarter of the way up and it is plenty loud, so no trouble there! HIGHLY recommend this Vizio TV!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Average sound
Reviews.Author: S
Reviews.Content: I've been impressed with the picture quality of this bad boy. Use it mostly for video gaming and Internet video streaming. Works great.The sound has a virtual surround sound, kind of makes the music sound a little loose... Lots of reverb. But turning this setting off seems to fix that.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Antonio Perez
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE HDTV, ESTE ES MI TERCER TV VIZIO, COMO SIEMPRE MUY BUENA IMAGEN,MUY BUEN SONIDO, ES MUY FACIL DE PROGRAMAR Y EL TAMAÑO ES IDEAL PARA EL DORMITORIO

Reviews.Title: Great TV so far!
Reviews.Author: AMAG
Reviews.Content: So far, I love it, great picture, my Xbox 360 looks awesome in HD, and so far, I haven't had a single problem with the TV at all, though I bought a TV mount when I got this TV. The stand that it comes with, makes it lay at a slight angle backward (maybe 5 degrees), so you are warned!

Reviews.Title: Rocks.
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: Picture great.Connections are plenty, including DVI.Sound is good.Remote is a little generic.The only real regret I have is not getting a bigger one, I should have known better.

Reviews.Title: TV is just fine
Reviews.Author: Kevin Zeh
Reviews.Content: Setup was easy.  Just turn it on and follow the prompts.  Picture is very good compared to the old non HD tv  I had before.  The only reason I can't give this a fifth star is that it did not come with a remote.  Scott from Amazon Customer Service was very helpful and after spending about ten minutes on the phone with him and a rep from VIZIO I have a remote on the way.  Very painless.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture, A Little Dark
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV for use as a monitor for my PC and PS3. After some adjustments to the picture, it's rather nice; colors are vibrant and blacks are deep, impressively so for a TV in this price range. However, the backlight isn't quite as bright as I'd like it to be, so some things may appear too dark.Pros:*Good colors and deep blacks*Sharp Picture*LED*Analog Audio Out*AV signals are converted rather nicely - my Gamecube games look surprisingly sharp and free of distortion, even at 480i.Cons:*Only 720p*Backlight couold be brighter*Stand feels CheapishOverall a recommended buy, 4.5 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: 20th Century
Reviews.Content: Great TV, Great Value, first tv that I have had without a converter box and it fits wonderfuly on my dresser

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV that I use as monitor.
Reviews.Author: Carole S. Scandrol
Reviews.Content: I needed a new monitor for my desktop, and I wanted a large one beause I'm getting older and the eyeballs aren't what they used to be.  I priced compute monitors oer 22" and they were all a lo more expensive than I wanted to pay, so I started to look for an HGTV that would work.. i I measurethe opening in y  desk hutch and started looking for the biggest that would fit.  This TV worked great!  It olugged right into the connection and auto adjusted everythng all by itself!  IF have any con's at all, it's that the on/off switch is onthe left back of the case, so you either have to use the remote to turn of the monitor, or careefully findthe small button on th back.  Small gripe though.  BTW, the on/off button is the top button of several adj. buttons, and located on the left side back of the case midway down the case.  If I would have bought a monitor this size, it would have cost me over $500-$600!

Reviews.Title: Better than advertised
Reviews.Author: Ms. Mello
Reviews.Content: I just received this TV last night (a day early than expected), and I am absolutely in love with it. I would have stayed up all night watching my Amazon instant video shows if I didn't have to be up early in the morning to handle the early morning "kid stuff." Once my household chores are done for the day, I WILL be enjoying the wonderful sound and picture again.

Reviews.Title: Great size
Reviews.Author: kris green
Reviews.Content: I was shopping for a new tv and had settled on going for a 32" but found this 29" and it was less dollars and this size is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Greet TV for price
Reviews.Author: J. Alban
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect TV but the stand I'd funky. It makes unit tilt back and does not seem steady. Also the screws to attach it were difficult to attach. Could be done easier. I actually have put a large pad of paper under stand so TV is more upright. Just a weird design I general. The TV though, in general is very good. Sound and picture very good.

Reviews.Title: One of my best buys....
Reviews.Author: kaiamommy
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is sharp, colors are vibrant. Sound is amazing. It was easy to set up. Great buy for my girls!! And this was the BEST price on this model! I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: More like 4 and a 1/2
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Dzialo
Reviews.Content: I just got this tv yesterday but I love it.  Made some quick adjustments to it to get the picture to look right and it's worked out well.  My only problem is that the coaxial input is in a bad spot and took me 5 minutes to get it in there. Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: dawgs
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my son.  No complaints so far.  I have a 60 inch Vizio and am satisfied with it as well.  When comparing value to quality Vizio is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Great size tv for a small room
Reviews.Author: Gregory A. Kates "bikeriderdude"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for the largest tv I could find to fit in a small space I have in the kitchen. The slim 29 inch Vizio fit the spot perfectly and has a great picture and sound. Thank you Vizio

Reviews.Title: stellar picture
Reviews.Author: Clyshaw Whipple
Reviews.Content: Best buy for a LED TV this size, the picture is amazing, the sound isn't as bad as people say, it works great in my bedroom. The blacks are almost too black at times though

Reviews.Title: Good TV Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Cameron John Isenberg
Reviews.Content: First flatscreen I've owned. I really like the quality. From some of the reviews I have read about this TV it didn't seem like it was that great of a tv. I really enjoy it. Sound quality is not bad at all just a little quiet (Just turn it up a bit and you definitly won't have that problem). Definitly a step up from standard definition Television.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: E.J. Snippet "music and book lover"
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful TV and we are very happy with it.  The price was right too.  For the money, it certainly was a good buy and the picture is very clear.  We love it.

Reviews.Title: A lot of bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: anotherJoe
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the kitchen. Doubles as aPC monitor for me using the HDMI ports.The TV quality is superb. The sound is great compared to most tvs this size with thin profiles. Its a world of difference over the 29 incher. I watch netflix from my PC via HDMI and its good. Ireplaced a 5 year old 19 inch vizio with this guy and it was a great move. Forget the price tag. Comparing this to other TV,s much more expensivee I cant say enough about the picture and sound quality.As the title statrs a lot of bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: chris fabiani
Reviews.Content: This has been a great tv!  The color and picture for the price can't be beat.  Another plus is the ease of mounting it to the wall.  It is sooooo light that I was able to install it myself..though I would not recommend anyone doing it themselves, it will be an ease for two people

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Joyce E. Mattison
Reviews.Content: Great picture and great price.  Easy to set up and operate.  Have another Vizio 24" and liked it so much I bought a larger one for a larger space.

Reviews.Title: My Third Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: MG Gal "Herd fan"
Reviews.Content: This is the Third Vizio TV I have purchased via Amazon. The other two (a 55" & another 32") were purchased in 2011. The other two are on cable boxes and get great picture. This one is on a line from DISH network and we really need to get a separate box for it to get true digital picture but otherwise is a great set. Easy to set up and even the TV speakers are not too bad. Will be buying a Vizio Sound bar for this one though as I have same on other two sets. Will probably be buying a 4th Vizio (a 40") soon. Love these TV's.

Reviews.Title: Great HD TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Installed in our RV.  If you do not have HD, you may wnat to compare others.. Little grainy and not realy sharp in analog.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 29 LED is good.
Reviews.Author: Pamela S Orr
Reviews.Content: The quality of this Vizio seems pretty good so far. I personally like the stand that comes with it at the bottom. The screen edge sits on the table and leans back on the stand. I think I paid too much for it though because I'm finding other competitor manufactures price the same or less than this.

Reviews.Title: Price and Quality
Reviews.Author: Rose Rankin-Sturk
Reviews.Content: Amazing price and quality.  Put this in my RV bedroom and it is perfect for the wall with an inch to spare.  Even as close as it is (like being at a drive in movie) the picture quality is great.  Only draw back I have found is you have to go into the menu to reach sleep timer.  Wish it had a button on remote like the other Vizio TV I replaced.  (it was a 19 inch) I wanted bigger.  Anyway love the TV and since only 3 companies manufacture all the different brands of Televisions this one is a good choice.  Whoever manufactures Phillips I'm not to fond of in my opinion.  Just saying.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Dan Lennander
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my living room to replace a 26 inch LCD that was a little old and had some pixels out due to my kid throwing something into it.  The picture on the TV is amazing.  The difference between the LCD and the LED picture was evident the minute I turned it on.  The sound is actually pretty good although I am not a sound snob and so ymmv.  The remote is ok, I like longer skinnier remotes and this one is smaller but wider.So overall I think this is a wonderful TV for your non entertainment center room.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size for a kid's bedroom
Reviews.Author: JMAG "greenearthdream"
Reviews.Content: We had an older, RCA 19" LCD that was starting to act up. We always noticed our son would sit really close but just thought he liked to be closer. Turns out the smaller set was harder to see so we upsized the replacement. He loves the larger size. This is our forth Vizio and all have been excellent.

Reviews.Title: My Frst and Last Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: T. Soptick
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace a 20 year old Mitsubishi TV in our bedroom. I could never adjust the color and brightness to look anywhere near "natural", even after turning off the ambient light sensor. I exchanged it for a JVC 37" EM37T and saved $79. Am extremely happy with the JV C TV. Gave the Vizio TV one star for good sound.

Reviews.Title: A Bit of a Let Down Really.
Reviews.Author: Kimberley_nz1
Reviews.Content: The tv had a really nice picture, but after about an hour or so the volume would cut out. The only way to get any sound back was to turn the thing off and then on again. It would go great for another hour or so then the sound would go off again. We exchanged it for the same model thinking it was probably just a lemon, however the replacement unit did the same thing. Ok, so it must be something at our end so we swapped out the HDMI cables, but it still kept happening. We put it down to an incompatibility issue and returned it. We'd had a larger Vizio previously which we loved and had no problem with at all, so we ended up getting a Vizio E322AR and it works perfectly and the sound is so much better.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive but flawed
Reviews.Author: Troy Ames
Reviews.Content: The sound cuts out on this TV after every 20-40 minutes of viewing. You have to turn the TV off then back on to restore the sound. I initially thought it was just a defective unit so I sent it back for a replacement and had the same issue with the new one. It is either poor quality parts or defective design but in either case the TV is flawed. I returned it and bought another brand.

Reviews.Title: No Guide Function?
Reviews.Author: R. Mikkelson
Reviews.Content: Others have commented on the odd, undersized and unstable stand included.  I cut a piece of 1/4" plywood about 12" X 19" as a base and fastened the rear plastic stand to the back long side of the plywood with a tie wrap to solve that problem.  My 2nd grip is with the brightness of the screen - which is about 80% that of my old LCD set.  The workaround is to dim the room lights in the evening I suppose.The non-working guide function is my biggest complaint. On my old LCD set, pushing the 'guide' button on the remote produced a TV guide - a list of the current channel's schedule with time slot, title and short description.  The included remote has a 'guide' button, but it does the same function as the 'info' button (displays information on the current show being broadcast).  The fact that the remote has a separate button for bringing up the channel guide means the engineers at Vizio are aware of the function and purpose.  The data for the guide function is within the ATSC signal, same as the 'info' data is, so there's no excuse for not having this function implemented that I can understand.

Reviews.Title: Bad Picture
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: everything was good except for the color. I could not get the color settings right for some reason it just looked weird, orangie, or purplely, blue-sh. was shipped on time and with no dents or scratches

Reviews.Title: It's OK.
Reviews.Author: John G. Koudsi
Reviews.Content: It is OK but doesn't come near to blowing your socks off.  Worth the money. Five more words were required.

Reviews.Title: returned it.
Reviews.Author: Norm
Reviews.Content: Image was mediocre at best. started to degrade at a 30 deg angle.sound is just plain bad.Replaced it with a great panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: jake bones
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents and they like it very much. It has a good picture and capability to set several different environments like movie, sports etc. I paid around $280 for it and feel it was a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and quality
Reviews.Author: Donna C
Reviews.Content: This TV is wonderful. Moderately priced, has great picture, easy to set up. We use it in our bedroom as a second tv on antenna only.

Reviews.Title: Using with my Mac Mini
Reviews.Author: User
Reviews.Content: Great picture for a great price. Just the right size to compliment my Mac Mini. I had to go into the picture settings on the Mac Mini as well as the TV to make it look just right but with some simple tweaking the picture is simply gorgeous. The sound from the built in speakers is also solid with just the right balance between highs, mids, and lows. All in all a great purchase that met the need perfectly well.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Poor Sound And Software Controls
Reviews.Author: RareMettle "rare_mettle"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my elderly mother, and she seems to think it's OK; but she is hard of hearing and has cataracts! The best feature of this product is its slim and sleek design. LED TVs do have the characteristic of the picture being a different hue/brightness dependent on the viewing angle. Since I wanted this set to placed on a chest of drawers and viewed while lying in bed, it became clear that i could NOT adjust the picture quality sufficiently so that the brightness/contrast was adequate! And so, I get continually complaints regarding the "dark picture with odd color" from mother! And I don't blame her! She is correct! Additionally, the bass and treble are entirely unadjustable! The sound mirrors what one would expect from the soup cans in a Progresso commercial! LOUSY LOUSY LOUSY sound! And you cannot change it in the least. It seems that this is another Chinese imitator product. While the display is nice, it relies on the software to run the electronics, and this set is woefully inadequate. Had I bought this for use by myself, I would have returned it. But an 85 year old woman with poor eyesight and little ability to hear sound thinks it's nice and compact. :) If this is an indication of Vizio quality, then my advice is that you get what you pay for. Be forewarned!

Reviews.Title: Damaged during shipment
Reviews.Author: A. Sanderson "studymonkey59"
Reviews.Content: Vizio was damaged during shipping the sound goes up and down during broadcasts needs repair. tried turning off tru sound but then the volume was to low.

Reviews.Title: Terrific little TV
Reviews.Author: SpiritualOne "spiritual one"
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our dining area. It is easy to set up and has a very nice picture. Perfect size for a small room. We have a larger Vizio as well. Both perform great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Anthea R. Close
Reviews.Content: I now have two of these TVs. My son has put them on the wall and they are a perfect fit in my small front room and my bedroom. The picture is perfect and so far I haven't had any trouble at all. I am pleased I bought the TV.

Reviews.Title: It will do just fine
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I really can't say to much about this TV right now because I purchased it for my camper and I haven't been out camping yet.  I did plug it in and turn it on in the house and it works just fine.  The picture is very nice and the sound ain't bad for a small TV.  I think it'll work out fine in the camper.  The one thing I don't care for is the stand.  It's just a plastic bar or band that attaches to the back of the TV, and it's not adjustable.  I'll use this TV with a small DVD player to watch movies if the weather turns to rain as one always needs a plan B if you can't sit around the campfire and drink beer.

Reviews.Title: piece of junk
Reviews.Author: cvaldiviesob
Reviews.Content: this tv was nothing but a piece of junk, the seller sold me and sent a broken tv and of course they were aware of it.. i'm from venezuela an this piece of s*** can not be fixed, nice going stealing my money bunch of thieves

Reviews.Title: Refurbished
Reviews.Author: Bette Paquette
Reviews.Content: They say this was sent by mistake but as you can see via their website I am not the only one that was sent a refurbished television when it was stated as NEW.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Chanel Finnie
Reviews.Content: I thought this tv would come with a stand, it didn't. The picture isn't that clear and I thought this tv would come with wifi capabilities, since one of the side pics is showing netflix and hulu. It doesn't though

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Tessa Ward
Reviews.Content: Arrived in good condition. Easy to set up and works great. Perfect for my first flat screen. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Came DOA, so can't really review
Reviews.Author: SRHadden "SRHadden"
Reviews.Content: I don't like DOA reviews because it isn't a review.  However, this is the second Vizio tv I tried to buy from amazon. I see Vizio TVs everywhere even my work has them in every office. But last year I bought a 32" Vizio smart tv that crashed all the time, and now I tried to buy another Vizio a year later and this one came dead on arrival.So I will give a neutral review because these TVs seem decent at the store. Just can't seem to get a good one shipped through amazon. Maybe my UPS driver likes to kick my boxes.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for a fair price
Reviews.Author: wei chean
Reviews.Content: Great value for money with crystal clear display. For whoever that is hesitant about buying this tv because of its 60hz refresh rate, it is totally fine even when it comes to watching football. It doesn't lag as suggested by some others. Overall a great buy!

Reviews.Title: JUNK!
Reviews.Author: Jon Hawk
Reviews.Content: First flat screen I ever buy and the light came on but No picture. I tried everything but this piece of junk just will not turn on. I hooked my ps3 to it  the hdmi cable and still nothing on the screen!  Never again vizio NEVER

Reviews.Title: Expressions of Thanks
Reviews.Author: Georgia Graham
Reviews.Content: I've heard so much about the Vizio television sets that I had to have one.  Thank you so much Amazon.com for making my dreams come true and I look forward to being a loyal customer in the future.  I am very happy with my purchase.  Smile.

Reviews.Title: Does not make a good computer monitor
Reviews.Author: Danny G "Danny G."
Reviews.Content: I bought this specifically for a computer monitor but when I connect the HDMI or RGD cable to the TV the picture looks pixelate.It makes a decent tv for a spare room, but not for computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture, Served my needs
Reviews.Author: L. Fodel "enlightened"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small screen to mount on the wall to have something to watch while on the treadmill. Works well, but the result of the channel setup was a little disappointing. The channel numbers didn't match with what the cable channels on other TVs had. After learning the few that I would choose, it was alright.

Reviews.Title: 1 minor flaw that manufacturers should rectify
Reviews.Author: John A "Jack"
Reviews.Content: The TV seems to work well. However, when I tried to mount it on a wall mount bracket, it didn't have the 4 screws needed to mount it. The 4 screws would cost pennies & could be inserted in the proper holes in the back at the manufacturer. Vizio depends on the bracket manufacturer or the consumer to have the exact right screws. I didn't know what size I needed & had to go to call Vizio to get the right size (they told me the wrong length on the phone) and then I went to the hardware store before being able to mount the TV. Having a company rely on the consumer to know & have the right size screws is CRAZY. They included batteries for the remote but not the hardware to mount the TV??? When I asked them to please send me the right screws they said they didn't have them & couldn't.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 32 inch 720p TV
Reviews.Author: Charles B., Perdieu III
Reviews.Content: Great TV. I have always been satisfied with Vizio products. You get a lot of bang for your buck with this brand.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 42 inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Susan Lofquist
Reviews.Content: First one arrived with a cracked screen but Amazon quickly sent a replacement that was great.  Both were received within a week of order.  So far TV is great.  Paired up with remote quickly and has a great picture.  My parents own a Vizio now for 6 years and it is still a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Does the Job and Fits in my Cabinet
Reviews.Author: G. M. Carey
Reviews.Content: Although I would have preferred a Larger Screen This 29 inch fit in the cabinet that formerly housed my 1999 JVC tube type television. I especially like the fact that this new Vizio set can be lifted by one person and has many features that the older set did not have. I did like the fact it didn't need a cable box to get basic channels until Comcast just changed their format to require their box. However this tv pulls in the basic channels with an antenna so Comcast will soon be going away. All in All I am satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 29" HD Flat Screen TV
Reviews.Author: W, "Bomber" Mangum
Reviews.Content: I mounted this TV on the wall of my 2013 Arctic Fox 29L pull travel trailer, clean sharp, HD color picture. I would recommend Vizio HD flat screen TV to anyone

Reviews.Title: that's what I'm talking about!
Reviews.Author: Leaston C. Easterling
Reviews.Content: So pleased with my new tv. With a few minor adjustments ( for my personal taste") , it was up and running quickly. Easily hooked up as I have cable only. Working perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: Trudy Silverheels "Bootsy"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a 24" flat screen, but the price difference between a 22" and a 24" was $50.  So I settled for the smaller screen, and I have not been disappointed.  In my tiny house, a 22" screen is altogether large enough.  The picture is brilliant and crystal clear.  I am seeing details I never even dreamed of before.  This Vizio TV connects easily to my DVD player.  The remote control works as it should.  (That was not the case with my previous TV, a 7" flat-screen portable.)  And the sound is rich and full.  I easily get enough volume to hear every whisper (Again, this was not the case with my previous TV.)

Reviews.Title: I Love My Vizio
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I love my television. This was my first tv purchase for myself. The picture is nice as well as the sound. I'm not a big tv guru, but this is a nice simple flatscreen. I'm actually purchasing this tv for my parents for Christmas because they liked it so much. I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good deal!
Reviews.Author: Robert Felcher
Reviews.Content: I recommend this set to anyone needing a small set for a second TV....  Good value for the money... great picture...

Reviews.Title: Vizeo 39" TV
Reviews.Author: lloyd holford
Reviews.Content: The TV is great the problem is when connecting another device which has red yellow and white lines the tv has red blue and green. There is no booklet to advise how to match the wires.

Reviews.Title: Why does everyone say Vizio is a bad brand?
Reviews.Author: CraftDoge "CraftDoge dot com"
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with itI use it as a monitor which i use more than 12 hours a day.I've had it six months now, still in perfect working conditionStrong standgreat picture quality

Reviews.Title: Vizio E291-A1
Reviews.Author: Jose Karunungan
Reviews.Content: Good TV. Wish it came with a different kind of stand so that it is not slanted when viewing it.

Reviews.Title: Does not power on after shut off
Reviews.Author: christopher murk
Reviews.Content: This is a nice TV for the kitchen. It has worked flawlessly since I purchased it in Nov 2012. Recently as I shut the TV off the power LED does not go out and when I restart the TV the LED gets brighter but the TV does not turn on. I have replaced the remote battery, tried the TV power switch, removed the power from the surge protector and used the wall outlet to no avail. It does occasionaly power up after turning the TV off, turning the power off from the surge protector, repowering the surge protector and "hit/miss" using the remote to turn the TV on. This is very frustrating and of course, inconvenient. Any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Foxhome
Reviews.Content: Perfect size, picture quality is perfect and amazing.  Wish I could get a larger version but this one fits the armoir perfectly.  Easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: nmn
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality.  good viewing angle.  Bedroom TV wall mounted.  my 2nd vizio tv and would buy more.  Good Pic

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: L.Bickerstaff
Reviews.Content: Works as secondary tv in bedroom.picture quality good for investment.No cons only pros at this time.would recommend as secondary unit

Reviews.Title: Great picture, lightweight- excellent value
Reviews.Author: Justin Morabito
Reviews.Content: I have now purchased 10 of these.  I installed them in a day care for a customer and am very happy with them.  Vizio is an American made product but is excellent quality.Pros-Great picture quality-Backlight is consistent and edge to edge-LIghtweight - can mount on a regular articulating armCons-Removing sticker on bottom left leaves gummy residue (I know, very minor)Overall this is a great product for a great price.

Reviews.Title: This is true High Deffinition
Reviews.Author: Barry R. Schrader
Reviews.Content: There is nothing to get in the way. It is just a mammoth screen, super clear and bright colored programs and that is all you need.

Reviews.Title: Good product, bad quality packaging!
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: This product was packaged very poorly and it had a small scratch on it when it was supposed to be brand new! Its not very noticeable, but it still bothered me. I feel like if it was packaged how it should have been then there wouldn't have been a scratch on it! Overall, not bad for the price and it did come very early.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Farley Nachemin
Reviews.Content: Picture OK but sound quality is very disappointing. Thin, tinny no depth.  My nine year old Sharp Aquis was not HD but sounded much better. Should have spent a bit more and got a real brand.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E320-A1 32-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Dr. Robert L. Spaulding
Reviews.Content: The product has a less detailed and precise picture than I had anticipated.  In pales in comparison to the quality of the pictures on my Apple iMac, for example.  Other than that, it is satisfactory.

Reviews.Title: vizio tv
Reviews.Author: Bea Shepard
Reviews.Content: fathers day gift husband loves it much better than the old dinosaur tv we had nice picture great pricegreat picture

Reviews.Title: Tv is really good for being pretty affordable compared to other tv's
Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: Loved this tv for the short time I had it. Only reason why I sent it back is because, it had minor imperfections. But other than that. Really good. Would buy again.But decided to go with the m series 50 smart 3d tv

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Steve Cooke
Reviews.Content: Always loved Vizio and this tv is no exception. I've received great compliments. The price, picture and quality are superb.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: milton g. whitehouse
Reviews.Content: This TV exceeded my expectations. I replaced an aging plasma TV that was on its last leg. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of pix and sound.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E Series E470-A0  47-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED-Lit HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jackaline Dutka
Reviews.Content: I ordered the TV one day and received it the very next day. We set the TV up. It has one of the best pictures on the TV screen that I've ever seen. We love it and would certainly buy another one! Thank you VIZIO and Amazon for bringing this item together so I could order it on the Internet & it just showed up at my door the next day. I didn't have to go to the store, put it in my car & take it into my home.

Reviews.Title: A Fine TV
Reviews.Author: Weemus
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my mother who has poor eyesight and hearing problems.The VIZIO brand was chson because our local hospital has one in every room and we've watched many shows on them and the picture quality of these sets led me to buy one.  I was able to make the screen nice and large so we could watch together without eye strain. HD reception is excellent. The DVD player is connected by HDMI and results were powerful. It has a USB connection that I wish would play video files (mp4, etc.). It only plays audio. We have an mp4 USB connection on our DVD player so that's not really a problem for us. An irritating problem with this unit and almost every electronic device I purchase these days is the inability to read the remote control in soft lighting. Why don't they make the things in white or silver?! Delivery was fast and the packaging is normal, as if bought off the shelf. I recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Ayeke P. Messam
Reviews.Content: I'm glad that I made this purchase. I'm not a high tech type of person so it meets my basic needs.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: Top Dawg
Reviews.Content: The picture is great, sound is decent and the price was right for a refurb TV! I highly recommend it or another VIZIO.

Reviews.Title: Tv
Reviews.Author: kay
Reviews.Content: Love this tv, but when measuring tv , it is only 29 inches , don't know what's with that, good pic

Reviews.Title: An excellent TV, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Eric Paul "Winchester31337"
Reviews.Content: This TV is fantastic! I paid $368, and I couldn't be happier with it. I got it so I could finally play my PS3 in HD, and boy does it deliver.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the money
Reviews.Author: Winslow
Reviews.Content: this Vizio 22 inch LED TV is a great little TV the only problem I have is not with the TV but feedback was mixed in with some other TVs and I bought it because it said it had WiFi which doesn't have wifi, other than that a great TV but I do have a roku  player so this turned out to be not an issue....................................................................................

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: litchen
Reviews.Content: My only gripe is it won't remember my custom brightness settings after being unplugged many hours. It does for the first few hours but not any more then it loses the settings. One of the commentors tells what settings u need to get the screen bright.VIZIO E390-A1 39" 1080p LED HDTV2 hdmi

Reviews.Title: Great tuner
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: I originally bought a cheapie brand at Walmart, when I got it home and scanned for local channels I got only one, promptly returned. When I got this 22" Vizio I scanned for local channels and got 26, more than the Philips I had.

Reviews.Title: Guest Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: R. McLain
Reviews.Content: Price was good. Delivery fast.Running in non HD mode, picture is fine, setup very simple. Good value for money. With hook up to HD in future.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase.
Reviews.Author: Lois Jonea
Reviews.Content: Picture very good. Audio goes in and out at times. Bothersome. Good purchase .Efficient for the cost. Easy to install. L.J.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous TV/GREAT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Dawn Plyler
Reviews.Content: You'll love this TV.  I bought it for the kitchen but ended up placing it in a bedroom.  The picture is crystal clear and sound is excellent.  Very lightweight and so many extras come on the tv for internet, etc.  You will thoroughly enjoy this TV!  Great product at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing sound quality
Reviews.Author: Deborah Kelly
Reviews.Content: We're happy with the quality of the high def picture.  However, the sound leaves something to be desired.  Dialog is difficult to understand, muffled.  The volume needs to be turned up to understand the dialog, but then the 'background' music is too loud!

Reviews.Title: Love the auto dim feature
Reviews.Author: lynnyy
Reviews.Content: I didn't purchase from amazon, but I noticed many reviewers recommending turning off the auto -dim or ambient light adjusting feature to make the picture brighter and i wanted to give a different opinion.  I love this feature, and actually set mine on "high" meaning it will dim lower the darker the room is.  I work all day looking at a computer monitor, and in the evening I want the tv to be easy on the eyes.  If you have a kindle paperwhite you'll know what I mean, the darker the room the less light you need glaring up at your eyes.  You can turn this feature off if you want to, but for some like me, this is a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor fore office meetings
Reviews.Author: Michael Hunter
Reviews.Content: We use this monitor on our conference table and love. Awesome price too if you can get it on sale!

Reviews.Title: Problems...
Reviews.Author: JSH
Reviews.Content: The tv is not showing any color and I cannot find any place to adjust color in the menu.I may have to return it after only 3 months and only a few hours of use....

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Shawna Morrison
Reviews.Content: its a good tv i have another vizio and it is nice but i expected it to be slimmer than it is. otherwise it is a good tv

Reviews.Title: Great TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Nickolas Zimmermann "tool man"
Reviews.Content: There is nothing I dislike about this TV.  It replaced a heavy CRT TV in the bedroom; it seemed to heavy for the small shelf it was placed upon.We have another Vizio in the Family room that has performed ok for about 2 years. It is 1080p and internet connectivity.  Only issue is that sometimes picture is too large for screen.  Have not been able to resolve this on our own.Both have great picture quality to the best of our knowledge.

Reviews.Title: not perfect!
Reviews.Author: yehuda kommemi
Reviews.Content: Picture is good but audio needs a better speakers. At about half way of the bar the speakers vibrate and distort the sound. Well, nothing is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Not as expected
Reviews.Author: Mr. JD
Reviews.Content: The TV was very nice but the company chose to put a very poorly designed base on it. When installed I sat the TV in it's place and the bas collapsed sending the holding screws flying and allowing the TV to smash down on the cabinet. The base was very unstable. Unfortunate.

Reviews.Title: The TV is good for it's price
Reviews.Author: S. Dutta "Book Manik"
Reviews.Content: Picture and sound quality is very good. Very easy to install and light weight.One star less due to bad battery included for remote. It was disappointing.Overall, nice bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: SO CLEAR AND VIVID
Reviews.Author: JO MO "JM"
Reviews.Content: I GOT THIS FOR THE BEDROOM.  MY OTHER ONE FINALLY DIED.  IT WAS A LCD 32 INCH ALSO AN OFF BRAND.  THIS TIME I DECIDED TO STICK TO A VIZIO.  I AM SO SATISFIED WITH THIS TV.  IT IS AN LED 32 INC. WOW, THE CLARITY IS SO DIFFERENT. THIS TV IS SO CLEAR AND THE COLOR SO VIVID.  SO EASY TO SET UP . DID IT ALL BY MYSELF , HUSBAND AT WORK.  AND OF COURSE, IT WAS HERE SUPER FAST WITH AMAZON. .  PERFECT IN EVERY WAY!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: B. A. Thomasson "bt72118"
Reviews.Content: Every manufacturer produces some lemons and this was one.  I have three other Vizio sets which I have been pleased with and had high hopes for this one, but I returned it.  The sound was defective - would go from normal to a whisper, then fluctuate back.  Within a few days of install the picture and sound would pop in-and-out.  I tested HDMI cables and U-verse box, but the problems remained.  I returned it.  I was not impressed with the picture, so I decided to replace it with another brand.I replaced this set with a 37" Samsung UN37EH5000 LED.  The Samsung produces a much better picture and I highly recommend the Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Sean Griffith
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound for a TV in this price range.  I really like the small bezel, I have a 40 inch TV that looks huge next to this with the screen only 1 inch smaller.

Reviews.Title: Great experience
Reviews.Author: Ed Farrell
Reviews.Content: The size, picture, clarity all made this a very smart purchase.  We went from a 15 year old Zenith (good picture) to this Vizio after researching various brands and models and this fits our viewing area, price range and viewing experience.  We highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, solid sound
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: I think this tv looks very good, with no noticeable flaws or backlight hot spots. Not the best viewing angles, but not an issue, especially with such a small tv. I have not had any issues with sound that others have reported, and the sound is fairly good, about what you'd expect from a small sound bar. Very happy with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Very good buy!
Reviews.Author: Vala Claybrook
Reviews.Content: I already owned a 46" Sony Bravia and contemplated getting another, smaller TV for my bedroom. After reading the reviews and the price was right, I chose this one and am very satisfied with the purchase.  The ONLY issue, if you will, and this has nothing to do with the TV itself, but the quality will be better if you have HD cable or satelite service; without it you can only get 480 or 720 quality so I'll be upgrading my direct tv receiver.  Other than that, really love it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: DubbleRainboh
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. Can't believe the quality of this product for the price I paid. The clarity is amazing, I think  I will use Vizio Tv's on all purchases.

Reviews.Title: Good TV--Badly Designed Stand
Reviews.Author: pnguinlovr "pnguinlovr"
Reviews.Content: When I received the TV, it appeared simple enough to set up.  But it turns out the screws that hold the TV on the stand are very small, while the holes they go in are  quite a ways up from the bottom of the TV.  So you have to drop them in and hope they are straight so you can tighten them.  I called Tech Support and was basically told, "Good luck."  I did finally get the stand attached and everything went well after that.  The TV settings are self-explanatory and the picture is excellent.  If it weren't for the frustration I had with the stand, I would rate it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Very nice LED TV!
Reviews.Author: Paul Deal
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit to go in my bedroom an mounted in on the wall with an articulating arm.  The combination is great.  The TV has a nice crisp HD picture.  Sound quality is very nice coming from just a small set of speakers.  This is our second Visio televsion and I am pleased with the quality of both flat screens I own.  Highly recommended form my experience.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I have another Vizio (bigger one downstairs) this one is for my bedroom. Love it!! A variety of settings to choose from!!***Addition*** I dropped it by one star due to the remote. It is the worst shaped remote I have ever had! I use the sleep timer every night and there should be a button on the remote for sleep. But you have to go into the menu and go through several steps to set the sleep timer. If you wanted to use it at night in the dark forget it!!! Since it is the same size all the way around you can't learn it by feel... Other than that I still like the TV.

Reviews.Title: I am very happy with my choice.
Reviews.Author: cane4705
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a TV that would fit in a an office space.  This TV worked out perfectly.  The picture is fantastic and it was very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: This is a great small display
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "beglad"
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive. Only problem was the wait. Took longer than advertised to arrive. But when I got it I was very happy with the quality of the display and satisfied with the built-in sound. But don't use my sound rating. My hearing is bad. So I'm not a critical reviewer of sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Mary D
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for an extra tv for a while, this is a fantastic buy! Great for one of my extra bedrooms! Would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Vizio 720p LED
Reviews.Author: Laura D'Amico
Reviews.Content: Picture only looks good with an HD cable box which is extra $$ every month. With HD box picture is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Five star marks in video and audio
Reviews.Author: David H.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 24 inch TV as a replacement for a three year old VIZIO, 19 inch LCD model. While the old set was still working fine, I was enticed to this newer model because it was the same height as my older model and would therefore fit into our kitchen nook cabinet. The thin frame and low profile is a nice feature of this new model. In comparing the picture and audio quality, the new set is vastly superior.  We use a roof-top antenna and pick up signals from about 40 miles away. Picture color and clarity are superb, and the audio is amazingly good in both quality and loudness. It is obvious that LCD TV's have made major improvements in the past five years, and this set is definitely at the leading edge.  I am thoroughly pleased with the set.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: The Flying Dutchman
Reviews.Content: This is actually being used as a big monitor on a gaming pc, good quality, nice pic..........could use a few more inputs though, not a real big fan of the shared video/component input.......def worth the $$$

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: nru
Reviews.Content: I bought this at a good discounted price for my parents to bring them into the wonderful world of flat-panel technology and pictures you can actually see. I intentionally stayed away from the "smart" model, knowing how bad most of the built-in service interfaces are on those.Based on the reviews I read, and some narrow past experience with Vizio, this TV was exactly what I expected. The picture looks great (especially for the size/price ratio), the settings interface is very simple, and the sound quality is actually pretty impressive. Additionally, the room the TV is now in has a lot of windows, so the auto-brightness adjustment is very handy and works very well. Since my parents live in the woods and don't have cable, they rely on an antenna, and the built-in tuner on this model is pretty impressive in its ability to detect OTA HD/digital channels.Definitely a good choice for the price range, and an even better one for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: I have two
Reviews.Author: Michael S., Preston
Reviews.Content: It's a great TV, I have it in my wife's work out room. She really like the size of it, Just perfect for smaller rooms. Michael P

Reviews.Title: Great little TV!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Anderton
Reviews.Content: we bought this as a second tv for our "rec room" and are very happy with it so far. the picture is bright and sharp and the sound is surprisingly impressive.  it has all the inputs/outputs you would expect on a modern tv, and I love the small, thin bezel.our primary tv is also a Vizio (47") which we bought about 7 years ago and it is still serving us well, so we're big Vizio fans.

Reviews.Title: Great LED for the Price
Reviews.Author: J. Rand "j rand"
Reviews.Content: This LED TV is great for the price as it was under $275 when I purchased it. It's not a superstar for fast-action sports and video games but it gets the job done.As others have mentioned the speakers are a little weak, but that is honestly my biggest complaint.I would purchase this TV for a kids room, guest room, or a college dorm. This wouldn't be a great tv that I'd want to watch frequently as the picture has some lag with the low refresh rate and resolution doesn't support full 1080p.

Reviews.Title: I bought this for my parents...
Reviews.Author: LC Newberry
Reviews.Content: They wanted something that was bigger than their current screen and would still fit into their current stand.  They had gone to look at several t.v.'s to decide on picture quality, of all sets out there this is the one they liked the most. Delivery was quick, the box arrived with no damage, they were able to get it put together without issue and they really like the sound leveling aspect of this t.v.That particular aspect of the technology had helped them immensely.  They used to sit with the remote in hand and would constantly be turning the set down during commercials and up when the show came back on.  Although I wouldn't say that it completely eliminates the 'brassy'-ness of most commercials it does level the sound down a few notches so that it is much more livable.  And it has eliminated the need to constantly turn the set down during commercials.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: carolyn
Reviews.Content: We got this for my husband as a Christmas gift. The picture is great and we love the slimline design. We would definitely recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: vizio hdtv
Reviews.Author: Bradley A. Besore
Reviews.Content: love this it works great bought this for my parents the said picture was great and was easy to set up they also love how easy it is to operate  would buy another with no hesitian would recommend to anyone interested in buying one

Reviews.Title: vizio tv
Reviews.Author: allan johnson
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my son and he loves it.  We  bought one for us last year a have great  picture

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Murray Robitaille
Reviews.Content: Clear picture, easy setup and good value.  Have had Vizio before and highly recommend the brand. Would continue to buy this brand

Reviews.Title: Great price for a really good tv
Reviews.Author: Tanya
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tv for a bedroom and thought the 32 inch would be a good size. Once I set it up (which took all of about 2 minutes, including connecting a new DirecTV HD receiver), I was glad I didn't go bigger. It's perfect! The picture quality is amazing and the sound is great. I "shopped" tv's at a couple of the big box stores and decided Vizio was the best picture and a really good price, so I ordered it from Amazon. I read some reviews of this tv that weren't as good so not sure why anyone has an issue with the stand or the picture quality or the sound. For a bedroom, this is the PERFECT television. I also bought the Square Deal package, which is crazy good, so if there are any issues in the next 3 years, new tv. Boom. I'm really, really glad I got it in time for the holidays! Watching White Christmas at 1:00 in the morning in HD with the sound turned up was great! (Yes, I bought MYSELF a present.)

Reviews.Title: Great product for the money
Reviews.Author: J. Stevens "mistergadget"
Reviews.Content: This TV does not have any bells or whistles but we just wanted a new TV for the bedroom. For the price, it's fabulous. We have several Vizio's and they are all great.

Reviews.Title: Nice Television !!!
Reviews.Author: Rodney Flickinger
Reviews.Content: I am pretty happy with this television for the money it was a great deal.  it was not necessary for me to have all the bells and whisles on my TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV!
Reviews.Author: AmazonFan
Reviews.Content: Silly me..I first put this in my cart & bought when Amazon had it for $239, but they didn't know when they'd get more in stock as they were sold out.  So, I bought from another vendor that partners with Amazon for the $239 and got a shipping confirmation.  Then, oops! The vendor says...I thought I had one left but I don't.  So, back to Amazon and oops!  They'd raised the price - LOL  Still a bit cheaper than Costco so I went for it.  A very good picture, great size for the bedroom and very sleek looking.  Really wanted a plasma so you could see it from all angles, but seems no one makes those anymore.  Easy setup, I might miss the "no streaming" bit, but I use my Kindle HD for that because I rarely lounge in bed long enough to watch a whole movie. All in all quite pleased and the clarity of the picture is impressive.  I didn't do 5 stars only because of the streaming - I have no other issues and clearly I bought it knowing about that one!  Just wish I hadn't cancelled that first Amazon order at $239 and relied on a partner seller to have their info right!  Ah, well :-)

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: great picture and EASY set-up.Just what I needed.And just in case,Vizio has free "yes,free" service for us non-techies,Who could ask for more....and they are here in the USA

Reviews.Title: Coax connection faulty
Reviews.Author: Santiam
Reviews.Content: This arrived very quickly and was simple to set up. If you can use a phillips screwdriver to tighten six screws,you are set. The picture is great and the sound is very good. The on-screen guides are easy to follow.  I hooked it up to a standard Directv receiver (which does not have hdmi so the cable I ordered with the tv was useless)  I looked up the code to program the Directv remote and I was off and running.  This is my first flat screen tv and I really like how light it is and I like the styling of the small bezel. I am not paying the extra money for HD but it still looks and sounds great. However the reason for three stars is I think a new tv should have functioning connections!  The coax jack does not work and so I can not hook the tv to a vcr, dvd and directv receiver, which was my old system. My only choice is to use one set of component cables to connect the directv receiver.  I purchased component cables which are supposed to be better than composite but there is not difference. The only way to use the dvd is to disconnect those cables from the satellite receiver and connect to the dvd player.I tried several coax cables and two vcrs and the sat dish receiver.  I am sure the coax on the new tv is non-functional. It only delivers a heavily snowed static.  So now I must upgrade to HD receiver and pay an extra $100.00 plus $10.00 extra a month in order to use the Hdmi connection (hopefully it works).  Or buy a hdmi dvd/vcr player or a composite to hdmi converter.  Or I could return the tv.  It's a good tv except for this one issue.I thought I'd write a review though in case someone else might benefit. One of the reasons I bought this tv was it appeared to have all the connections I'd need to hook up my existing system.  However since one of the connections is faulty, I was disappointed, frustrated and forced to either upgrade or live with fewer components.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv All bad reviews r because people dont know how to set the backlight
Reviews.Author: Rachel Korenkiewicz
Reviews.Content: Great Tv All bad reviews r because people dont know how to set the backlight there is an option to make it so you can adjust the backlight on how bright it is, i found the tv to be dim and not vivid no matter what i did making me not happy with the picture at all, but i had seen all the Vizios at the store with bright vivid pictures hanging right in there side by side at the store (I didnt buy mine from amazon but after reading all the bad reviews felt i needed to write this) make sure u shut off Ambient light sensor and then u will be able to adjust the backlight to as bright as u feel fit make a few other tweaks as u see fit and the picture is golden and for the price this tv is a steal!!!

Reviews.Title: While VIZIO seems to get great reviews, this model is NOT that great and just ok
Reviews.Author: Aspiring Designer & Artist in CA "Watercolour...
Reviews.Content: While VIZIO seems to get great reviews, this model is NOT that great and just ok which is a bummer as I bought this for my Mom's bedroom.  I had a SHARP AQUOS tv and it is still going strong, but being a 7 year old model was not up to date with the latest technology.  I did my research and VIZIO came up as a pretty good TV.  But this model leaves a lot to be desired.UPFRONT:  Buy SAMSUNG, PANASONIC or SHARP (SHARP "AQUOS" model only), they come up consistently as the best TV's on multiple sites, by editors choice AND buyers, like you and me.ISSUES:1.  First, I bought it as I thought the picture would envelope the entire screen as it did with my 40" AQUOS in the living room and the 22" in the bedroom.  IT DOES NOT.  Under "Normal" view, it is an almost square picture with a ton of extra black space on each side, so it ends up the same size as my 22" SHARP.  This is a bummer, especially since I bought a larger TV for a larger picture AND this TV has a very small frame, hence = even bigger picture.  I actually PAID for this extra real estate and it is not being used.If you change the picture mode to "Close Up", that is what you get, but since it is a close up you lose part of the picture frame, it cuts it smaller than it really is so it is a little annoying and you lose some quality.If you change it to "Wide Screen" or "Panoramic" view, which to me seem to be the same so not sure why 2 options for the same result, at the ends of the picture horizontally, the last 3" to 5" on each side seems like you are looking at it through a bottle, it waves and distorts like it is being pulled out of shape.  So, that does not work either.  It also widens the picture horizontally only and you have again quite a few inches of black space on the top and bottom of the screen.2.  The sound said it was a premium sound system, and yes it does have quite a few speakers, but for me not enough bass at all, even when toying with the equalizer.  BUT, for my Mom who has hearing loss in one ear and deaf in the other this actually worked out well, as she does not blast the TV in order to hear it now and can keep it on a moderate level.  IF it was for me I would have to buy speakers to get the sound I want.  So, Sound is tinny.  Others have complained about this issue and that it cuts in and out.  I do not have the latter issue, but if I do I will update this review.3.  The remote control is small and hard to read, even for me and it is not backlit.  Shame on them for skimping here of all places.4.  The stand for the TV is static, so you cannot tilt the TV for the best angle for viewing, just place it an angle of choice from left to right.5.  The picture quality is not as good as I expected.  I thought I would see a remarkable difference at 720DP. but just do not.  SIDE NOTE:  Unless you play games or will view A LOT of movies at 1080DP, ALWAYS get the 720DP!!  This is because cable and satellite TV only have the ability to transmit a signal at 720DP so you are paying A LOT of extra money for nothing.  Also, it will be this way for a while, so by the time they have the ability to transmit in 1080DP, it will probably be time for a new TV.6.  When looking at the menu, it ALSO is hard to see and dark, even for me and there is no way to brighten the control menus, or any menu items, this also is a bummer.7.  This TV refreshes but at 60HZ.  In order to get a good picture when watching sports or action movies, you need a refresh rate of at least 120HZ, prefer 240HZ, otherwise you get a lot of blur.  So, you get a lot of blur with this picture for sports or any type of action in movies.PROS:1.  It is very light, so light that I can actually pick up the TV with one hand easily.2.  Easy to set up.3.  It does have a better picture quality than my old TV, but that is because it was old.  It is also better in a brightly lit room.______________If I had to do it over again, I probably would have spent a few extra bucks and bought a SAMSUNG, that comes in at the #1 and #2 slot consistently on multiple reviews, PANASONIC which also comes up great in reviews, SHARP "AQUOS" because that 2 that I have are beasts and LG also reviews well, but all were more expensive.Because returns are a real ordeal when it comes to electronics I am going to let this one slide unless the sound starts to go out.  It is ok for a smaller TV in the bedroom or kitchen, and my Mom can hear it really well.When I buy a larger set for the Living Room, I WILL NOT buy this brand again, and pay the extra money for a SAMSUNG, PANASONIC or SHARP "AQUOS" ( the most expensive).  I will also buy it as WiFi ready but will not waste the extra money on a "smart" TV because I do not use social networking sites.Word of advice...  Buy what you need, not what marketing is telling you what you need.  99% of the people out there will use WiFi ready sets for the internet, etc,,, but really not use the "smart" options on a "smart" TV.  And REMEMBER, 720DP, even in HD is all that you will be able to upgrade to from your Cable or Satellite feed, so keep that in mind.  Also, pay special attention to whether the picture fills the entire screen or if it is an option, this is a mistake that I had made and now paying for it.Hope this helps, I know it is a long review.

Finally my wife walked by and said that picture is crap and I boxed it up and sent it back.  I ordered a Samsung tv that night.  I just really wanted to save a few dollars but in the end the picture is all that matters.  The sound on this tv is average.

Reviews.Title: Went out after 2 weeks!
Reviews.Author: Aaron Ard
Reviews.Content: I purchased a 47" Vizo tv "open box from Blinq" I hung the tv about 2 weeks after receiving it and it worked great for another 2-3 weeks and then would no longer power on! I was told by vizio since blinq is not an authorized dealer they would not honor the warranty and blinq would only fix it if I paid to have it shipped back to them. It cost almost $300 to have it shipped via UPS so now I have a $400 paper weight. Thanks Vizio, blinq, and amazon!

Reviews.Title: POOR FEATURES, POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: justplainjames
Reviews.Content: First after several months the set just cuts out about once a week and you have to unplug it to regain a picture. There is not visible clock and no guide.  Customer service told me a don't have a guide because we receive our signal thru the antenna (WHAT) and that there was a clock (it's not visible) only used for setup.  Don't buy this one, get something that is full featured and doesn't require re-setting every week.  As others have said customer service is a joke.

Reviews.Title: ideal for guest bed room
Reviews.Author: bamamom
Reviews.Content: We ordered this TV for our guest bedroom. It obviously was enough for our guests, because they complimented us about it. The quality for the price is acceptable.

Reviews.Author: Donald G. Miller
Reviews.Content: The V-shaped (picture frame type) support in back of the TV is not as stable as a base beneath the TV. The picture was not sharp and could not be improved with adjustments. Will pay more for a name brand.

Reviews.Title: Mounted in front of treadmill - Love it - Perfect size
Reviews.Author: iReview
Reviews.Content: I researched TVs for HOURS to find one that would go well in front of my treadmill. This thing is great. I have no complaints. I mounted it to a VESA mount that I purchased here on Amazon and it looks and functions great.Sound is great. Visual quality is great. I like that it has a built-in light sensor and with this setting "on," the TV display isn't ridiculously bright in low lit rooms (and vice versa).Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful clear picture

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 90 year old mom.  She loves it, but we can't get her wireless headphones to work with it.  They worked fine with her previous TV that died.  Numerous people have followed all the directions and still nothing.  But, as far as the T V goes she loves it!

Reviews.Title: Vizio new 29" flat screen

Reviews.Content: After replacing my Olivia flat screen tv I went with the Vizio 29" flat screen new modelSound is not too good. You need to put the volume up to almost 75 to hear it in a bedroom and sound not great for so called Dolby Sound Also sound keeps shutting OFF since I got the tv and I need to power off and back on for sound annoyingPicture very good but with movies quite dark for some reasonCan't say I am happy with this selection and probably should have bought Samsung over thisThought Vizio was suppose to be quality and excellent but not sure now on the new tv

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Great, I bought used from Amazon and didn't have any issues.  The viewing angle top-bottom is small, but...eh.  I'm using this as a combination computer monitor and TV. I haven't had any problems with the HDMI sound cutting out, but even if it does adding external speakers/computer speakers isn't an issue.  This is small, compact and just what I needed.I like the base, because it looks cool, but it doesn't allow adjustment of the tilt at all. So functionality is lower in that regard.

Reviews.Author: Art Campbell "Art C"
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed with the SOUND for this unit.  It all comes out of the BACK and is difficult to hear clearly.  If you stand in back of the TV the sound is Great but you can't then see the picture in the front.  We have another 32" Vizio before they changed it and love everything about it.  I will not purchase ANY VIZIO products without testing them for Quality Picture & Sound.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture quality

Reviews.Content: This is good TV for the price 400$. Black border for the TV is very thin and enhances the appearance. Pretty good contrast ratio and clarity for HD movies. The missing feature I would say is that user is not able to play movies or videos through USB input. Since USB input allows only photos and audio files. Rest apart it's a pretty good buy.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Howard E. Leek
Reviews.Content: We have a flat screen already, this Vizio blew me away with vibrant colors and great looks. At 720 p I was surprised by the picture quality, great buy and I would recommend this tv to others.

Reviews.Title: TV came with a defect.  A solid red line from top to bottom.
Reviews.Author: Vincent Barra
Reviews.Content: What was worse is Vizio's customer service.  When I got the set I called and was told I had to send pictures.  I did.  Then I calledback and was told I would have to send proof of purchase.  I did.  I called again and was told I would be sent a new TV but it would take up to 10 days.  So I waited and when the package arrived it was an empty box.  I called Vizio a fourth time and now I was told I would have to first return the defective TV, wait for it to arrive in California (I live in NJ) and then wait until they sent me a new TV.As this is the only TV I have in the house this is an unacceptable solution, so I am watching a defective TV.  I am more upset about the misinformation Vizio's customer service provided and how poorly they treat their customers.  I will never buy another Vizio product, and I am advising everyone I know to also boycott the company.

Reviews.Content: The 22" TV is fine, but the feature set is quite different from the 24" set.We thought we were buying an internet capable TV, and were just selecting the screen size.These should really have completely separate web pages.

Reviews.Title: Simple, Elegant, Beautiful

Reviews.Title: So far its an amazing TV

Reviews.Title: not so great

Reviews.Content: This t.v. is a great size for a bedroom... unfortunately you can't hear it. It does require that you install additional speakers to get a decent volume from the television. I'd suggest that you forgo purchasing this particular model or purchase speakers to go along with it. I do not feel that it's worth the $139.00 that we spent. On a side note: the picture is very good and has brilliant colors, that's the only reason it didn't get a 1 star.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Linda R. Thaxton
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. Good picture. Nice Sound system.Color is good. Easy to set up. Right size for viewing shows.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV, with only one minor downside...
Reviews.Author: Bear
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup...great look aesthetics-wise, nice small remote and great picture for the price. The only downside is the stand! It is a half circle that is screwed into the bottom of the unit and is not stable at all. Seems very cheap and non-functional for the overall quality of the TV. You MUST have a large flat surface for this to rest/sit properly as it requires more space than a traditional stand that extends the unit up and provides a "base"...this uses gravity to rest on a single point in the rear of the TV (and keep in mind the entire front of the TV needs to be on a flat surface as it is not elevated). Only ideal for a dresser or other bedroom flat surface. I used two-sided tape to secure the bottom of the TV, and places felt-risers behind the unit to allow the bottom of the TV to sit flush...otherwise it will tilt back 2-4 degrees when resting on flat surface
