Reviews.Title: HDTV at its best!
Reviews.Author: Roy G. Biv "Mike in Miami"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a replacement TV in my daughter's bedroom.  I have ended up using it as an RGB monitor/TV in my office.  With the tiniest of digital antenna it pulls in all local channels in perfect HD and still performs flawlessly as I read the paper in the morning using it as a monitor for my aging eyes on my 5 year old laptop.  Beautiful picture, colour and balance.  I may have to purchase another.  What an amazing deal!  Light weight, thin, every input you need and the most ingenious stand ever!

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Harry D. Romsey
Reviews.Content: Worth the money and only complaint is brightness had to be turned up.  Very pleased with Vizio as this is our third.

Reviews.Title: Audio cuts off
Reviews.Author: robert ryan "robsphotos"
Reviews.Content: Bought the 29in  LCD VIZIO. Bought it Christmas Day and got it on New Years Eve. After having the tv on since New years Day at 10am to  this evening 10pm, no problem, but then the audio went off. I turn off the tv and turn it back on and then the audio worked again. 5 minutes later, audio went off and I again turn off the tv and turn it back on. I went to the tv menu and change the audio selection from PCM to Dolby Digital, Maybe that will help. Another problem I'm having is that the audio sometimes doesn't sync with the speaker. Looks like an old Godzilla movie

Reviews.Title: Poor Directions!
Reviews.Author: D.Lane Anderson
Reviews.Content: Vizio TV  works well but a real project to get it up and running. Enclosed "quick start guide" did not include  this model, pictures did not match product received. Website also did not give any info. for this model. Phone call to Vizio Tech Support took 1/2 hour but was pleasant and solved all the problems. Should not be this hard to get things up and running!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: I love the Vizio TV's, I have another one and very pleased with it, picture is clear and crisp.I would recommend this to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: Kathy Evans
Reviews.Content: The television works fine, but the picture isn't as pretty as it is displayed on the box. However, the Vizio serves it's purpose.

Reviews.Title: 37 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Chatty Kathy
Reviews.Content: Needed a tv that would fit an existing bookcase, a 37 in not available in stores. It arrived as scheduled and we love it.

Reviews.Title: Good picture but poor sound
Reviews.Author: Michael Escher
Reviews.Content: The picture is very good but the speakers sound very tinny. I hooked headphones to the audio output and it sounds great so may end up hooking up a couple speakers.

Reviews.Title: Good and Not-So-Good Features of the new Vizio E320-A1 32" 720p 60 Hz LED TV.
Reviews.Author: Wayfarer
Reviews.Content: First, I would say that this TV is really easy to set up, and has provisions for composite, component, or HDMI hookups("good," "better," and "best", in that order), along with extra inputs and external controls on the set in addition to the remote (which is not true of Vizio's new Razor Thin LED Smart TV, which has only an on/off option on the back of the set itself).  Also, compared to my older Vizio, this one had on-screen guides which were much easier to use than the older ones, as well as decent sound quality.  And although it has a matte screen, which diminishes to some extent its picture clarity and gloss, it's a decent entry in the Vizio E series. (I would recommend skipping the earlier picture-tweaking options and choose instead the overall, preset "Vivid" option.) As for the new LED lighting, I wasn't able to see any difference between this and my old Vizio, which didn't have it.I object strongly, though, to the absence of any manual in the TV box other than the very brief "Quick Start" pamphlet. Unfortunately, this seems to be a trend among electronics companies, in general, and an annoying one, at that. What happens if the new owner has no working computer and printer of his or her own, or doesn't have the time or money to print a 30+ page manual from whatever computer and printer he or she may access, especially given expensive ink cartridges which wear out all too soon, and/or other people who may be waiting impatiently for Vizio owners to finish printing so that they, too, can use library printers?

Reviews.Title: Great deal.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great deal. I am enjoying my TV.  The color takes some tweaking, but that is my personal choice in how I want the picture to appear.  Very consumer friendly.  Recommend you download the free manual.  Read the other reviews.  The sound was not an issue for me.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Bethany
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv for the price and it has a very clear and pretty picture. I don't, however, like the way you can't do anything, including turning up the volume, without the remote...

Reviews.Title: TV not what was quoted
Reviews.Author: Sharon Donnay
Reviews.Content: It shows it is a 720 p TV but it only shows 480P. I think I paid to much for a 480P TV.

Reviews.Title: It is fine for the price.
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Jones
Reviews.Content: The TV came very quickly and in good shape. My biggest complaint is that the sound is very "tinny" which makes dialog hard to hear. We mounted it on the wall, so didn't use the stand, but it is quite flimsy. It has a good picture and fits in small spaces.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Carolyn L. Hilt MD
Reviews.Content: Good value for its size. A nice TV for your kids room or just an extra TV to have. Price is right.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: adrakephoto
Reviews.Content: I'm a fan of the brand after my boyfriend bought one last year and I got a killer deal on this one.  perfect for showing photo slideshows at trade shows which is what I purchased it for.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Great price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This set replaces a Magnavox in the kitchen. What a difference! I'm not a techie and don't know about decibels or pixels, but the sound and picture are great. Buy it. You'll like it.

Reviews.Title: Great picture

Reviews.Content: This t.v. does an excellent job. The only drawback, at least what my kids say, it's not big enough! It's perfect for me and my viewing needs, but I will be getting the larger Vizio for the family room and take this one up to my bedroom. Now everyone will be happy!!

Reviews.Title: Overall Disappointed
Reviews.Author: N. Largay "leader of the pack"
Reviews.Content: Very odd stand on the TV and overall disappointed with this TV.  Very unhappy with the product overall.  Needs a better stand.

Reviews.Title: Decent tv
Reviews.Author: Ray R
Reviews.Content: The TV performance was good, easy setup, and menus are easy to navigate. Now on to ascetics.. The bottom of the screen bezel is all wavy looking.

Reviews.Title: Worth The Money (24")
Reviews.Author: Nick Leonard
Reviews.Content: The picture quality isn't terrible, but could have been better, but for the price I paid I really can't complain. It is also a great secondary computer monitor. I wouldn't recommend it as a primary monitor, but for secondary I would highly recommend it. I use it as a secondary monitor to put a  YouTube video or Skype on it. If you are looking for a good, yet inexpensive, secondary monitor I would commend it hands down!

Reviews.Title: Good Picture but Narrow View Angles

Reviews.Content: Clear and crisp but has a very narrow viewing angle, the remote is very flimsy but workable, great low cost buy

Reviews.Title: it's okay

The picture is less than I expected but it's "good enough" since I really only use it when I'm in bed and trying to sleep (it's more for listening than watching).  I tried all the different contrasts, color and brightness settings, but couldn't get "the perfect picture".  For the price, it's okay.

Reviews.Title: Good so far
Reviews.Author: Paula P. Edgar
Reviews.Content: This quality is very good but we haven't watched it enough to say alot..We purchased it for our guest room..The picture is very good and perfect for a guest or extra room.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E241-A1 LED HDTV with HDMI Used As Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: confidential6240
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this VIZIO RAZOR LED HDTV for thosewho own a Mac desktop.I had a computer monitor connected to my Mac computer, and after Applerecommended HDTV's with HDMI for Mac desktop owners I purchased this model.I did my research on many HDTV's with HDMI connectionand when it was done, this was my best and final decision.Please remember I NEEDED a HDTV with HDMI and RGB connections.Many HDTV's don't have HDMI, and RGB connections, this was the ONLY modelthat came with ALL.I was looking for a 32" to 34" HDTV with ALL OF THE ABOVE, but to no avail.Delivery was on time,Setup was EXTREMELY EASY, HDMI is needed if you own a Mac desktop.The picture and sound are GREAT.VIZIO is an AMERICAN COMPANY, their representatives are EXCELLENT PEOPLEthey are VERY HELPFUL.IF YOU NEED INFORMATION ABOUT A VIZIO PRODUCT, PLEASE CONTACTVIZIO DIRECTLY.ANYTHING I NEEDED TO KNOW AND WANTED TO ABOUT THE ABOVE VIZIO E241-A1 LED HDTV I CALLED VIZIODIRECTLY WITH ALL OF MY QUESTIONS AND CONCERNS.VIZIO'S REPRESENTATIVES ARE A GREAT GROUP OF PEOPLE, VERY PROFESSIONAL, VERY PATIENT, AND VERY HELPFULAS LONG AS YOU ARE VERY RESPECTFUL TO THEM.THEY WERE EVERYTHING TO ME.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 39"
Reviews.Author: J. Woodrum
Reviews.Content: Got this TV yesterday.  Picture very bad, blurry and green wavy lines.  Two calls to VIZIO and a lot of tweaking, still bad picture. Talked to amazon requesting exchange and they were very helpful and set up pick-up of this set and delivery of a replacement. I am hoping that I just got a lemon and the replacement will work.  If not...back it goes and I will try something other than a VIZIO.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Donald Peklicz
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my home office. The picture quality is very good but the sound could be a little stronger. If you turn it up it is fine though. All in all a good tv for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality - not great viewing angle tolerance, but still
Reviews.Author: Photog
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful unit, elegant design and spectacular image quality. Only complaint is the view angle tolerance is not so great. You need to be nearly 90 degrees to the screen to see perfectly; maybe you have 20 degrees leeway. Other than that, it's a beautiful TV at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV GREAT PRICE GREAT BARGAIN
Reviews.Author: chessnut "chessnut"
Reviews.Content: I replaced an Heier that blacked out on me. This vizio is fantastic. I love the colors, yellow and blues are awesome! Easy to install. Actually it registered automatically with my Dish remote control. Only negative the flimsy and amateurish stand. Definitely not for a little kid's room! Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV For The Value
Reviews.Author: Shawn K.
Reviews.Content: I needed this 32" Vizio for my bedroom to replace the one I had in there for the last 6 years. The colors are vivid and the picture is beautiful! I'm basically using this for my video games and Netflix mostly. Couldn't go wrong for $250, even though I wish it could do 1080p.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV.
Reviews.Author: K. Gaston
Reviews.Content: I have always enjoyed Vizio TV's and this one was no exception.  I did tweek the picture, but I like being able to do that.  Assembly was no problem for one person and I did call Vizio for a bit of technical assistance, they quickly got me up and running.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: LT
Reviews.Content: i liked it the picture is clear and the TV is eazy to use i would get a bigger one

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Jerry R.
Reviews.Content: 29" TVs are rare. Not many companies make them. In fact, they are, for the most part, more expensive that  a similar-quality 32" set. We bought this 29" model for a guest bedroom, based on price and reviews. The 32" was too big and 24" too small for this room. The Vizio has a great picture. However, it's difficult to tell a great difference in picture quality between the most expensive and  bargain-priced sets. The sound is ok. Small TVs have small speakers and one can't expect home theatre audio. My only gripe, shared by others, is that this TV does not have the traditional, bottom-mounted, pedestal stand. Instead, it has a rear-mounted brace. This system has two flaws: It takes up room behind the TV and it leaves the TV's screen with a slight upward tilt. We placed a 1" thick book under the rear stand so to make the screen face properly.

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Joseph Janeke Jr.
Reviews.Content: IT IS A GOOD TV IT CAME ON TIME NO DAMAGE WOULD BUY ANOTHER IF I NEED ONETHANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Great TV.....Love this brand.
Reviews.Author: Susan Goryan
Reviews.Content: Beautiful little TV. Fits perfectly in my small cabinet so the measurements were accurate. After reading the feedback I asked my handyman to bring an HDMI cable to prevent ANY sound or other issues. I have a larger Visio in another room for 8 months now so I KNEW it was a great brand with a lot of my friends recommending the Visio brand. I know the HDMI cables aren't cheap but they certainly make sure that the new TV will operate perfectly......I ordered this on a Saturday and it arrived on Tuesday......That's terrific!Panasonic has always been my TV/VCR/DVD/RECEIVER brand of choice but Visio has an AMAZING TV and I will buy this brand again.. My next TV one will be a bigger one my living room and this 24" will replace the current tiny RCA in my office. Great brand!

Reviews.Title: A great TV at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Bryna Laub
Reviews.Content: This set is perfect!  Wonderful clear picture with realistic color... a full screen in a narrow frame for max visibility... easy to use remote ...who could ask for anything more?

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY
Reviews.Author: miriam robinson
Reviews.Content: GREAT PICTURE AN SOUND! COLOR IS SHARP. SOUND IS VERY CLEAR. VIEWING IS EASY ON THE EYES. THIS WAS A GREAT BUY.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: It's a light TV with a great picture!  Easy to set up, and move around.  Remote is easy to use as well.

Reviews.Title: Love Vizio
Reviews.Author: Rich Blake
Reviews.Content: I love the Vizio products.  Quality is equal to my SONY Bravia for much less.  Perfect TV for bedroom/exercise.  I'll likely buy another.

Reviews.Title: Great decision!
Reviews.Author: Phil S.
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before I made this purchase.  I absolutely do not regret this decision.  Ordered on a Thursday night and it arrived Saturday with my Prime membership.  It was very easy to set up and connect my bluray player and home theater system.  I'm very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: If at first you don't succeed...
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Anderson
Reviews.Content: The first one I purchased did not receive ABC, CBS, or two PBS stations.  We programmed and reprogrammed it numerous times.  A call to VIZIO support offered no help.  I felt as if I was talking to a machine instead of a person.  I returned #1 and purchased #2.It works!  No problems.  Picture is awesome and the sound is good for the bedroom.  No accessories needed.

Reviews.Title: Defective Remote Upon Receipt of TV
Reviews.Author: Jean R. Laton
Reviews.Content: The TV was fine when I finally got it set up.  It was shipped to me with a remote that did not work.  I had to go to Best Buy and purchase a remote for this TV at an additional cost of approximately $20 and was finally able to set up the TV.  As I said I love the TV now but was very dissatisfied with the entire situation when I received the TV with a defective part (the remote).

Reviews.Title: With some small adjustments
Reviews.Author: radstamper
Reviews.Content: This TV came with factory settings that were too dark for my taste, I made some adjustments and now it is perfect. I am very pleased with the product. It was easy to set up and exactly as described. User friendly and good sound.

Reviews.Title: Prime account makes this very reasonable
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Having prime you can get an extra 25 $$ off, just b/c...and compared to Walmart, Best Buy, and really any other big box store, it makes this the  product a steal.  Picture and sound are great though it's a little thicker (about 3 inches) compared to the LG model I was comparing it too, but even when mounting it makes for a smooth looking piece of equipment.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: For the price you cannot BEAT this TV!  It tooka while to get the colors right on the TV but once we started to use the TV more and more I think that the color came in better. The colors are all normal and fine now.  So for the price, this TV is AWESOME and the picture quality is great!

Reviews.Title: good ,but the display for the channel is very small
Reviews.Author: M. Martell
Reviews.Content: the tv is for the bedroom ,so the tv is 10 feet away. i can not see what channel it is on.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Casey Smith
Reviews.Content: picture quality is good, sleek design, and easy setup. The second Vizio TV I own and still not disappointed. I had trouble finding a TV under 30" but still had 1080p. would be nice to have one or two more hdmi ports but you can always have more no matter what TV you have.

Reviews.Title: Perfect For My Daugters Room
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent buy! I was a little leary of buying a TV online without first seeing the picture quality, but I didn't have time to go from store to store looking for a bargain (I am an extreme bargain shopper). I'm glad I purchased it though! It looks great in her room, the picture is clear, and the price was excellent. I got exactly what I wanted! Now if I could just get my daughter to sleep in her new room...

Reviews.Title: Less than perfect
Reviews.Author: Must
Reviews.Content: Great product. The only thing i am a little upset is that this tv doesn't have the all buch of com ports, for instance the RGB port is missing. It has HDIM, but you know not all computers have hdim out. Apart from that, very quality and quick delivery.

Reviews.Title: my mom likes it
Reviews.Author: chuckie
Reviews.Content: the picture seemed a little dull at first until she brighten it upwish i wouldve bought a westing house big one for 399but i bought this but my mom lkike its

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for our needs!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Anderspm
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV for a bedroom.  My mom is moving in with us and it is perfect for her

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: This is a great item for the price.  Easy setup, great picture, sound etc.  The only downside is the sharing of the component and composite plugs.  You can only hook up one device.

Reviews.Title: we like it but
Reviews.Author: Ed Farrell
Reviews.Content: We like the vizio 32 in led set which we bought.  However, we have experienced a "tiling" problem which we are trying to work thru.  We exchanged the hd-digital box from our provider, I switched the hdmi cable with the one from a previous purchase and finally I swapped the hd-digital box with the one on the other vizio we have (no problems with this set).  So far the tiling has not re-occured.  If it stays this way my rating would be 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: vizio E390-A1
Reviews.Author: CindyKr
Reviews.Content: This is the best t.v. I have gotten and the price was great! I know from other reviews that people were having issues with the picture. That worried me somewhat. Guess what? I did have issues until I realized I needed to have my channels on HD. Best picture ever.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Utsav
Reviews.Content: meets expectations. no complaints about shipping or packaging or product quality and performance. its not a high end tv but it does the basics pretty well, especially for non-gamers

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Als007
Reviews.Content: This tv is wonderful! Great picture. Fast shipping. Couldn't ask for anything better! I would suggest this vizio for anyone shopping for new tv.

Reviews.Title: Visio 32inch TV
Reviews.Author: jesse beedle
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my room. Lightweight too, caught me by surprise. Perfect for my room. Lightweight too, caught me by surprise.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Picture
Reviews.Author: jtonkin3
Reviews.Content: This TV is stunning. My only gripe is that there's only 2 HDMI ports, BUT at this great price.. it's ok.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Bud
Reviews.Content: This is a good tv at an excellent price.  It is used as a spare room TV and really fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: Great Value, Perfect Size
Reviews.Author: Mike FL
Reviews.Content: This TV gave me the largest screen for the smallest outside dimensions which made it fit perfectly into an existing cabinet.  Easy to set up and operate with other electronics.  Very good HD picture.  Excellent value!

Reviews.Title: A nice set for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Billy T. Cox
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect size TV for my bedroom though  I am still working to get the brightness of the picture up tto my liking.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 32 inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: CPG_Pueblo
Reviews.Content: Arived in good shape, quickly.  Set up was easy. Picture quality was very good. Sound is a little lacking and still acceptable.  Color seems to be accurate and is menu adjustable based on type of program.  All in all, a very good unit.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Jina"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy set up, lightweight. The sound is a little disappointing, but all HDTVs are...that's what external speakers are for! But as far as bedroom tv goes, it works out just fine.

Reviews.Title: Crystal Clear Picture
Reviews.Author: Ajax
Reviews.Content: Great picture and resolution. i picked this one because most LED tvs are thin and sound is tinny.This has reasonably good soundGood for smaller roomsVery portable.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for multipurpose
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: I finished my garage last fall and use this television for watching TV and as a computer monitor in my garage. I wouldn't say that the quality of picture is as good as my Dell Ultrasharp in the house but it does a great job when used with a home theater PC for casual browsing/reference in the garage when I don't have some sort of sporting event on the TV.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST
Reviews.Author: 868spider
Reviews.Content: This TV is great...Always bought Samsung before but I saw this at a friend's home and I was amazed at the clarity and the definition.

Reviews.Title: The LARGEST RIP OFF ON AMAZON.COM - DO NOT BUY THIS AT ALL -
Reviews.Author: Jon Halfin
Reviews.Content: We have had the item for exactly 62 days in home, it ignites in the rear of the device, and burns part of our TV entertainment center along with the rear of the unit in the resulting cloud of smoke and flame. F-ing ridiculous, even more so since I go onto Amazon . com and they say "your window for return or replacement expired on 6-7-2103." ( We received the television on 5-4-2013 , signed from from FedEx).So we are not entitled to a refund, we are not entitled to a replacement, we are not entitled to a warranty on the item, this is a complete waste of time and money.We are not entitle to even a phone call form customer Service!  I will NOT be ordering anything electronic from AMAZON.COM ( not a seller this order was filled by Amazon .com) again. There is no customer service contact information on the order, nothing at all. How stupid of a policy does this place have????Save your money, and your furniture. We will be contacting VISA , at least they warranty defective products under their purchase, and challenging this charge as fraudulent; selling defective devices online and charging  at least Amazon .com will have the funds reversed tomorrow morning on them and will not get paid for refusing to offer any warranty repair or replacement.If anyone at AMAZON.COM wishes to contact me about this product, or if you want to get more information ,such as pictures of the flame damaged casing and furniture it destroyed, email me and I will be glad to provide it so you won't lose your money.

Reviews.Title: The base is cheap crap
Reviews.Author: Gwendolyn Gardner
Reviews.Content: The screws that were included to attach the base to the TV scraped out and destroyed the holes thereby making it unable to hold up the TV.  If they wanted to sell it as a wall attachment, they should have said so.  I  have a larger VIZIO in my Living Room that gave no problems.  This purchase was an unpleasant disappointment.  I wanted a small TV for my bedroom.  I can't put it on the wall because my bedroom is small and my bed is facing a wall closet and the door leading to the hallway.

Reviews.Title: BAD COMPANY
Reviews.Author: faye harris
Reviews.Content: This is not a very good product. It didn't work. So be careful about where your product comes from because I could not get a replacement or a refund. I have tried every avenue before contacting them and now they say that I waited too late to complain.  I had invested in 2 remotes as well as downloading manuals that was as helpful as a wet noodle.  Good luck with whatever they send you.  If it has the slightest problem send it back, hopefully, they will help you.

Reviews.Title: Probably the worst purchase I ever made
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for five months and literally not a week hasn't gone by where I'm not on the phone with Vizio.  I've barely been able to use it at all.  They have replaced it, sent repairmen, and had me try multiple procedures, including turning off file sharing on every Windows PC on my wireless network (why? because this piece of crap can't deal with it for some reason).  Still doesn't help.  The TV freezes frequently, many buttons work intermittently, many programs crash.  Since it's outside of my normal return period (silly me for thinking the issue might get resolved eventually), I'm screwed with keeping the TV and hassling Vizio on the phone until the manufacturer warranty expires and I eat the loss.

Reviews.Title: Vizio LED TV 24"
Reviews.Author: Pifer1n
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is absolutely terrible, the closer you sit to it, the worse it gets- shoul have bought an LG

Reviews.Title: Review of Visio TV
Reviews.Author: RxR Smith
Reviews.Content: The picture quality was poor, not sharp.  I was less than pleased.  In addition, the TV stand was not stable.

Reviews.Title: It is OK - but not what expected
Reviews.Author: Mark S Friedman
Reviews.Content: The backlit brightness is not very good and it took a lot of adjusting to get it to perform just to be OK.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: bakole luntumbue
Reviews.Content: Not what I expected, I'm really disappointed by the misrepresentationthe colors are just horrible it's like a game toy

Reviews.Title: Absolutely a great unit...BUT
Reviews.Author: Howard Gelfman, M.D. "sixsunsinc"
Reviews.Content: Do your research and youll find for about 50$ more you can get the same size vizio but with included wifi and access to NETFLIX, Amazon Prime, and every other one imaginable. I made up for it by buying and 55" Viszio with the smart tv feature and the 3D feature as well. The 3D equals movie theatre quality but more comfort. Make sure you have a 3D compatible DVD player (sony 70$ yup) and glasses and 3d dvd obviously. Its awesome. Have fun

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Color
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Wow, what a disappointment!  The color on this TV was dull! Everything had a yellowish tinge!  We played with tint and brightness and contrast... everything. We couldn't get it to look acceptable.  We tried resetting to factory settings... this TV was just sad looking.We set this up next to our regular TV and the color difference made this one look even worse.  don't know if this particular one was a lemon or all Vizios if this model are so bad but we couldn't keep this one.  I was very disappointed as the size was so nice.  We returned this and bought a Samsung, our tried and true brand.  We hadn't gone with Samsung first because Samsungs don't come in a reasonably priced 24".  But it was worth losing the 2 inches to be able to open the box, plug the TV in and have a great picture with great color.I would like to be clear. This review is not about the vendor. The item arrived in a timely manner, it was well packaged and arrived in one piece. I returned the item and had complete satisfaction from the vendor.  The issue was totally with this particular TV. It might not apply to another Vizio.  The vendor bent over backwards to offer their support.

Reviews.Title: Horrible TV
Reviews.Author: gamer-man
Reviews.Content: It was 1080p but it has a massive back lean to it and as someone who uses TV's as a computer monitor this was horrible, the TV wouldn't even adjust properly to my tower and yes i check all my drives are working perfectly and resolution was set to max. Customer service was horrible for this television however amazon was better.

Reviews.Title: david d
Reviews.Author: david dehlin
Reviews.Content: Everything about this TV was great except the most important thing....the picture quality was not very good even when connected to cable tv

Reviews.Title: Nice HDTV, but where's the original Box
Reviews.Author: James C. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I only gave this a three star rating because the TV arrived in a cardboard box with non-original packing materials.  I received the booklet and guide, but was surprised it did not come in a Vizio original box.  Makes me wonder if it is a refurbished, used TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Teddy L. Boulden
Reviews.Content: I spent 2 weeks reading reviews for HDTVs.  I then ordered a TV that was $50 cheaper.  That was a mistake.  The screen was blurry so I sent it back.This TV arrived and the picture is sharp and clear.  The speakers and the sound are great for my bedroom.  I've been reading reviews about other TVs that really need separate speaker systems so I was expecting to order external speakers, but there's not need for that.  It has the audio outputs if you want to add additional speakers either through RCA or SPDIF.I was also wondering if 2 HDMI inputs would be enough because I'd like to hook up a ROKU, a PC and Chromecast.  This really isn't a problem because I hardly ever hook-up my laptop and I can switch the wires if I need to.(I personally avoid smart TVs.  No one talks about it so ALL manufacturers get away with under powering their smart TVs.  Many smart TVs have less processing power and less memory than a cheep smart phone.  It means long delays when moving from TV to Netflicks to Amazon.  It's easier to purchase a separate device, a device that I can easily replace without having to buy a whole new TV.)This is also my 2nd Visio TV.  My 1st is still working great and has been moved to the den.

Reviews.Title: Not Convinced That It's Truly 1080p
Reviews.Author: yolchie
Reviews.Content: I just purchased a pair of these yesterday. I thought..."Wow, a 24" 1080 LED!!!" I have numerous flat screen 1080 TV's and numerous computer monitors for viewing television, computer work, video work, graphic design, recording studio, and the list goes on. So I thought these would be perfect for my office desk and one for the baby room. I can ASSURE YOU that this TV only looks "GOOD." It's definitely better than some older 720p TV's I've owned; but it's nowhere near as good as other 1080's I own at all. I can see pixelation rather easily in a lot of places. So...all in all, it looks like a very good 720p but a very poor 1080p. Still deciding whether to return them or not. But...for under $200, it's a (decent) value.

Reviews.Title: ms
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: The vizio 32 inch was much smaller in size than my previous one it was too small it looks more like a 27 inch I was quite disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 32"
Reviews.Author: B.F.
Reviews.Content: Great for small rooms and the price was reasonable.  Picture is sharp and it fits into most places around the house.

Reviews.Title: tv remote control
Reviews.Author: Robert F Hess
Reviews.Content: Remote control to touchy,haft to be percise to get right channel first try.buttons react to quickly,if hold them down split second to long get same number twice.

Reviews.Title: This TV is Outstanding!!!!!
Reviews.Author: ELD
Reviews.Content: This TV is Outstanding it has a GREAT!!!! picture and the sound is perfect would highly recommend it if shopping for a LED HDTV.

Reviews.Title: poor picture quality...Avoid it like the PLAGUE!!!  EDIT: 03/19/14...it died! no seriously, AVOID IT!
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: I just bought this TV a few days ago and I'm not happy with the picture quality one bit. I've been tweaking the picture/color settings and nothing seems to do the trick. I've also followed other recommended settings from other reviewers but no matter what you do, the tv has a lousy picture and all the tweaking in the world can't help this horrible TV.I bought this refurbished from Woot.com and now I'm stuck with this poor excuse for a TV in my bedroom. Serves me right for not doing proper research on this TV, and not buying through Amazon.EDIT 3/19/14: Even though this tv gets very little use, it manage to die on me for no apparent reason! Now it simply will not turn on, no picture at all! That was certainly the last time I purchase anything from Woot.com and I'm not too thrilled with Amazon either since apparently they own them!

Reviews.Title: Works great/good picture
Reviews.Author: Brandi M. Seals
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about the tv.  The picture quality is good.  It works great.  Wish the sleep option was easier to get to then going through the menu.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TVs are definitely worth the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: These TVs are worth purchasing folks.  When you compare these to other models with the same features, you receive more for your money for the price.

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed; maybe other Visio's are better?
Reviews.Author: Geezerjock55
Reviews.Content: I suppose you get what you pay for; this TV was a good deal.  The colors are not close to being as bright and vivid as our Samsung.  There seems to be a yellowish tint to the picture.  I followed the recommendations and turned the self-dimming feature off, with minimal improvement.  And the resolution seems more like 720 to me.The picture also has random red or purple/lavender "scribbles" that show up in a 10-12 inch section on the right side of the screen from time to time.  Sometimes tapping the screen will make them go away.A major disappointment.  I will not buy another Visio, and will stick with Samsung going forward for their much better quality.  Our old Panasonic 27" tube TV had better color.

Reviews.Title: Nope.
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn
Reviews.Content: This did not do it for me. I bought this from Walmart for $238 and put it in my bedroom. I had it for a couple of weeks and then the headphone jack stopped working. That's a problem for me because I want to hook my TV up to an old stereo receiver with speakers and get "surrround sound" (and I do not plan on getting one of those new-fangled home theaters anytime soon; my vintage equipment is classic and does in fact sound amazing but I digress).Also, what is up with the design of the stand? In my opinion it takes up about the same amount of space as the regular stands but made the TV sit at a weird angle.I'm also not a fan of the "razor thin" frame, at least in this particular size. 29" is already kind of small (in my opinion) and I like my TV to look big, hehe.I've got a blu-ray player but then I also have a vhs/dvd player combo (I don't plan on getting rid of all of my tapes anytime soon, go ahead and call me old-fashioned). After trial and error (including a few trips to Radioshack) I realized there was no way to play my tapes on this tv without buying a $40 converter box. I needed to hook up a composite cable (white, red, yellow) and this TV does not have those inputs.After all that mess, I returned this to Walmart and got a 32" Sceptre instead. It's better (1080p), bigger, and was even cheaper ($218 and ships to Walmart for free)! I can also play my tapes on it.Sorry Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the Price I paid
Reviews.Author: Linda T.
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the 39-inch HDTV.  I love the surround sound, slim design and clear picture screen.  I also have a 19-inch Vizio TV in the kitchen.  I love both of them.  I only use the TV for viewing.  It is an excellent TV.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Gregory Kaplun
Reviews.Content: TV came on time and undamaged. No adjustments were necessary. 39” format does the same and looks the same as TVs up to 42” size. Sound is good, not great. Colors are excellent. I would highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Views on Vizio
Reviews.Author: Gary Haber
Reviews.Content: I love it!  It gives me everything I was hoping for - clear sharp pictures and is the perfect size.

Reviews.Title: good choice
Reviews.Author: GA Peachy
Reviews.Content: we have this tv in the "man cave" which is a small bedroom. It's perfect for the size of the room. the quality of the audio and video are excellent

Reviews.Title: I don't believe it is new!
Reviews.Author: suzanne wick
Reviews.Content: This is a terrible Tv!  There is a black line across the screen and it is impossible to adjust the brightness.  Unfortunately. I was in the middle of moving and had already discarded the packing materials so I am stuck with the piece of crap.  Don't make the mistake of buying this TV!

Reviews.Title: tv awww
Reviews.Author: boomboom
Reviews.Content: I don't like the picture on the TV color seems to be dull,  TV also doesn't have any way you can put it on the wall no screws in the back

Reviews.Title: Good for its price
Reviews.Author: Rama
Reviews.Content: TV build and the picture quality is really good - The remote looks and feel really cheap though it does not matter to me - 2 disappointments on the TV for me is the inability of the TV to play videos from USB (My 4 yr old samsung TV could do it) - Also there is no VGA connectivity to hook up older laptops that do not have HDMI.

Reviews.Title: Not the E320i-A1
Reviews.Author: Brady Koroulis
Reviews.Content: Amazon tells you there is a newer model of the AR and send you to the E320-A1.  The difference is the E320-A1 does not have the wireless internet built in.  When i first checked the 320i-A1 it was $298 but not in stock.  Getting ready to buy the AR and clicked to see if the updated model was available.  The site bounced me to the E320-A1 for $298 special $30 off.  Bought it not seeing the i was missing.  Like the TV but needed to ad a Roku for the wireless internet. It was easier than return because all was set up before I realized no wireless.  Okay, my fault for not reading carefully.  But Amazon should not bounce you to a completely different TV, passing it off as the updated model.

Reviews.Title: Bad sound quality
Reviews.Author: MRF
Reviews.Content: Would be a great TV for silent movies. Picture quality is fine but audio is completely unacceptable. It sounds like there's a vibration in the set. This thing is getting sent back.

Reviews.Title: Terrible!
Reviews.Author: Very unsatisfied customer!
Reviews.Content: II'm so sorry i ordered this.  TV guy said it was broke.  i just wuse it once.  iIm looking into returning it and getting my money back.  i just hate the hassle and the inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: received broken
Reviews.Author: JAMES WILSON
Reviews.Content: Got this  TV and it had no color, and the box was wet. Had to return it to Amazon. Shame!

Reviews.Title: Dead on Arrival -- Update
Reviews.Author: Rob S.
Reviews.Content: Nice Christmas present. (That's sarcasm)  TV was DoA.  Got everything ready to connect to xBox but the TV wouldn't even turn on.  Never got to the startup screen.Replacement TV received and the display on it was defective too.DO NOT BUY THIS TV

Reviews.Title: vizio 22 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Cameron E.
Reviews.Content: I thought it was actually 22 inches but when I measured it is actually "20  3/16" and I didn't really like the hd quality but it is ok. It still is a nice tv.

Reviews.Title: Small programing display
Reviews.Author: Donalee
Reviews.Content: I found the program/channel display too small to read from a distance. When I checked with Visio they said it could not be adjusted. I returned the television because I didn't want to have to get closer to it to read what channel I was on. I checked other Visio televisions and they all seemed to have the same small display, maybe I need better glasses.

Reviews.Title: Missing parts from package
Reviews.Author: Goli Kocharian
Reviews.Content: The screws were missing from the package. I was not able to fix the stand until I bought screws! I was not happy. But the product itself is ok. The picture quality is not very sharp and definitely not HD. I rate this product as OK more toward the dislike!

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal. Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: justin c seibold
Reviews.Content: I use this 32" screen as a computer screen. If you keep it at least 2.5 feet from your eyes, the picture is pretty good. I would have prefered a 1080 screen, but that would have been double the cost.The thing i like most about this Tv is that it is slim around the edges. Many TVs have large borders, this one does not, so you get more picture for the space it takes up.The TV has a nice flat base, so it will stand on it's own without the included pedestal.I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it is slow to boot up and the speakers are on the bottom.This TV was definitely a good decision.

Reviews.Title: Great TV poor customer service
Reviews.Author: J. Rozenblat
Reviews.Content: The TV looks and sounds great, but when I submitted that a rubber gasket that covers the screw holes for the stand was missing, I received no response, luckily its not important since you cant see it and it doesnt affect the quality of the picture or sound.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Edia E. Bedell
Reviews.Content: We like the picture and color  but it did not meet out needs.  We sent this item back and order the correct one we needed.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Thomas J Schwartzkopf
Reviews.Content: I received it from Amazon a couple of days early. I works fine. It's a good deal (I shopped around). The colors are a little light even after experimenting with the settings. I wish it had video output for my DVR. It's very lightweight. I'm happy with it overall.

Reviews.Title: Vizio does it Again
Reviews.Author: Ferd J Ferrell
Reviews.Content: I got this Vizio for my daughter and all I saw was smiles upon smiles. I have four Vizio TVs and all have pleased me. This TV is all screen, very light and the picture is crisp and clean. I have no reservations about buying another Vizio when needed. All shipped on time and product was in great shape when we recieved it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Cris
Reviews.Content: I don't get why this tv gets so many bad reviews. For a good middle of the road tv, it don't get much better than this. Sure its not a smart tv or the biggest, but if i wanted all that i would have bought that. It has a very nice picture for the price and its slim border is simple and un cluttered. The stand is stable and strong and it comes with plenty of connectivity options. The only thing i feel could improve it is a VGA connector.All in all its a nice tv with great picture and clear audible sound.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit!
Reviews.Author: SC Mom "Cautious and Cool Mom"
Reviews.Content: Great quality, good picture, works well with XBox360.  Easy to set up and my son will get many hours of enjoyment from it!

Reviews.Title: Eh...
Reviews.Author: simone23
Reviews.Content: For those rare people who just want a TV to watch without getting fancy, then this is the TV for you.  However, for those of us who favor a crystal clear picture, DO NOT BUY!  Although, someone who likes a crystal clear picture with a bigger budget would not have purchased this 720p TV in the first place, I guess.  However, this was in my price range.  I know a lot of people said they had problems with the stand and at first I did too.  At first I inserted the neck into the TV, which requires 3 screws.  I screwed in the first 2 tightly and kept trying to work with the third and it did not want to go in.  Then I took the screw out and look inside the hole.  Turns out the hole in the neck and the hole in the TV were not lined up.  However, I happened to be on the phone with a relative who suggested loosening, but not taking out the other two screws, then inserting and screwing in the third one.  Worked like a charm.  I tightened all three screws and screwing in the neck to the base took no time at all after that.I went through all the setup stuff only to find an awful grainy picture.  There are times when the picture is too dark, too bright, or the colors are muted or washed out.  I played with all of the color settings for about 45 minutes.  I finally got the color decent but there is still a lot of picture "noise."  I had a 19" and was so excited to finally have a bigger picture.  I am considering returning this and going back to my little screen. Another thing is that I hate how a lot of manufacturers put the input for the cables in the most awkward places.  It was very difficult to screw mine into the television. Also, others have said they had problems with sound, but the sound on my TV is set to Surround and I think it works pretty great.  Again, if you aren't the least bit tech savvy and going from an old fatback TV, and you're on a budget then maybe this is for you.  But next time I will hold out for a nice 1080p with better picture quality.

Reviews.Title: A True Disaster
Reviews.Author: Hoosier Hayseed
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished model, since I had read a review at sometime in the past which said that they felt comfortable with a refurbished model, since the defect had now been corrected, and they got it a little cheaper.Well, nothing was ever quite right about this thing from day one.  The color looked strange, and every effort I made to correct it didn't seem to really make much difference.Then, it started to get progressively darker, and finally, the picture went black altogether.This all happened almost immediately, within the first few days of getting it set up.Now, electronics are highly technical and complicated, and, judging from the amount of refurbished TVs being offered for sale, evidently many things go wrong with them.But my seller maintained that it was not defective, and performed exactly as the specs required.  Of course, he was the one who made this determination.Therefore, he charged me for the "free" shipping when I first bought it, plus a "restocking" fee, added to the return postage I had to pay myself.I guess I'll learn to avoid buying a highly technical, and expensive, electronic whatever through the internet in the future, simply because you are vlrtually defenseless if it turns out to be defective, and your seller won't own up to it.

Reviews.Title: Quality issue
Reviews.Author: kishan
Reviews.Content: I got this tv yesterday (12/28/13) from Walmart. Its a brand new one, not refurb. The tv not working , just powering up, but no picture/menu on the screen.Its totally dead.Looks like visio didn't to any final quality check before packing the tv. Called up the customer care, but not much help to trouble shoot the issue.Don't spend time and money on this tv, its better to get a good brand.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: MJH
Reviews.Content: Worked for only 3months then never turn on again now trying to deal with Vizio but looks like a holiday without TV

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY THIS TV!
Reviews.Author: Ruben Arjona Mejia
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV for less than a year and the cable connector suddenly broke off the back of the TV. I do not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: BIG disappointment, don't buy VIZEO TV's.
Reviews.Author: Gary T. Chatfield
Reviews.Content: When the TV arrived I had high hopes which were soon turned to anger.  It was easy to assemble and that is the only good thing to say.  The cable hookup in the back of the TV faces down and is inside a rectangular recessed area.  There is no way to attach the cable without bending it in a manner which is likely to damage the connection.  The instruction booklet is childlike and simple except it provides zero technical info.  I set the TV up (never had to do this with other TVs) it takes about 20 minutes to run through it's program (must be P286 driven) and what did I get?  The TV only had a picture the size of a laptop in the top left corner?  Manuals troubleshooting guide was...AHH DUH unplug and re-plug TV in...REALLY?  I then spent a fun filled 45 minutes with VIZEO service which ended in "well you will either need to send it back or get it repaired"  Duh Duh Duh!  If Amazon would allow a zero star rating this TV (and I believe it is indicative of VIZEO products) is a candidate.  One more thing, the guy at the UPS store said they get many returns of VIZEO TVs through his store...Hummm?  Spend some extra $ and get a reputable brand.

Reviews.Title: 22- Inch Vizio break down
Reviews.Author: melique layne
Reviews.Content: This T.V. is highly recommended for someone looking for a small T.V and don't want to spend to much money. One thing people must understand is that it's 1080p and only 60hz. This is lowest kind of HD T.V. If you want a quality LED T.V you want something with 120 - 240hz or go with a plasma 600hz. But those Televisions will run your pockets deep, but its better being scamed for a wack T.V. Do your homework before you buy.

Reviews.Title: False Advertisement
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this tv if you want to watch Netflix, because you can't. The stand makes the tv tilt back, making your eyes strain. The picture quality is good, but the sound is bad. Overall, i'm disappointed with this tv. Waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Does it have WIFI?
Reviews.Author: Jenniferk
Reviews.Content: I've been messing with this menu for a while and I can't find the network settings.  Vizio's site say's it's not enabled, but with the number of people talking about their WIFI experience, I know it had it...  Did that change?  If no, is there something I need to do to enable it?

Reviews.Title: No picture quality
Reviews.Author: KearneyMO
Reviews.Content: Great tv if you are directly in front of it but sitting just 3 foot off to the side, 6 feet in front of it, the picture quality diminishes. I purchased this for an RV without doing my homework. I wish I had seen it in person first before buying it here on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Don't lose the remote - no reason to ever order this monitor
Reviews.Author: Professional Mom "typical consumer"
Reviews.Content: We were looking at monitors and chose this one because it was a smart TV at a reasonable price.  My husband sent me the link and I was sitting at the desk with a tape measure to confirm if it would fit.  I told him it looked a little bit large and was concerned that even though it would fit on the desktop, it would take up every bit of space.  Then I noticed that you could choose a 24" or a 22" - YAY!  We were thrilled.  At 22", the smart TV fit perfectly!  We received it, hooked it up - no smart TV.  They don't mention that if you choose the 22" model, you're choosing a completely different monitor altogether.  That's unacceptable in itself, but the reason I absolutely hate this monitor is because there is no way to turn it off, or change a channel, or do absolutely anything without the remote.  God help you if you lose the remote.  I am considering sending this back - I really don't need the work and hassle of that, but who would design anything without manual buttons so that if you lose the remote or don't have a double A battery, you're screwed?  Go with something else on principle alone.

Reviews.Title: Not what I needed. USB port on the back is useless.
Reviews.Author: Digital Donkey
Reviews.Content: I needed 6 TV's for stations in an educational workshop. Video needs to be played back from thumb drives connected to the displays. This TV appeared to have everything we needed although the manual was unclear about what the USB port would support, saying different things in different places. When I got the TV's in I connected a thumb drive and no matter what type of video (avi, mp4 and mov) I'd use nothing would show up to play back. Audio files were the same problem. It seems the only thing that it will play back are jpg files which is useless for my needs. I emailed Vizio and asked why this wouldn't work and the first response said I needed to use the multimedia widget, which I clearly said I had tried to use. I then had to call Vizio and was told that the TV's multimedia capability was limited to pictures only (despite page 6 of the manual saying the usb port supported Pictures, Video and Audio). I will not buy another Vizio product after this experience.

Reviews.Title: Price PRICE
Reviews.Author: iciconnect
Reviews.Content: I got this for the price, when I received it, I wasn't as excite. Had a weird stand, looks more like a handle. Its remote is small and not for all hand, so if you have large hand your fingers will be crapped trying to key in the channel numbers if you watch cable or standard TV from the built-in tuner. Picture quality is very dark, it had bleeding light form the side which is odd for a LED of its sides. It worked best as a monitor than a TV. Sound was very low and the speak was struggling to handle the bass they have set standard on this guy. After turn the treble up and the bass down sound problem was solve just a bit. I wanted to like this TV but it's form factor was un appealing and so different it caused me to get a mini stand to have the TV to sit on and a makeshift lift to tilt the TV to get a better viewing angle. Some reason someone thought fuzzy black boxes of distortion was a good enough image for dark colors.

Reviews.Title: PICTURE QUALITY
Reviews.Author: Thomas F Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I HAVE TWO PANASONIC PLASMA TV'S THAT HAVE TWICE THE BRIGHTNESS OF THIS TV.I HAVE ADJUSTED PER YOUR TECH. RECOMMENDATIONS AND IT HELPED SOME.I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS TV.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: John E. Quandt
Reviews.Content: OK for a work room or exercise room TV.  Could use a second HDMI input.  Sound is also kind of tinny.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: tspromotions "tspromotions"
Reviews.Content: The picture is BRILLIANT and beautiful.  LOVE IT for that!!!  Two things that were kind of a bummer though...1.  We upgraded from a "cheap" Westinghouse LCD, but this model only had one set of A/V hookup's and NO computer cable (vga?) hookup, so both our Wii and our home security camera system were just made obsolete by this tv.  I can buy an adapter for the Wii to convert it to hdmi for $30.  Not too thrilled.2.  Again, our "cheap" Westinghouse automatically switched sources when you turned on the DVD player or Wii.  This tv does not, so you have to go for the remote to manually switch sources for everything you do.....and this wasn't a deal breaker, but the tv also has no "on board" controls.  Everything has to be done from the remote so don't lose it.Overall, I'm not TOO happy with it because of these little annoyances, even though it DOES have a beautiful picture.  I should have looked at one at the store before ordering online.  My fault, really.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Dolores D. Hamilton
Reviews.Content: need 1 more ! love it!I enjoy the smart tv and it is easy set up and use !connets to my pc wireless and exteranl hard drives ..

Reviews.Title: Be Careful what.....
Reviews.Author: DH
Reviews.Content: You wish for! All the whistles and dells are there. At a 60hz refresh rate you could hardly believe it could be claimed to support HD.Suffices for price alone

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Rumsey
Reviews.Content: This was an Xmas gift for my daughter and she is completely satisfied. Having a built in dvd player is a definite plus.

Reviews.Title: Not Good
Reviews.Author: Vance O. Mortensen
Reviews.Content: lasted just over a year then the sound went out.  Visio wouldn't warrenty it.  Would not buy Visio again.  beware

Reviews.Title: TV broke after 2 months
Reviews.Author: Div
Reviews.Content: I got this TV and it broke after 2 months of use.It worked fine for the period and then one day while watching it switched off. When I got it checked, TV repair guy said that probably the power board went off, to repair initial estimate was $200.I wrote to amazon and they accepted a return and refund.

Reviews.Title: Smarter than me!
Reviews.Author: EmperorWatcher
Reviews.Content: Terrific! Love the wifi connectivity. Image quality its top-notch and audio is decent for those little speakers. No PC in, which is the only thing I've found lacking.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, don't like the stand
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The TV works fine, I'm using it as a PC monitor and it does fine.  Only part I don't care for is the sad excuse for a stand.  Instead of setting on a stand this TV sets directly on a flat surface with a V shaped plastic bit to keep it from tipping backwards.  Doesn't rotate easily, probably should mount it on a wall so I'm sitting further away from it but I'm making do.

Reviews.Title: HDMI ports only...
Reviews.Author: troncalli01
Reviews.Content: I missed the part about this tv only having HDMI ports, and it was incompatible with any converter box I tried to connect to it trying to hook it up to a laptop using VGA.I ended up having to send the tv back, and bought a 32" sony tv from walmart for $20-40 more.This tv also had brightness issues, and it was very difficult trying to adjust the settings. Even then, very little difference showed.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: peter sansone
Reviews.Content: THE VOLUME WOULD SUDDENLY JUST CUT OUT COMPLETELY. WOULD HAVE TO SHUT THE TV OFF AND RESTART. NOT TILL I INVESTIGATED FURTHER DID I SEE A LOT OF OTHER PEOPLE HAD THIS PROBLEM. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME

Reviews.Title: worried about black screen death
Reviews.Author: Coby
Reviews.Content: Had ordered this set but after reading the reviews on Amazon and online (especially one review which the lady said she wish she had spent the $80 more and bought another TV as this one died after a year ) I spent the extra $80 and bought a Samsung. Amazon customer service was fantastic and refund was prompt

Reviews.Title: It took two
Reviews.Author: Princess Joanna
Reviews.Content: We ordered it on line and had to take the first one back to a store for replacement.  It didnt work right out of the box.  The second one did.  Nice picture, nothing special.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: George W. Banning
Reviews.Content: I received the TV and tried to hook it up to my cable and found that the hook up on the TV was missing. I called Vizio and they said send it back to amazon they were not responsible to make it right. So I got a cable box and used a HMDI cable to make it work. My problem was the TV was missing what I assumed would be available. The TV work's well with the HMDI cable but overall I am not happy with the TV as my Samsung's picture is much much better.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tv @ This Price Point
Reviews.Author: K. Sampson "sampson2269"
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about this tv, picture quality is great, has plenty of connections for peripherals. My favorite thing though is it being a smart tv it work flawlessly with amazon,netflix,pandora and so on. I have it connected to my apple airport extreme with 0 network issues. Highly recommend this tv for anyone not looking to spend over 400 on a smart tv.

Reviews.Title: Product received with damage
Reviews.Author: Violeta Silva
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 screens to christmas employees raffle, 2 were good and pleasing for employees, but the other  have internal glope on the screen, I have been reviewing the change to amazon, but neither the supplier or amazon give me answer , is the first problem I have with my shopping on amazon and I do not like the service you are giving me to such refund, I prefer find another store more safe to my upcoming purchases.

Reviews.Title: The TV works, but with a SERIOUS amount of scrounging.
Reviews.Author: Alfred D. Cornell "What you think, you are"
Reviews.Content: This TV was listed as coming with the basics and just a little minor damage to the frame.  However, it didn't even ship with the power cord or hardware.  Why would you sell a TV even at a discount without the necessary parts to make it work?  I had to buy a separate power cord and use wood screws just to attach the base.  I'm surprised it came with the remote or even the parts of the stand after that.  I took a partial refund on the hope that the TV itself works well, and it does.  Don't make your customers gamble like that, or you'll find some low ratings from people with much less tact than I'm using.

Reviews.Title: Don't purchase Vizio
Reviews.Author: Bummed
Reviews.Content: We first purchased a vizio tv a couple of years ago. Within warranty period, the remote control malfunctioned. It was determined by your vizio service department that the remote neede replacement. After three weeks of waiting for the new remote control to arrive, Costco contacted us to see if we were satisified with vizio service response.  We responded that vizio had not resolved the issue even after we had contacted vizio again. At which point Costco tried to do a three way call with us and vizio and was told that vizio would not do a three way call.  Because of vizio nonresponse, Costco replaced not only the remote but also the tv on January 18,2011.  Now once again we have had the same issue with the remote control. We contacted vizio and once again it was determined that the remote is not working. Vizio representive researched our history and found on two occasions that they failed to provide a new remote control and it was only Costco that resolved the issue. The service representative put us on extensive holds to speak with her manager. Upon return, we were given a pat anwser, "we are sorry you are out of warranty, there is nothing we can do." Upon requesting to speak with the manager and explaining the situation to him we were once again given the same pat answer.  At which point we requested that it be indicated in our records that we will NEVER purchase a Vizio product again and that we will never recommend your products to anyone we know. You have the worst customer service of any company that we have dealt with.  H. S.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Scorpio
Reviews.Content: Bought a 55 inch HD/LED/3D Vizio TV almost 2 years ago, a very expensive TV. It crashed down twice since i bought it. I asked for a replacement the second time it got broken, I was told they are going to repair it first and do a replacement if it crashes down again. I was worried that if it gets broken after the warranty ends, I'm gonna have to pay from my own expense. I was assured that I can always purchase an extended warranty before the 2 yr warranty expires. So I called them back to purchase EW, they told me I can not do that. They mislead me. They keep telling me to call the third party where i bought it but we just go round and round on our conversation. I'd rather buy a brand new one rather than expend so much on repair. I just throw away my$2,000.00 on Vizio. I never got satisfied with the Vizio product and their services. I will never purchase any Vizio product ever again.
